content: The online game Fashionista invites you to try your hand at the role of a stylist and help a cute girl bring her appearance into perfect order. The process consists of three stages. First you need to take care of the face of the heroine of the game to make her even more beautiful. You will be asked to use various useful cosmetics that will transform the skin of her face into a clean and radiant one. Hints will help you figure out exactly how to proceed. Take the indicated remedy and use it for its intended purpose. And when you finish with cosmetic procedures, you can move on to applying makeup. At your disposal will be a huge range of decorative cosmetics, choose any.

During a scientific expedition, you managed to discover an ancient device created by the scientists of the Inca tribe and capable of cleaning the river. Try with the help of magic balls to free the river from the mule that blocked the flow of water.

content: You are incredibly lucky - you can try your hand at a tow truck. It is necessary to drive up to a standing car, hook it and drag it to the penalty area. However, not everything is as simple as it seems. You will have to be careful not to crash not only the client’s car, but also your own. In addition, you need to park cars on the site so that there is room for others.

content: While playing Truck Driving Simulators, you will have a unique opportunity to get a truck driver’s license. To do this, you must pass an exam in one of the licensed companies and obtain permission to drive a truck. Try to complete all the levels in this exciting truck simulator game. Pay close attention to the hints that appear on the playing field and try to complete the maneuvers on the heavy truck within a limited time. Demonstrate all your driving talents and get the coveted document as soon as possible. Very soon you will be able to go to the track in a huge truck and go on a long journey.

content: It is not clear to whom and for what Mario is going to take revenge. Although it seems that they are taking revenge on him for all the turtles killed during the campaigns. So, you control a mustachioed Italian who runs around a closed room, and two large turtles fire at him with balls. Sooner or later the character will die. But you must have time to Crazy Games more points. The game has a mode for two players.

A funny toy will require you to be attentive and able to calculate the trajectory of the balls. Try to create as large a sphere as possible on the playing field using the brush-shaped cursor. But be careful, if at least one of the balls moving across the field touches the sphere, the game will be lost.

content: A huge city is captured by a gang of criminals. Bandits are terrorizing the local population, and the police and military are not able to restore order on the streets of the metropolis. Only the brave heroes of the animated series “Yu Yu Hakushi” are able to stop the villains. Choose one of the heroes of the anime team and join the battle. Try to destroy all the bandits and free the civilians of the metropolis.

content: During this wonderful game you have to control a combat aircraft. High hopes are pinned on his pilot, it’s time to justify them. Enemy planes will appear in front of you, and the task is to destroy them by releasing powerful projectiles. The game includes many exciting missions.

content: Beautiful cars don’t just happen. They are made so by tuning masters. Use every opportunity to create an original design for the car. There are many details in your garage that can drastically change the look of the car. After you finish your work, you can go to the track and drive a tuned car.

content: To show off your signature driving style will give you the opportunity to play Drift Racing for two. Do you like tight turns at full speed? Then this competition is just for you. Outrun rivals on the track and come first to the finish line. Use the handbrake when passing difficult sections of the track.

content: In this game you have to drive a monster truck. This machine is capable of destroying everything in its path. There are 16 tracks in total. They are divided into four levels of difficulty: from easy to extreme. Between races, you can pump your “monster”. Replace wheels, engine, suspension and nitro boost system.

content: An exciting game Racing for two 2 will take you to a distant planet, where you will participate in competitions. But first, do not forget to choose a character whose car you have to drive. Local cars do not look quite familiar, they are more like spaceships that fly through the air. This makes the process of racing on 2 even more fun. Game ups and downs include a large number of levels, and on each of them you have a specific goal: you need to overtake rivals in order to reach the finish line first. Once this is done, you can move on to the next level. The game has several modes, and if you wish, you can even compete in races with a real friend. To do this, simply click on the appropriate button.

content: Parking is a dangerous business, let alone a huge jeep capable of smashing a nearby car to smithereens. However, it is you who needs to find a parking place for him, carefully park the car and try to keep your and other people’s cars safe and sound. Take your time - the game does not limit you in time.

content: In this game you will have to drive through the desert. On the road there are continuous steep hills, ravines and huge boulders blocking the path. Your jeep is capable of overcoming all of these obstacles, but you will need precise and accurate driving. Try to mega carefully climb up the hill and go down without turning over.
title: 4x4 Offroader

content: A jeep is such a car that you can go on a trip on any, even the most difficult roads. And it doesn’t matter if the path is paved or there is loose sand under the wheels. The “correct” jeep will not be stopped by pits or stones on the way. Even oncoming cars are not a hindrance to him - none of them simply will survive a collision with this cool car.

You will meet pterodactyls, giant fish and other creatures that block the path of a funny prehistoric character.

content: Girls dress up for two sisters
title: Bffs World Cup Face Paint

content: A little bunny needs to protect his possessions from a crowd of enemies, and you need to help in this. At your disposal is a firearm, use it to destroy the advancing enemies. For completing each level you will receive money that you can spend on improving your performance.
title: Big Chungus Bubble Shooter

content: While playing Garden Farm, you meet the owner of a small farm. More recently, the girl worked as a clerk in a huge corporation, but when she got out of town, she firmly decided to become a farmer. The beauty bought the abandoned farm and asks you for help. By controlling the movements of the heroine of the game about the garden and the farm, try to turn a ruined ruined economy into a successful enterprise.
title: Big Farm Link

content: The Decepticon army attacks the science center, which contains a huge supply of Energon. A small team of robots is forced to accept an unequal battle and protect warehouses with precious energy. Choose one of the members of the Autobot squad, go to the battlefield and try to destroy the army of traitor robots and their commanders.
title: Big Hero 6 Bay Max Surgery

content: A very funny game. On the edge of the cliff is your character, who is very similar to Robin Hood, only an old one. He has a bow in his hands and needs to shoot flying birds. Arrows “up-down” adjust the direction of the bow, and “right” - pulls the string. The shot occurs when you press the “space”. Sometimes birds can take revenge.
title: Big Hunter Online

content: Many girls will like the Burger Restaurant 1 game. The work ahead is difficult, because you need to serve a lot of customers in a day. Look at the orders of visitors and make sandwiches at a very fast pace. For a day of work, you need to earn a certain amount of money, which is indicated in the upper right corner under the inscription “Target”. Your time is also limited.
title: Biggest Burger Challenge

content: Sea battle will help to have a good time and develop logical thinking. The game has two modes, and you can play alone or with a friend against each other. Moreover, in a single player game, you will have to fight not against a computer, but against a real player. But in this case, you will have to wait a bit until the computer finds an opponent for you.
title: Bikini Bottom Tic-Tac-Toe

content: The Billiards computer game will allow you to roll the balls without leaving your home or office (if only the boss does not catch you). In this case, your opponent will be a real live person.
title: billiard game

content: Today you have to fight alone with a whole army of bandits and criminals. There is nowhere to retreat, so shoot at your enemies or throw dynamite at them - it will be easier to get rid of a whole group of enemies at once. Collect coins that fall out of the defeated enemy and buy yourself new weapons and additional protection.
title: Billy The Kid

content: While playing Lego Robots 2, you meet Lloyd, the Green Ninja and the nephew of the great master Wu, who go in search of an ancient artifact. Parts of the legendary weapons are scattered throughout the world of Ninjago, and in order to get to them, Lloyd decided to use a super-modern aircraft in the form of a dragon. Destroy the enemies attacking you and collect all parts of the artifact.
title: Bionic Race

content: The process of playing Coloring Pages for Girls will turn you into a real artist. Here you are invited to color pictures with cute animals. Choose any image from the proposed assortment, and then proceed to the creative process. To do this, you have many different colors at your disposal. Choose any color, and also decide whether you will act with a brush or use a fill. If something goes wrong in the coloring, you can always use an eraser. You can also just undo the last action.
title: Birds Coloring

content: An interesting game, captivating, first of all, with its design. All chips on the playing field are divided into black and white. Thanks to this, an exciting gameplay awaits you, which consists in removing pairs of identical tiles.
title: Black And White Dimensions

content: This game has a lot from the legendary first “Diablo”. Choose a character, watch a video in which his bride is kidnapped, and go to the dungeons in search. Along the way, you will encounter battles with skeletons, the walking dead and other creatures. Pick up new weapons, develop and use magic. Extra items can be sold. For those who have never seen Diablo, there are clues.
title: Black Knight

content: The launch of the game for children Cars will show you the characters of the cartoon of the same name. In it you will need to take part in the racing championship and try to win all its stages. At the beginning of the children’s game, only Lightning McQueen is available from the heroes, but as you progress, other cars will open for you. Winding roads in different cities of the world await you ahead. You need to quickly move along the road, overtaking rivals and collecting bonuses. You can play online absolutely free, to access new features you only need to come first to the finish line.
title: Blaze Trucks

content: You have an unusual tank at your disposal. And his shells are not simple - multi-colored paints. So you are waiting for a fun shooter and no violence, just a lot of bright colors. For killing an enemy, a certain amount of points is required, which can be used to buy new abilities that are valid throughout the entire level.
title: Blob Tank Wars

content: Great arcade games Sonic Minecraft will introduce you to a funny cartoon character who cannot stand in one place for a second and is constantly moving somewhere. Keep him company and start either passing the round, destroying the enemies you meet and collecting coins, or fight with the enemy in the arena, trying to throw him into the abyss. The main task is to help Sonic rise as high as possible in the standings of the Minecraft world.
title: Block Craft 3D

content: Go through the levels that make up the exciting game Minecraft 2d. On your way objects from squares will appear, with which you can do whatever you want - destroy, build and explore new lands. There are no restrictions on the passage of the Minecraft game. You can become a creator, a fisherman, a carpenter and even a musician.
title: Block Ninja HD

content: While playing Riddles Magic Story you have to help a funny dwarf get a precious stone. At each level you will see a room full of different obstacles. It is necessary to cut the ropes on which the stone is suspended so that it rolls to the gnome. Avoid evil enemies and collect coins!
title: Block Riddle

content: According to the plot of the Minecraft 100 game, you become a famous traveler, abandoned on a desert island by the will of fate. On the way to the saving village, you have to go around many traps and defeat terrible monsters. Carefully observe the environment, if you’re lucky, along the way you can find a lot of items that will be useful in further adventures. Don’t forget to smash some of the rocks you see, as they can hide 100 unexpectedly useful items, from tools to jewelry.
title: Block World

content: Developing for children from 7 years old
title: Blocks Battle

content: Roam the dark forest and collect notes left by Slender. Who it is is not so easy to answer, but those who were not lucky enough to meet him were very frightened. Your task is as follows: you need to find all the leaves with the text and take them with you. But try not to catch the eye of Slender.
title: Blocky Combat Swat Killing Zombie

content: An interesting game that develops dexterity and reaction speed. Your native island has become completely different. It is crawling with monsters, pitted with lava ditches and deep rivers in which you can easily drown. It’s time to leave this inhospitable place. Run, overcome obstacles and collect coins to buy upgrades. Management: W - attack, A, S, D - movement, SPACE - jump.
title: Blocky Runner

content: Princess Rapunzel is used to looking attractive in any situation. Now you have to take care of the appearance of a cute girl. To begin with, put in order her hair and do her hair. Next, move on to applying makeup and choosing a chic dress. The finished image can be saved or printed.
title: Blonde Princess Hospital Recovery

content: While playing Treat Barbie’s Teeth you have to help a cute girl. She has problems with her teeth, and they urgently need to be fixed in order to save the heroine of the game from discomfort. And when everything is ready, you will be asked to take care of the outfit and hairstyle. The finished image can be saved or printed.
title: Blonde Princess Real Dentist

content: In this game you have to work in a beauty salon. A pretty client has already come here, who wants to receive a full set of procedures. Your task is to follow the hints of the game and use different means to improve the appearance of the heroine. Turn her into a real beauty!
title: Blonde Princess Spa Day

content: Here you have to work on the wedding images of the newlyweds. On the screen you will see the bride and groom, as well as an impressive range of wedding items. Click on them and choose a suit, dress, hairstyles, accessories, shoes, trying to achieve the most harmonious combination of all the details. Let this couple be the most beautiful!
title: Blonde Princess Wedding Fashion

content: This toy sends you to a small flower bed. On it it is necessary to make bouquets of flowers of the same species. For each collected bouquet you will have points. Go through all the levels of the game, try to Crazy Games the maximum number and become one of its champions.
title: Blossom Crush Legend

content: Heroes of the game Blow up this kart - wonderful robots living in a magical land, organized a racing tournament and invite you to take part in it. Choose one of the characters and hurry to the starting grid of an exciting competition. In each of the races you need not only to overtake your rivals, but also to complete a certain task. Don’t forget to collect bonus badges on the track, which will help to delay your competitors for a while. Be careful, because they will also set traps in your path. For each of the won races of this cool game for two, prize points are awarded, which can be used to improve your vehicle.
title: Blow it up kart game

content: Ship Simulator game invites you to take part in sea battles. Control the ship by firing cannons at your opponents. The moves are made alternately, first you launch the projectile, then your opponent. Choose the direction and strength of the shot in order to make the most effective attack.
title: Boat Simulator

content: The protagonist of the game Bob the Robber 1 is a police officer who works as a night watchman in a history museum. Usually, his work is boring, but one night a robber got into the room. The user’s task is to help the guard to detain the thief before he escapes. View from a third person, control - keyboard. The process of the game about 1 robber Bob looks like a race along the corridor. On the way every now and then come across obstacles: laser beams, exhibits, and so on. You need to slide under the rays (down button). The rest is either jumped over or bypassed.
title: Bob The Robber

content: Take control of the thief Bob and roam the city wreaking havoc on your way. Taught by bitter experience, the townspeople are trying to protect their home. But no matter what alarms and guards they install at their homes, Bob can bypass any obstacles. Often a strong wooden bat comes to his aid. She easily neutralizes all kinds of security robots.
title: Bob The Robber 2

content: Help the thief escape from the police. All you have to do is use the mouse to drag the robber around the playing field, preventing him from colliding with the cops. The longer you survive, the more points you earn that will allow you to move on to the next level. And remember, you can’t touch the walls either.
title: Bob The Robber 3

content: In this game you have to help two delinquents to escape from the crime scene. Use arrow keys to move. The main task is to stun the watchman and clear the way for escape. To pick up or use an item - press X, to run - C. And remember, you only need to act together.
title: Bob the Robber 4 Season 1 France

content: Today you will play on behalf of a thief who stole valuables and money from the house, and now a whole squad of police is chasing him. You need to help him escape at any cost, moving through the intricate labyrinth and trying not to fall into the field of view of the guards. Use any cover to hide from the pursuit of the police.
title: Bob the Robber 4 Season 2 Russia

content: In this game you will be in the role of a fugitive criminal. You will need to jump on the roofs and balconies of buildings in order to collect bags of money and banknotes. Try not to fall into the hands of the police. The task is to Crazy Games as many points as indicated at the top of the screen in order to move on to the next stage.
title: Bob the Robber 4 Season 3 Japan

content: In this game, the user (first-person view) will have to steal the century from the Museum of History. Initially, he did not have any equipment for this. But if you look around carefully, you can find a lot of useful things. All of them fall into the inventory and you will have to think carefully about what and how to apply. If it’s really difficult, press the hint button.
title: Bob the Robber 5 The Temple Adventure

content: You are one of the rebels who have been preparing all their lives for a decisive battle with a formidable enemy in the form of artificial intelligence. And now the moment has come when the robots are not yet very strong and are busy creating their own kind. You will have to get into the very heart of their colony in order to destroy the enemy base.
title: Bois.io

content: During the game Dress Up Models, you are invited to prepare the girls for the performance on the podium. To start, choose three fashion models, and then prepare outfits in accordance with the style of each of them. At the end of the game, your results will be evaluated by a specialist who will certainly point out the mistakes made.
title: Bonnie Christmas Parties

content: The beach season is open, and two beautiful twins are already ready to sunbathe and swim. Help them to choose beautiful swimwear and accessories. But first you need to do your hair: decide on the color and length of the hair, and try to make the sisters not look alike. Then proceed to the choice of a beach suit.
title: Bonnie Follow Me To

content: At first glance, this is a traditional dress-up game. By selecting the details of clothing, jewelry, shoes, you dress up the girl Emma for an ordinary school day. The background of the picture corresponds to the task - this is an average classroom (although not ours, but a Western one). However, after you finish the work, a surprise awaits you: the ability to change the background. And then Emma will be on a walk or at a resort. This will help test your ability to make versatile kits.
title: Bonnie Galaxy Faces

content: Even at work, girls want to look attractive. Your task is to sew a new outfit for the heroine of the game. To begin with, you will need to select the details of future clothing, indicating their color and adding, if desired, patterns. After cutting and sewing, all that remains is to choose a hairstyle and accessories.
title: Bonnie Gucci And Prada

content: Feel like a real hairdresser, making a variety of hairstyles for girls. Keep in mind that you will need to create beauty not at will, but based on the images presented. Use a variety of hairdressing tools to get the desired result. Try not to make mistakes to get more points.
title: Bonnie Gucci Vs Prada

content: Dr. Plyusheva, despite her young age, loves a variety of cute hairstyles. Work on the girl’s hair, because now they do not look very attractive. At your disposal are all the necessary hairdressing tools that will allow you to cope with the problem and create a new hairstyle.
title: Bonnie Hair Doctor

content: The task of cheerleaders is to support their team. And, of course, the athletes are cheered up not only by chants, but also by the spectacular appearance of the cheerleaders. You need to dress up the cheerleader of the sports team as effectively as possible. To do this, the game has a chic assortment of sports uniforms. If you find it difficult to choose, click on the light bulb icon in the upper right and see the ready-made options.
title: Bonnie In Riverdale

content: The heroine of this toy was invited to a Thanksgiving celebration. Choose an original outfit for the young beauty. Choose items from her wardrobe and create a real Thanksgiving outfit from them. The hosts of the celebration will appreciate your efforts and will definitely ask you to create festive outfits for them next year.
title: Bonnie Oktoberfest

content: This time you need to dress up Meloni for school. Probably, in her hometown, the requirements for a school uniform are very arbitrary, since the choice of all kinds of things allows you to create an outfit for every taste. Dressing up Meloni is easy: just drag the piece of the outfit to the right place and that’s it. You can thus hang two clothes side by side (for example, blouses) and compare them, leaving the most suitable.
title: Bonnie Rocker Chick

content: The heroine of the game decided to hold a unique wedding in retro style. Your task is to create the most suitable wedding look for the girl. You can choose a hairstyle, outfit, various cute accessories to complete the picture perfectly. The finished result can be saved or printed directly from the game.
title: Bonnies Surprise Proposal

content: In this game, you can become a cute girl’s stylist for a while. Try to create a nice image for her, using all the possibilities offered. Here you can change the outfit, hairstyle and even facial expressions. Thanks to the variety of elements provided, you can even come up with several options.
title: Bonny Spy Squad

content: According to the terms of the shooting game Little People, you will have to control a drawn stickman who acts as a special agent and performs super complex and responsible tasks. You will have to take part in skirmishes on the streets of the city, in the bank, in the subway and at the airport. It’s hard enough to play. The enemy appears suddenly and instantly opens fire. Black men are everywhere, so be careful and careful. Shoot and throw grenades at the bad guys, and fight in hand-to-hand combat to destroy everyone in your path. Take cover behind various obstacles, they will help to protect yourself from enemy bullets. Depending on how long you can hold out and how many enemies you kill, the amount of the fee and the rating on the famous assassins scale will depend. Spend your money on weapons and equipment to live longer.
title: Bow Master Stickman Hero

content: The action of this game takes place in a saloon, somewhere in the wild Wild West. You have to put on a cowboy costume and take part in a fight. The game is three-dimensional and very cool. In it, you can grab tables, chairs, smash them on the head of an opponent, or throw one cowboy into a crowd of others. But be careful not to let the opponents close to you from the rear.
title: Boxing Fighter Shadow Battle

content: In the process of the game for girls Cooking a Potion for the Prince, you can perfectly train your memory. For a limited time, you are invited to prepare three potions. For five seconds, the necessary ingredients will be shown on the screen, and then you will need to place them in the flask.
title: Boyfriend Spell Factory

content: Now you can have a lot of fun popping balloons! On the screen you will see a large number of balls, and some of them contain gifts. Click on groups of elements of the same color to make them burst and disappear from the screen. You need to release all the cute balloon toy gifts.
title: Boys & Girls Bubble Pop

content: In this toy you have to color the drawing of the popular Toyota Prado SUV. Using the huge palette provided by the game developers, apply paint to the image of a huge jeep. Try to turn the car in your drawing into a real supercar with the help of an electronic brush.
title: Boys Coloring Book

content: During the Cooking for Boys game, you will cook vegetable lasagna under the guidance of an experienced chef. Not every hostess can cope with such a difficult task. Therefore, the game will show all the stages of preparing a delicious dish, after which you can easily repeat the whole process in your own kitchen.
title: Boys Cooking Challenge

content: According to the terms of the Breadwinners game for two, you can choose one of the kingdoms inhabited by famous cartoon characters and start playing on behalf of your favorite characters. According to legend, in each magical country there is a special relic that has miraculous properties. And if you collect them all, you can get complete control over the surrounding lands. In the process of playing 2 Duck Bread, you have to organize a competent defense of your kingdom, and then attack others, trying to get all the artifacts. Start by building special defensive towers that will repel enemy attacks and delay them. Along with various types of structures, special troops will help you, capable of repelling any attack. Use your computer mouse to control the game.
title: Breadwinner game for two

content: Surely, many guys dream of becoming the rulers of an entire kingdom. This game gives you that chance. Create your fortress from scratch, buy new types of weapons and mercenaries for it. Build defensive redoubts, improve your defense and combat skills. Don’t forget, Sponge Bob, ninja turtles, bakers, and many other cartoon characters can become your comrades in arms.
title: Breadwinner Kingdom game

content: Breadwinners are famous for always organizing some kind of entertainment. This time they decided to hold a tournament of fighting without rules among all the inhabitants of the universe. You will have the opportunity to fight Shredder, SpongeBob, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and many other cartoon characters. But first you need to choose a fighter.
title: Breadwinners fighting game

content: While playing Breaking Cars, you are among the participants in the most popular North American survival racing tournament. Winning it will take you to the top of the world ranking of riders. That is why you have to work hard. Try to break the cars of as many competitors as possible in a limited time. Keep an eye on the movements of your opponents, because they strive to break your car. In addition, do not forget to collect bonus chips that appear on the field, they can temporarily increase the power of your car or help break another competitor’s car.
title: Breaking cars game

content: The heroine of the game is getting ready for her wedding and you are invited to help her. Almost everything is ready, it remains only to decide on the outfit. Choose the most luxurious dress for the bride and complete it with all the necessary wedding accessories: veil, gloves, jewelry. Don’t forget about the hair.
title: Bridal Dress Designer Competition

content: No wedding is complete without a bridesmaid. Naturally, this participant of the holiday should also look attractive. The game asks you to come up with a cool outfit for the bridesmaid by choosing a great dress for her and complementing it with cute accessories. Don’t forget about the right hairstyle.
title: Bridal Shower Party for Moana

content: In this game you can feel like a real royal stylist. Here you can choose outfits and hairstyles for Prince William and his wife Kate. Press the buttons and dress up the royal couple whenever you want. In addition to clothes, you can change hairstyles and skin color. And the finished image can even be printed.
title: Bride Wedding Dresses

content: Need to distract your child? A game about dinosaurs for children 5 years old is quite suitable. Before starting, you can select the interface language. Russian is available. It is recommended to read the “how to play” section to understand the goals and objectives. After the start, the gamer automatically enters the training level. But you can choose the first stage right away (see the button above).
title: BTS Dinosaur Coloring Book

content: Magic bubbles invite you to go with them to the fabulous land of soap balls. There you need to release trapped bubbles. With the help of a funny gun, collect them in chains of three or more pieces and free them from the trap. Try to rescue all the balls before they fill the playing field.
title: Bubble

content: One of the simplest, and at the same time the best ball games. Multi-colored clusters hang from the “ceiling” of the game, and you have to knock out groups of balls of the same color from this mass. Each ball knocked out brings you 10 points, and the more points you Crazy Games, the higher your position in the ranking of players will be. No timer, no levels - play as much as you want.
title: Bubble Burst

content: To win this game, you need to find all pairs of the same color balls as quickly as possible. According to the rules of the toy, they can be connected only horizontally or vertically, while the connection should not pass through other balls. As soon as you connect the right balls together, they will instantly disappear. Try to make sure that not a single pair of balls remains on the playing field.
title: Bubble Defence

content: The puzzle game Bubble Shooter invites you to get rid of a wall of colorful balls. To do this, you need to throw similar balls into it, falling into groups of the same color as the projectile. After that, this whole combination will disappear. The direction of the flight of the ball is determined by the arrow: direct it with the mouse in the desired direction. If several rolls are not successful, the wall will drop one position. It must not be allowed to touch the lower boundary of the playing field.
title: Bubble Farm

content: Take part in an exciting competition and try to win. You need to make chains of stones of the same color. Try to go through as many levels of the game as possible and get into the leaderboard posted on the developer’s website.
title: Bubble Shooter

content: Logic shooting games Balls are able to capture attention for a long time. Here you will need to control a funny monkey, which you need to help pop the balloons with the help of darts. The game consists of a large number of levels, and each of them features an original construction of balls. You need to choose the direction of the dart’s flight and the strength of the throw in order to burst as many balls as possible. Some of them contain bonus items that will help in passing: additional darts, bombs and others.
title: Bubble Shooter Gold Mining

content: Game Bubbles in a row invites you to take part in an exciting competition. Try to destroy all the balls coming down from the top of the playing field. With the help of a cannon that shoots colorful balls, collect chains of three or more pieces. Playing a toy in Russian, try to Crazy Games the maximum number of points for the collected chains.
title: Bubble Shooter Pet

content: Here is a good example of what shooting games for 4 year olds can be like. Here, no one kills anyone, and the main character is SpongeBob, adored by kids. Now he dressed up as a pirate and trains in shooting. He needs to shoot down targets with a pistol. In this case, all shells ricochet, and the game resembles billiards. With its help, you can develop a child’s eye and spatial thinking.
title: Bubble Shooter Raccoon

content: An interesting combination of puzzle and adventure comics is the Bubbles game. The plot is based on the search for treasures in ancient Mayan tombs. Keys are needed to get to the gold and gems. Here they are offered to be mined by users.
title: Bubbles game

content: The boundless world, familiar to millions of users from classic Minecraft, is waiting for you this time as well. The texture rendering is amazing. As well as the smoothness of the movement of the character (although there is still the same view from the first person) and even the voice acting. The biggest problem is to deal with the control keys. And it is also desirable to increase the game window to full screen.
title: Build Craft

content: Help this cute robot to get over all the gaps between the roofs of the houses. Your task is to correctly place the bridges along which the mechanical man will move. Determine the required length of the jumper by eye, preventing it from falling down from a bridge that is too short. But you can’t build too long either.
title: Building bridges game

content: Territory War is a turn-based strategy game where you have to command the troops of an entire nation. Send detachments of your warriors to capture intermediate points, and then to storm the main fortifications of the enemy. There are many types of weapons at your disposal - you just need to learn how to use them correctly.
title: Bullet Fire 2

content: In this game, instead of running around and shooting with different characters, you have to play the role of a catapultist. That is, you will fire at the enemy castle from an old gun. As it should be in games of this kind, in order to hit the target, you must choose the trajectory of the projectile and the force of the shot. In the process of passing there will be an opportunity to improve your weapon.
title: Bullet League

content: Choose your character and set out to unravel the Autobot Matrix Code. To solve it, you need to collect more logos. Decepticon soldiers will hinder you. Deal with them with a cannon or a sword. To replenish your health, collect Energon cubes. Hurry - time to complete the task is limited.
title: Bumblebee`s Music Mix

content: In this game you have to control a cute bunny who goes on a long and exciting journey. Collect coins and carrots along the way to earn as many reward points as possible. Avoid abysses and other traps, otherwise you will lose game lives. And if they run out, you lose.
title: Bunny Skater

content: In this game, you are invited to work on the image of an informal girl. She loves rock music and looks the part. Choose a hairstyle for the heroine of the game, change the hair color, decide on the outfit and accessories. Also here you can change the color of the skin, the shape of the eyes and mouth. Progress is displayed on a special scale.
title: Burd Festival Hairstyles

content: You’ve been hired at a fast food restaurant. Now you need to quickly learn how to cook the restaurant’s signature dish. An experienced chef will help you with this, but you have to be very careful. Within a few seconds, he will show you the entire composition of the burger. Your task is to repeat the dish exactly using the ingredients available in the kitchen.
title: Burger Bar

content: After starting the game, you will have a unique chance to become the owner of the McDonald’s network for a while. The task is to establish the work of all links, the interaction of which will ultimately allow you to get delicious burgers and earn money. Make sure everything runs like clockwork.
title: Burger Chef

content: In the game, you are invited to compete with the chef, who cleverly creates the most incredibly appetizing and juicy sandwiches. You can start the first round with a professional master who smiles slyly from under his mustache with any burger. But before you start cooking, you need to carefully remember what and in what sequence to put on bread.
title: Burger Chef Restaurant

content: The Burger Restaurant 3 game will give you a wonderful opportunity to test yourself as a manager of a small cafe, who is also a cook, a waiter, and a cashier. The game features a long counter where visitors come up to place an order and wait for it to be filled. It takes a lot of hard work to keep customers happy.
title: Burger Truck Frenzy USA

content: The 3d tuning game will give you the opportunity to change the appearance of a Dodge car. This is a really cool car with a unique design and a powerful engine. Tuning this particular car you have to do today. A huge selection of parts awaits in the workshop. Everything you need is here - wheels, rims, fenders, grilles, headlights, spoilers and exhaust pipes. Your imagination is unlimited, so get down to business. Use the mouse to drag and drop 3D parts from the top panel of the screen onto the car body.
title: Burnout Drift 2: Hilltop

content: This game can be played by several people, competing in scoring and speed through the level. The bottom line is that you need to rearrange the pickup in the parking lot from one place to another, trying not to break it and spend a minimum of time on it. Where exactly you need to go, the arrow indicates. The machine has a fairly large inertia, so it is not recommended to gas.
title: Bus Master Parking 3D

content: To play Bus Cars you will need patience, a good eye and spatial thinking. For a successful passage, it will be necessary, while driving the bus, to lead it along a tricky path to the end point. In this case, you need to collect coins and manage to not crash into anything. The levels are constantly becoming more difficult, so you won’t be bored.
title: Bus Parking 3D

content: minibus gazelle
title: Bus Parking Simulator

content: This bus has huge wheels. They are able to overcome any obstacles. You will have to drive through a car dump, cross a ravine and climb a high mountain. But you have to move carefully. Use arrow keys to control. Try to get to the finish line without crashing the bus.
title: Bus Simulator: City Driving

content: Here is a bow coloring for toddlers. If suddenly they do not go to kindergarten for some reason, you can study vegetables at home using a computer. Using the example of a colored picture, it is easy to explain to the child the process of bulb ripening. Coloring is easy: move the mouse cursor to the desired color, click and go to the area in the picture. Click there again.
title: Butterfly Coloring Book

content: In order to become the winner of the game Mahjong logical butterflies, you will need attentiveness and ingenuity. The authors propose to collect butterflies from individual wings placed on the playing field. As soon as two identical wings are found, they turn into a beautiful butterfly, which, waving its newly acquired wings at you, flies off the screen. Go through the territory of their secret hideout, look into each of the buildings and shoot all the criminals. During the battle, do not forget to reload your machine gun in time.
