content: This time you have to face the enemy head-on and give him a proper rebuff. The game takes place in the impenetrable jungle, where the main task is to destroy the enemy base. A variety of weapons are available to you, there is even the opportunity to blow up enemy tanks. Well, an ordinary rifle will do for the infantry.
title: Commando game

content: Your squad will have to resist the pressure of an entire enemy army, consisting of infantry, aircraft and armored vehicles. Create a strong defense by placing defensive structures in the most unsafe places that will fire at the enemy. Apply all the military technologies available to you, holding back the increasing attacks of the enemy with their help.
title: Commando Turrets game

content: You have to participate in a secret operation on enemy territory. Carefully make your way through the forest, trying to get close to the enemy from the rear. The main task is to eliminate the terrorist camp. Your machine gun is equipped with a silencer and a scope, which will allow you to silently take out the base guards. You can aim and shoot with the mouse.
title: Contra game

content: You have to complete the task of the commander - to destroy a large terrorist group that has occupied the abandoned territory of the military base. As part of a special forces group, try to clear the area from all enemies and not get under fire yourself. The weapon reloads automatically, so you just have to make well-aimed shots.
title: Contra Strike game

content: An excellent recipe for real Italian pizza is offered by the Chef game for those who love or want to learn how to cook. One condition that concerns the recipe: it will need to be translated from English into an understandable language. By the way, you can try to cook according to these recommendations not only in real life, but also in the process of passing. Immediately after the start, you will find yourself in the kitchen, where a pretty cook will wink. In the middle of the screen is a large table with everything you need for cooking. Gather the ingredients together and pop them in the microwave. Check what kind of chef you are.
title: Cooking After Workout

content: In this game you have to cook delicious ice cream with various fillings. Order forms will be displayed on the screen, and you just have to create cold desserts in accordance with the specified information. Put ice cream in bowls, and then add berries and other additions.
title: Cooking Battle

content: After starting the game for two for children 6 years old, you will meet a couple of charming characters who are going on a dangerous journey. You and your friend need to go through a huge number of levels, each of which is waiting for intricate locations with lots of obstacles. Various boxes, levers, buttons will help you.
title: Cooking Challenge

content: The game is dedicated to Thanksgiving - a great American holiday. On the screen you will see two girls who are going to celebrate a significant date. You just need to come up with cute images for the heroines of the game, using hairstyles, dresses, shoes and accessories for this. The background can also be changed.
title: Cooking Christmas Traditional Food

content: Game Chef for children will not only be fun, but will also bring a lot of benefits. After all, it may be that it is she who will help you choose a profession. Passage does not require special talents. All you need to do is move the mouse accurately and follow the prompts. So it will be possible to cook cool virtual cakes for children online. Do not repeat this at home.
title: Cooking Contest

content: In this game, you have to become an employee of one of the eateries located in the stadium. Try to fulfill the orders of all visitors to your cafe as quickly as possible. The money you earn at the establishment can be used to purchase new equipment and products.
title: Cooking Fast Hotdogs And Burgers Craze

content: During the online game Restaurant Business you become one of the employees of a small cafe in the center of the capital of the fairy kingdom. Try to serve each of the visitors as quickly as possible. Thanks to your efforts, all the wishes of customers will be fulfilled and they will definitely become regular guests of your cafe.
title: Cooking Scene

content: One of the heroines of a series of games based on the comic book and cartoon “Avatar” - Cora, decided to take part in a death race. This is a run around the city with picking up goodies and jumping over dudes with stun guns. However, these maniacs will not always be able to jump over. Sometimes they fly on cables, which makes jumping over impossible. Collisions with them lead to loss of health and, as a result, life.
title: Cora game - running around the city

content: The children’s game will introduce you to a funny cupid who has a magic bow. But this time, you will have to shoot not at hearts, but at balls. At the top of the screen is a design of a large number of multi-colored balls. At the bottom is your “bow”, from which you can launch the same rounds up. You need to throw the ball to his fellows of the same color, after which they all fall. Some balls are marked with asterisks, they are considered bonus and help to delay the lowering of the structure. It happens every time the stars go out on the bottom panel.
title: Corinne The Fairy Adventure

content: It’s time to take a break from virtual wars and destruction, having tried your hand at creation. This can be done through the building strategy game. The main task for the players in it will be to build an amusement park and make happy a certain number of visitors (at each level this number increases) for a certain period of time. For a successful game, the strategy must be correct and you will have to develop it in the shortest possible time. Build carousel swings, develop infrastructure and keep an eye on the mood of vacationers. If you succeed here, you may well be entrusted with the construction of the city.
title: Corporate Overlord

content: The famous crime fighter Robocop is sent to the dungeons of one of the research laboratories, where several scientists got lost. Having descended to the lowest level of the catacombs, the Super Cop discovers a huge number of bloodthirsty mutants. Help the hero of the game to destroy the monsters and find out what happened to the scientists.
title: Counter Battle Strike SWAT

content: Those who like to shoot and run along the intricate corridors are familiar with the Counter-Strike game and, as before, is a first-person team shooter. Today, there are a huge number of versions of this magnificent and realistic shooting game. In ours, you have the opportunity to fight both against bots in a single company, and as part of a team, by downloading the level from the server. Before the start of the battle, the Counter Strike game gives you the opportunity to decide which side you will play on: terrorists or special forces. Then choose any location and join the battle. The main goal of any version of Counter Strike is to complete the task of the card and destroy the opponents. If you win, you will receive a good reward that can be spent on buying weapons, equipment and special equipment. Remember that you need to act very quickly, trying not to reveal your presence for a longer time. The Counterstrike game has rather difficult conditions for passing levels. One wrong step - and the enemy will fire a whole hail of bullets at you, stopping the operation or even ending your life in one second.
title: counter strike game

content: This game invites you to a huge online field where you have to fight nightmarish monsters and other players. The toy is divided into many stages, on each of which you need to repel the attacks of otherworldly creatures. Destroy monster bots, but don’t forget that you will meet real opponents ahead.
title: Counter Terrorist Strike

content: Lorraine and Carla are invited to a friends Christmas party. The holiday is expected to be cheerful and noisy. Help the couple choose the right costumes. Combine dressy tops and trousers with warm outerwear, hats and shoes. When one of them is ready, move on to choosing an outfit for another character.
title: Couple Travel Selfie

content: In order for the Cowboy game to start, you will need the Firefox browser. But all possible inconveniences are more than compensated by the gameplay and good graphics. So, the essence of the passage is that the main character must participate in endless fights on the streets of the town of the times of the Wild West. Fights are group fights. The number of participants is 5-6 people. Principle: every man for himself. But not all the characters that the Cowboys game offers you are your opponents. Here there are runaway convicts, and Indians, and other personalities. The view, by the way, is from a third person, and the drawing claims to be three-dimensional. Each stage lasts five minutes.
title: Cowboy game

content: The owner of one of the salons in a small Texas town has offered you a dangerous task. You must destroy the zombie horde that has taken over part of the city. Go to fight monsters and try to eliminate as many dead people as possible. For the head of each of them, you will receive gold coins from the employer, for which you can buy new weapons.
title: Cowboy Shoot Zombies

content: Robots for 2 game is an exciting hybrid of shooter and rpg, designed for two players. Together with your partner, you will control a pair of robots, whose task is to complete all levels, helping each other to shoot enemies. The principle of the game resembles the famous Fireboy and Watergirl series, but there are differences. Your characters can shoot at the enemy, the enemy also fires back. There are not so many logical difficulties in the game - more action. But be careful, if one of you dies, the game will end, so you need to reach the end only together.
title: Cowboy VS Robots

content: A merciless fight against ungodly zombies is the sacred duty of every real cowboy! For nothing, or what, revolvers in holsters dangle? You are waiting for the passage from the first person. With two Smith & Wessons at the ready, move through the maze and shoot the walking dead. But watch out - they fire back. Collect bonuses falling out of the bodies.
title: Cowboy vs Zombies game

content: At your disposal is a naval base with ships, submarines and aircraft. The enemy is advancing, so stay on the defensive by controlling the cannons with the up and down arrow keys. Upgrade, grow your fleet and send it on a campaign to destroy the enemy port.
title: Craft Sharp Shooter

content: You are on a desert island. There is not a soul around, only bloodthirsty sharks live in coastal waters. The danger is that the water level is rising, and predators are ready to deal with you at any second. It’s good that blocks are falling from the sky, lining up on the ground in a pyramid. On them you can climb to the very top. Just look, do not fall under the boulders.
title: Craft Tetris

content: If you like horror movies even a little, then you will like this toy too. The main character in it is a rabbit who got lost on a dark night in a dark forest. But the eared has a flashlight. Use it to blind the monsters. And they won’t be slow to show up, so be ready to run. Along the way, you still need to jump over all sorts of obstacles.
title: Crazy Alien Dog

content: After starting the game Dentist Dentist for Boys, you have to become a vampire dentist. Start playing and treating your teeth by choosing the right tools and using them for their intended purpose. Tips that constantly appear on the screen when you click on the selected item will help you not get confused in the process.
title: Crazy Animals Dentist

content: In this wonderful game you have to destroy colorful balls with a small cannon. Try to remove all the balls before the moment when the huge plate falls on the playing field. Shoot balls from a cannon so that they form one-color chains of three or more pieces with balls located at the top of the screen, while all of them will disappear.
title: Crazy Ball Adventures

content: During the game Flight Simulators on Airplanes you have to control a huge passenger liner. At the first level, you have to master landing on the runway. When approaching the airfield, reduce altitude in advance, reducing engine speed, extend flaps and landing gear. Control the flight of the aircraft with the mouse. Land smoothly and stop.
title: Crazy Chopper

content: During the game Lego war against the Germans, you have to become a military leader who is tasked with organizing the offensive of the allied troops that have landed in Western Europe, occupied by the Nazi troops. Try to repel your opponent’s attacks, build up enough strength and defeat enemy units.
tags: About the war with the Germans
title: Crazy Combat Blocky Strike

content: In the incredible game Car Racing 2 you are invited to drive a car in a special tube. It is necessary to drive the specified distance in order to proceed to the next stage. But you need to act very carefully so as not to damage the car when meeting obstacles.
title: Crazy Demolition Derby V1

content: With the help of the game Fishing for two you will be able to feel the spirit of competition, which is so typical for fishermen. Real fishing enthusiasts do not part with their hobby even at home. Of course, the game cannot be compared with the sensations of real water hunting, but just spending time at the computer with a friend is also worth a lot. So let’s get started. You compete for speed and the number of fish caught. Control the fisherman with the arrow keys and try to catch the big one. Points are awarded for each catch.
title: Crazy Fishing

content: Today you have to help a desperate guy named Joe clean up the city. At night, the bandits seized the city council and intend to establish a new order. We urgently need to clear the streets of criminals. Grab a gun and start dealing with the enemy. Aim and shoot with your mouse.
title: Crazy Joe game

content: The fact that this is an international airport is only indicated by aircraft that are visible at the edges of the screen. It does not affect the gameplay in any way. You will have to park your car at any time of the day. The game has 12 levels, which provide different options for the location of the parking lot. You can compete with your friends by playing the game in turns.
title: Crazy Parking

content: Do you think that there are no shooting games for boys aged 5? And here you are wrong! And the proof of this is easy to get: just start the game.
title: Crazy Pixel Apocalypse

content: Your task is to save your home planet from the attack of invaders who are not very friendly towards the locals. Who wins this war depends on your reaction and dexterity, since at the same time you have to make sure that you are not bombed and attack yourself.
title: Crazy Pixel Apocalypse 3

content: This time you have to work on the appearance of the stewardess. At work, she should look as attractive as possible. Try to put the girl’s face in order by applying various useful tools. After that, it remains only to do makeup and choose the right suit. Change your hair too.
title: Crazy Rich Asian Princesses

content: Runners
title: Crazy Roll 3d

content: The city is captured by the terrible dead, and only you can stop their invasion and free the metropolis from zombies. The specialists of the Special Forces have prepared you for the landing, and now it depends only on your abilities how successful this military operation will be. Destroy monsters with the help of firearms and clear the areas of the metropolis from nightmarish monsters.
title: Crazy Shooters 2

content: In this game you will be in the shoes of either a cop or a gangster. In any case, with a gun drawn, you will find yourself in the middle of a busy city square. Various people are scurrying around, and you must determine by the inscriptions above them who needs to be filled up. If you kill too many innocents, you will have to start the game again. The point is to Crazy Games the maximum number of points.
title: Crime City 3D 2

content: The Battle game offers you to command a squad of elite fighters. The success of a military operation rarely depends on the skill and professionalism of a single soldier. In emergency and not very situations, the commander plays the most important role. Become them for the duration of each game operation, assembling your own squad and brilliantly completing assigned tasks.
title: Criminal

content: Another online shooter is ready to take couch commandos and offer them death matches. You can choose a team mode with the number of members from 4 to 8. Or you can play a war for singles. In the first case, by the way, you can “blame” your comrades, as well as yourself. A good arsenal is provided for the destruction of targets.
title: Crisis shooter game

content: The special forces brigade in which you are serving had to go to one of the hot spots on the planet. You and your squad have been ordered to take control of an abandoned terrorist research base. When approaching the object, your group comes face to face with a huge detachment of mercenaries. Try to destroy them all and complete a deadly task.
title: Critical Combat Battle Royale

content: In this game, you’ll have to help the SpongeBob characters to park their boat. On the first level you will do it with hints. That is, along the designated trajectory. However, you will have to sweat on your own. There is a limited time to complete the task, so hurry up. If you don’t, you’ll have to start all over again.
title: Cross Road Exit

content: If you see the inscription “There is no way out” - do not believe it. It’s always there, and the Autobots will find it. And in this game you will help them. You need to control two robots that can dock to each other (oh, it’s so romantic!). Docking is needed in order to overcome some obstacles in principle possible. You can play alone or together, controlling different robots.
title: Cross The Bridge

content: If you like racing with a view from above and, at the same time, not too dynamic, then you will enjoy playing Car Drift. Despite the small size of all objects, their drawing is not bad. The animation is nothing special, but no one demanded anything of the sort from it. The essence is very simple and pretty standard: drive around the tracks and drift around corners. Of course, it is desirable to come to the finish line before your competitors. But besides winning, collecting stars also brings additional points. It is advisable to pick up all of them during the race, and it consists of three circles. Upgrade between stages, paying for upgrades with prize money. The number of users is one. But players can change each other at the computer and compete in scoring. If you want something cooler and prettier, then try playing Drift on 3D cars if you find it on the net.
title: Crunched Metal: Drifting Wars

content: In this game you have to go to the beach where a cat and a dog have decided to have a mock battle. Decide whether you will fight a real opponent or a virtual one. After that, it remains only to attack the enemy, trying to hit him with projectiles that take away health points. Their number is fixed at the top of the screen.
title: Crush The Animals

content: Your name is John Smith. A terrible virus has overcome the inhabitants of your hometown. You are their last hope for salvation. Go to the streets and in complete darkness try to deal with hordes of zombies. Use the right and left mouse buttons to shoot and aim. Space bar - crouch. Navigate with the W, A, S and D buttons.
title: Crusher game

content: The Crystals game offers to get rid of precious stones. Form combinations of three or more identical elements horizontally or vertically to remove them from the playing field. If you can clear several rows at once, you will earn bonus points. Some combinations will bring you crystals with additional abilities. They will allow you to destroy even more lines and get more reward points. Sometimes random multipliers will appear on the screen. They will quickly increase the prize received.
title: Crystal Lines

content: Cooking Ice Cream Cafe will turn you into a real pastry chef who knows a lot about cold treats. In it you need to create ice cream in accordance with the wishes of customers. Each dessert has its own original recipe, and you must strictly follow it during preparation, otherwise nothing will work.
title: Crystals Ice Cream Maker

content: While playing Spa Beauty Salon, you are invited to work on the images of cute princesses. Choose any girl you decide to make even more beautiful. Next, you will need to carry out various cosmetic procedures using the issued useful products. Process the body, face, hair of the heroine, following the prompts. The final touch will be the choice of hairstyle and outfit. At your disposal is a lot of different chic dresses, skirts, corsets. After you finish one heroine of the game for girls, move on to the next one.
title: Crystals Spring Spa Day

content: Games Waitress in a cafe will plunge you into the atmosphere of a holiday, cheerful mood and a huge selection of all kinds of cakes and pastries. Every child dreams of visiting a fabulous establishment on New Year’s Eve, where the beautiful Snow Maiden delivers food, and at the same time fulfills any, even the most cherished desire. Today you have to become a cafe hostess and a waitress at the same time in a game for girls. The task of a waitress in a cafe is to provide restaurant visitors with a good mood and fulfill their orders correctly. To do this, quickly respond to the newly arrived kids and seat them at free tables. You need to promptly and politely serve small customers. Do not forget that the winter holidays are coming soon, and if the kids leave dissatisfied, then the guests will stop visiting your establishment. The game is controlled with the mouse.
title: Crystals Sweets Shop

content: Tomorrow War is a classic 3D spaceship combat simulator. The plot consists of 34 mandatory missions. Also, if you fulfill certain conditions, you can get access to 7 bonus levels. Radars have detected an alarming number of asteroids approaching Earth’s orbit. You are tasked with destroying the cluster before the boulders enter the airspace of the planet. It will be a real war against a huge number of cosmic bodies of different sizes.
title: Cube Arena Zombie Warfare

content: The game Cubes in a row invites you to become a demining specialist. At each level of this exciting toy, you must turn off the electronic fuse system. Try to remove colorful pixels from the screen in a limited time. If you do not manage to destroy the colored squares, an explosion will occur, and you will have to start the game from the very beginning.
title: Cube Blast

content: Passing the game Racing for children 4 years old without the help of adults is unlikely to be possible. In any case, for the launch and the first race, the participation of dad or older brother is simply necessary. In principle, everything is standard: the races take place on the highway. Along the way, you need to collect prizes: coins and nitrous oxide. The former will help you upgrade between races. The second will give the acceleration needed to improve the result. Additional points are brought by driving with drifts, as well as a long flight after the springboard.
title: Cube City Racing

content: Zombies are attacking! They crawl from all sides, there is almost no chance to survive. The last hope is for a helicopter to pick you up. Stock up on provisions and collect weapons and move forward. Move through the dark alleys of the city, hold your shotgun tightly, because zombies can attack unexpectedly.
title: Cursed city game

content: Simple kids games invite you to do math with Mickey Mouse. He will ask for addition examples, and you just need to choose the correct answer from the five offered. If you answer correctly, you will receive a prize star. Your task is to earn as many of these stars as possible so that Mickey gives you a high mark.
title: Cut My Rope

content: Any game for a 2 year old child is, first of all, entertainment associated with learning or acquiring any skills. So today, together with Dasha, you will go to visit her grandmother, in the village. The girl always helps the old woman with the housework, and this time she can choose any of the premises on the farm and get to work.
title: Cute Animal Shapes

content: An exciting car racing game for children 3 years old invites you to take part in the delivery of goods. After the launch, you find yourself on a dairy farm, where you have to work as a driver of a cute truck.
title: Cute Cars Racing

content: The famous Rainbow Dash turned to your magical beauty salon. She dreams of changing her image a bit, both as a pony and as a girl. Try to come up with an original style for the beauty that will emphasize her beauty and personality, turning her into the most beautiful pony in Ponyville.
title: Cute Pony Care

content: There is no easier pony game for girls 8 years old than this one. It does not require anything but imagination and taste when choosing an outfit for the main character. Who will he be: a pony or a unicorn, you decide. Use the virtual buttons on the screen to change its appearance. At the end, the picture can be saved or printed. You can invent and create several different fairy tale characters.
title: Cute Pony Coloring Book

content: While playing Barboskin’s puzzles, you get to know the smallest member of the family of amazing dogs. Playing with a family photo album, the Kid accidentally cut a photo with scissors, which depicts all the children in the family. During the game for girls you have to help a little puppy to put together a photo from a huge number of individual pieces. Carefully inspect the playing field and find a place for each piece of the puzzle. Try to glue the frame as quickly as possible, because very soon all the Barboskins will come from school and will be very upset if they see a damaged photo.
title: Cute Puppies Jigsaw

content: In Surgery surgery for girls you will become one of the best specialists in a small private medical center visited by the famous model Barbie. The beauty is waiting for the birth of her first child and is terribly worried about this.
title: Cute Puppy Rescue

content: Mary is a girl with a camera that constantly blinds her eyes with a flash. And Melissa is not fragrant grass, but Mary’s friend. The girls got out to walk around the city and arrange a photo session against the backdrop of urban landscapes. Help them choose the most suitable outfits for each occasion. By the way, you can play together. Then you will dress up one of the girls, and your friend - the other.
title: Cuties Candy Makeup

content: You got into a hostile world, in order to survive here, you need to fight. Minecraft robot games offer a boxing ring as an arena for battle, where giant iron cars are waiting for you. Powerful blows that you will inflict on the enemy should knock him down. Don’t let up for a second. To protect against enemy attacks, try to block more often.
title: Cyborg Slayer

content: Off-road racing on big 4 wheel trucks. The track is going to be tough, so get ready.
title: Dangerous Jeep Tour game

content: Do you want to take part in dirt track racing? Then start the game. Management here is simple. But when cornering, you need to press a special button for drifting. The entire route is divided into segments that must be overcome in the allotted time. If you succeed, you get extra time. No, you start over. You can upgrade between levels.
title: Dare Drift : Car Drift Racing

content: The game “Ninja in action” is a fun training of ingenuity and attentiveness. Each level is an original puzzle. The little ninja needs to get to the transition to the next stage. Help the kid by launching him into flight from the catapult. Along the way, you can collect shurikens to get more reward points.
title: Dark Ninja

content: How good it is to while away the long winter evenings with friends in a cozy country house near the fireplace. Today you are just waiting for guests, and the room, to put it mildly, is a mess. Therefore, rather, take the mouse in your hands and put everything in its place. At the bottom of the screen you will see items and things that you need to remove by clicking on them with the left button.
title: Dark Prophecy

content: For girls for 8 years
title: Dark Queen Real Haircuts

content: A simple game in which you need to hunt birds. In fact, there is little to do with hunting here, except for shooting. The character is standing in the middle of the enclosure, and birds are flying around him in the sky. They are drawn, by the way, very conditionally. The weapon is visible, you can aim or shoot at random. The goal is to shoot as many targets as possible in the allotted time.
title: DarkHunt HD: Brutality

content: If all your life you dreamed of becoming a tester and pyrotechnician, then you definitely should try this game. Somewhere in the mountains there is a launch pad. You need to launch a rocket up and try to fly to the stars. It won’t work right away. But for each launch, money will be charged. And still collect crystals. Spend them on upgrades and climb higher and higher.
title: Dash Rocket

content: After starting this game, you will find yourself in a strange place teeming with the risen dead. Move around the location and use your weapons to deal with the zombies. Don’t let them get too close or they’ll bite you. The special atmosphere here is created due to the fact that it takes place at night.
title: Day Z game

content: Do you know that rabbits can be dangerous? Of course, not all, but only those who came out of the harsh Chernobyl forests. After getting drunk on radioactive cabbage, they became predatory and very tenacious. We have to shoot these creatures. There are five types of weapons at your disposal. The supply of ammo is limited, but you can buy more. First-person view.
title: Dead Swarm

content: A sports car will appear on the screen in front of you in all its glory, which needs to be slightly redone. In the virtual garage you will find many different parts that you can install on your car. Think over the appearance of the car and tune it with those fragments that you like the most. Well, then you can admire your creation on the track.
title: Deadly Car Race

content: According to the terms of the Fighting for two with weapons game, you have to defend yourself from hooligans on the streets of the city. As you probably already guessed, you have a knife for this purpose. However, the enemy is armed no worse. In order to defeat him in a fight, you need to be very dexterous and resourceful. Constantly move around the screen and try not to let the bully get too close. By the way, you can play both against the computer and against your friends. Use the arrow keys to control your character during a fight. Hit - space button.
title: Death Fight

content: Oh horror, the zombie apocalypse has happened, and the living dead are now everywhere! During the survival race game for boys, you need to get to the helicopter to get out of the danger zone as quickly as possible. To do this, you have a small car, which you, however, can improve by earning money for the distances covered. The further you drive, the more chances for survival, and finances too. Over time, you will be able to purchase a more powerful car, on which it will be even easier to conquer the expanses filled with zombies.
title: Death Race

content: You will love to play free online multiplayer game “Deathcar io” if you like cars, fighting without rules and everything connected with them. Serious passions are unfolding on the field, in order to move to a new level, you will have to show ingenuity and resourcefulness, not forgetting about caution. The essence of the action is to destroy the cars of opponents. For each downed participant in the game you will receive bonus points.
title: Deathcar io

content: The process of playing for two Survival races is very, very exciting. It is based on a rather original idea. You will drive an unusual vehicle that leaves a colored trail behind it. Three more participants will compete with you on the playing field. You need to manage your transport in such a way to Crazy Games more points. But at the same time, it is strictly forbidden to collide with the traces of other participants and with fences. Exciting racing for 2 players with elements of survival is available in two modes. The first is a tournament consisting of a large number of levels, the transition between which is carried out as the required number of points is accumulated. The second is a fast game, ending in the event of any collision. Decide for yourself which option is closer to you.
title: Deathcario

content: While playing the Decepticons, you find yourself in ancient times, when the home planet of all transformers - Cybertron, was still inhabited. The race of robots was divided into two warring camps, the leaders of each of which dreamed of power over Cybertron. Help one of the heroes of the game to get to the vault, which contains an ancient artifact that can restore peace on the planet of robots.
title: Decepticons game

content: A unique mix of ancient “Tanks” and “Minecraft” awaits everyone who dares to launch the game “Dipio 3D”.
title: Deep io

content: If you’re looking for a quiet way to pass the time, Artifact Mahjong is the way to go. Especially if you are a fan of logic games. It is available in three modes, however, only one is possible online. The other two can only be launched after downloading. As for the passage, you will have to collect almost classic Chinese mahjong.
title: Deep Sea Trijong

content: While playing Planes Tu 95 you have to learn how to fly a Soviet strategic bomber. With the help of an instructor, you must take off at one airfield and land at another. But at the same time, the Aircraft Tu 95 game gives you the opportunity to exercise full control over the state of the aircraft in flight. These are altitude, speed, flap position, and so on. The game is primarily aimed at boys and challenges them to complete several challenging missions including mid-air refueling. Flying aircraft of this type allow you to feel what a huge responsibility lies with the pilots, so try to remember everything that the instructor teaches you. Follow the dashboard readings and air traffic controller prompts.
title: Def Island

content: The Tanki 2 game will take you to a world where a terrible zombie apocalypse has taken place. Now the streets are filled with the risen dead, and only a tank will help you survive in this terrible situation. You need to move in your vehicle along a given track, performing only 2 actions: destroying zombies along the way and collecting coins. Fuel is limited, so the tank will stop sooner or later. As soon as this happens, it’s time to go to the store and buy a couple of improvements there. They will help you get further. The fuel level is displayed at the bottom of the screen.
title: Defend The Tank

content: The World War II Strategy game has a fairly extensive menu that allows you to set the desired settings, select the mode you like, and also see the instructions. It will be of little use if you do not speak English, so you will have to figure it out along the way. However, life will be a little easier with the introductory video, which, if desired, can be skipped. So, the events of the game Strategy 2 World War take place in 1944. You choose who to play for: the US Army or the Wehrmacht, the difficulty level and start the battle. At the first stage of the strategy, you need to defeat enemy fortifications by calling in units. Then the reward will follow, the opportunity to improve the soldiers and your World War 2 will continue.
title: Defense Of The Tank

content: After starting the game for girls And hairstyles and dress up you will meet a charming Japanese girl. The task is to work on the image of this cute girl. Choose a hairstyle, various elements of the outfit, as well as accessories, without which it is difficult to imagine a Japanese woman. For example, she will definitely need a fan.
title: Denim Hairstyles

content: According to the plot of the game Drive a car, you get to the test site of one of the automakers, where you will have to take part in testing a new supercar model. Try to complete all the tasks offered to you by the company’s specialists and check the characteristics of its new offspring.
title: Derby Crash

content: Games Finding objects for girls is a training of attentiveness and perseverance. Every girl dreams of a luxurious wedding. But marriage is not only a colorful solemn part, it is also a huge amount of trouble. You need to prepare everything, dress, jewelry, shoes. Absolutely free of charge you will travel from location to location, where in a short time you need to find all the items that are simply necessary for the celebration. After all, the bride should be the most beautiful on the holiday. The game is controlled with the mouse.
title: Desert Flower

content: According to the rules of the War Shooters game, you have to control a universal soldier whose goal is to free the hostages. On the way there will be many obstacles and a huge number of enemy forces, including helicopters and artillery. But war is a brutal confrontation, and the success of the operation largely depends on an unlimited number of rounds and a powerful grenade launcher. You can use this superweapon whenever massive enemy forces in the form of tanks or defensive structures block the path in the shooting game.
title: Desert Force

content: This car game for 4 year olds will undoubtedly be interesting for kids, but difficult to complete. Therefore, the participation of adults is required. But first, let’s get to the point. The toy is invited to take part in the adventures of a cute red car. Her entire journey is divided into several stages. On each of them you need to complete some tasks. Unlike any other car game, they involve driving lifts and other mechanisms, all while the car is in motion. Therefore, for children of 4 years old, it may be difficult to figure out what’s what.
title: Desert Racing

content: For people who are at least slightly aware of the main military events of the twentieth century, the name of the game evokes associations with the war in Iraq. However, the game is not about that at all. Instead of fighting, gamers are invited to take part in the race on special motorcycles with inertial engines. Along the way, you need to collect bonuses and shoot down various targets.
title: Desert Storm game

content: The fantasy world you find yourself in is filled with a huge number of bloodthirsty monsters who dream of feasting on you. Try to fight off all the attacks of evil monsters and find an ancient artifact belonging to a dead race of space conquerors in the labyrinths of a huge alien temple.
title: Devastator Arena

content: Game Poki precious diamonds will require you to be attentive and flawless logical thinking. At each of the levels of this rebus, you must open all the cells of the playing field in a limited time. To do this, you must make chains of gems of the same color. As soon as a chain of three or more elements is assembled, all the gems in it will disappear, and the cells on which they stood will open. Gradually, the levels of this exciting toy will become more difficult, and the time to complete them will decrease.
title: Diamond Match

content: You will definitely like coloring pages for children 3 years old, especially if you love drawing. Here it is proposed to add bright colors to the images of the inhabitants of the jungle. We are talking about funny monkeys. A black and white picture of a monkey will appear on the screen, and you need to turn it into color using various shades. All available paints are located on the right side of the coloring screen for children 3 years old. Dip the brush in any of them, and then click on the part of the image that you want to paint at the moment. When you’re done with one picture, you can safely move on to the next.
tags: Coloring pages for children 3-4 years old
title: Didi & Friends Coloring Book

content: In this game you will be asked to collect animals from scattered pieces. Such a fun puzzle will bring a lot of positive. Just place the elements in the right places based on the existing template and get images of cute animals like sheep, lion and more. You can repeat if you want!
title: Didi & Friends Connect the Dots

content: Educational games for schoolchildren of the 2nd grade will allow you to train your mathematical and logical skills. The challenge is to correctly complete the sequences. On the screen you will see shells with numbers, and you need to put another shell at the end of the chain, which will fit perfectly here.
title: Didi and Friends Guess What

content: You are the captain of a star cruiser and sent to Earth to protect it from insidious alien invaders. Hurry up to join the battle and destroy the robots and alien ships before they land on the planet. But do not forget, aggressive enemies will attack your hero and are quite capable of destroying his ship with a few well-aimed shots.
title: Dimension Threat 12 Game

content: The interface of the Dinosaur Hunters game, as well as all the inscriptions, is made in Russian, which cannot but rejoice. The plot is simple, and you can think of the details yourself. You need to play in such a way as to prevent the dinosaurs from breaking into the village. To do this, along the entire path along which the lizards move, it is necessary to place guns. The game has several stages. Each of them includes several dinosaur attacks. By destroying lizards, you earn points. On them right during the game you can buy new gun turrets, make an upgrade. Dinosaur Hunters can be played intermittently, including pause when necessary.
title: Dino Hunter game

content: Huge reptiles, created by the genius of unknown scientists, escaped from a secret scientific center. Together with two brave warriors, you need to make your way to the radio station, which will allow the laboratory workers to contact the leadership. Try to get to the place as quickly as possible, destroying the maximum number of dinosaurs.
title: Dino Island Rampage

content: While playing Jigsaw Dinosaurs, you become one of the participants in a unique program to recreate ancient dinosaurs. You need to assemble an image of a Tyrannosaurus Rex from separate pieces. While moving the puzzles around the playing field, try to choose the right place for each of them and show your friend a photo of this terrible monster.
title: Dino Jigsaw

content: In this game you will see how difficult life was for a little dinosaur in the Stone Age. Under your strict control, he will have to get to the very end point of each level. And on the way there are many obstacles and enemies. But there are also useful items. For example, a hammer that breaks stone blocks (they just melt when you are around).
title: Dino Meat Hunt Dry Land

content: Runner game for two is a test of strength and endurance in a long-distance race. You can even invite a friend and compete with him, which of you is faster. Well, you can set your personal records in a single race. But be extremely careful - all sorts of obstacles and dangers await you along the way.
title: Dino Meat Hunt New Adventure

content: You have to fight in the form of a young warrior with the fighters of the black legion. During the passage of the level, your opponents will be both ordinary soldiers with swords and ninjas, who, in addition to swords, can use shurikens. At the end of each mission there will be a decisive encounter with the boss. Use the arrow keys to control your character.
title: Dino Squad Adventure

content: Before you is a game in which the teamwork of two players is required to complete each stage. However, you can play alone, but, as they say, in two hands. The bottom line is that dinosaurs (heroes of the game) must reach the exit to another level and collect all the bonuses along the way. Sometimes other characters will come across to meet them. Jump on top of them.
title: Dino Squad Adventure 2

content: In this game you meet a small tribe of cute monsters who need your help. From the details suggested by the developers of the toy, try to create a shelter that can protect cute game characters from nightmarish monsters who dream of feasting on these careless rounds.
title: Dino Survival

content: According to the plot of this toy, you find yourself on an island completely destroyed by huge dinosaurs. You need to go around all the local scientific stations and help the scientists. Be careful, there are a lot of obstacles on the way. Try to overcome the track as quickly as possible, because the station workers need your help.
title: Dino Transport

content: Today you have the opportunity to help the pterodactyl collect all the scattered eggs from which his brothers and sisters should hatch. Control the movements of the dinosaur with the mouse, flying and landing, for example, on tree branches. But remember, there will always be enemies who can prevent you from completing the task.
title: Dinosaur Bone Digging

content: If you want to take part in the adventures of funny ancient lizards, then the Dinosaur Age game is quite suitable for this. There are two characters - a large one and a small one, but they are controlled alternately. At the same time, a small dinosaur either sits on the back of a fellow, or embarks on a journey itself, during which it is necessary to collect coins. The heroes of the game help each other in overcoming obstacles.
title: Dinosaur Coloring Book

content: Have you seen a movie about a man-made park with dinosaurs? Then you will like the game Dinosaur Hunt. It will have to shoot and drive a jeep. You will see for yourself how difficult the work of an employee of an exotic zoo is.
title: Dinosaurs World Hidden Miniature

content: It’s time to ride on a powerful bike! The game Crazy Racing is already waiting for you, launch it soon. It consists of several levels, and on each you will meet a unique track with obstacles: abysses, ascents, descents. Start your motorcycle and try to go all the way from start to finish without getting into an accident or falling into a hole. Another fun moment: when you play this crazy competition, you can collect donuts, and they will bring you reward points. Try to accumulate them as much as possible!
title: Dirt Bike Rider

content: Welcome to the world of rally crosses! These competitions are held in the most remote and harsh corners of our planet. Mud, desert sands and snowy roads are ideal for such races. Before each stage, you need to decide on the class of the car. You can drive all-wheel drive cars, SUVs and even trucks.
title: Dirt Car Race Offroad

content: According to the terms of the game Cleaning the house without time, you have to clean up the children’s room. This is a room that has to be cleaned more often than others. Those who have a little sister or brother understand what it is, because everyone knows how much children love to play, but do not clean up after themselves after the game. However, cleanliness still needs to be maintained. This is a very difficult job, given the big bedlam in the house. To successfully complete the game, you need to find all the scattered things, put them in the indicated places, throw out all the garbage and wash the floor.
title: Dirty Palace

content: If you want to have fun and exercise your logical thinking at the same time, the Mahjong Titan game is quite suitable for this. It is a kind of solitaire, in which chips are used instead of cards, like in dominoes, only with different patterns instead of dots. The task of the gamer is to find the same drawings. Two identical pieces are selected with the mouse and disappear from the board. The main thing is that each of them has at least one long side open. All moves must be carefully considered. But even in this case, due to the fact that some bones cover others, a deadlock may arise. If this happens, you should start all over again. Moreover, the game for true mahjong titans is launched for free as many times as you like.
title: Discover Ancient Rome

content: In this game you have to collect images from pieces dedicated to the Winx sorceresses. The screen presents a large number of confused elements, and you just have to find the right places for them. The tooltip that opens when you hover over the question mark will help.
title: Disney Fairies: Pixie Party Couture

content: During this game, you will be asked to work in an establishment that offers to purchase various fresh cakes. Customers will come here, you need to find out what kind of dessert they want to receive, and then cook it in the kitchen. This must be done as quickly as possible so that the buyer does not get bored and does not leave.
title: Disney Princess Cake Cooking

content: In this game, you are given the opportunity to evaluate your ability as a designer. In order to get an estimate, you need to create an original New Year’s outfit from the items provided. After your model is ready, press the rate button and see how many points you got. Try to come up with a festive costume that will Crazy Games the maximum number of points.
title: Disney Princess Christmas Ball

content: Feel like an artist in this wonderful game. Here you have to color the image of a cute princess. You have a lot of different colors at your disposal, and you can choose any colors to apply them to the appropriate elements of the picture. If necessary, use an eraser to erase unnecessary.
title: Disney Princess Drawing Party

content: Create an original horse by choosing a variety of cute appearance elements for it. Change the color of the pony, add a matching mane and tail, don’t forget the bridle and saddle. And here you can depict a nice drawing on the body. If you want, then change the background to make the horse look even more impressive.
title: Disney Princess Pet Salon

content: The game Gravity Falls sends the gamer to a small town in the US state of Oregon. It is there that you will meet two little adventurers - the twins Dipper and Mabel Pable. Having gone to stay with their uncle, they find themselves in the wonderful world of the supernatural. Despite the dangers that await them at every turn, the guys decide to take a walk along the Streets of Gravity Falls to explore all the anomalies of this amazing place.
title: Disney XD: Oddventure Land

content: Game Create your own music DJ invites you to create a variety of melodies. In front of you is a DJ set with two turntables. You need to rotate them in such a way as to catch the notes. Caught should be exactly those elements that are indicated at the top of the screen. If you make a mistake, the game will end. But if you do everything right, the next level, more difficult, will open. Please note that there is a limited time allotted for the passage of any stage in creating music.
title: DJ Shaq

content: Try to make the most delicious and unusual hamburgers in the world! Buy groceries with all the money you have and start cooking. Learn new recipes and try to surprise your customers with new, original burger recipes. Use the money you earn to purchase additional appetizing ingredients.
title: Dner Kebab Salade Tomates Oignons

content: Finally, in front of you is such a game that parents cannot call fooling around, and they will even be very happy that you play it. After all, this is not just about parking a toy car, but also about mathematics. An example appears at the top left. The correct answer is the parking space. Well, you also need to drive in the right way.
title: Dockyard Car Parking

content: The game Surgeon invites gamers to try their hand at the role of the chief physician of the fairy kingdom. It is you who will be the first to help Princess Sofia, who fell off her horse and was badly hurt. Put the baby on the surgical chair and carefully examine each of the wounds. Then try to clean the abrasions with the help of special tools, apply medicines and special bandages. Thanks to your help as a surgeon, the wounds will quickly heal, and very soon the little adventurer will set off on a new journey.
title: Doctor Panda

content: Kids games about dogs offer you to help little puppy Tim. He, like any other dog, wants to have fun, although the owner of his pranks will definitely not approve. That is why it is necessary to act only when no one is in the room. But if there is a knock on the door, then drop all your activities and pretend that nothing is happening. In the allotted time, you need to have time to eat a ham, tear a pillow, drive cats and do a lot more! And all this fun for children is available for free.
title: Dog Puzzle

content: Online coloring Barbie invites you to work on the image of a girl and her horse. A black and white picture will appear on the screen, it must be made bright by adding a variety of colors. All available colors are located at the bottom of the screen, and there are really a lot of them. You just have to click on the color you like, and then transfer it to the desired section of the coloring. Completely color Barbie and her horse, after which you can save the finished image. If you want, come up with a few options.
title: Doll Coloring Book

content: For girls 8 years old 2nd grade
title: Doll House Cake Cooking

content: In this game you will meet a cheerleader girl. She is going to the next performance, but she needs to prepare well. Take care of the appearance of the heroine of the game, using a variety of cosmetics. And, of course, after you do your makeup, choose your hairstyle and outfit.
title: Dolly Princess Vs Villain Dress Up

content: Put on a real show with dolphins! Here you will find this smartest creature, which is able to show a variety of tricks. Your task is only to control the dolphin, directing it in the right direction. Try to attract as many people as possible to the show, otherwise you may lose.
title: Dolphin fish game

content: In this game you find yourself in a small dolphinarium, where you can become a temporary trainer. By controlling the movements of one of the participants in the show, try to perform as many tricks as possible to attract the maximum number of spectators to the water park and earn gold coins to buy new stage costumes.
title: Dolphinarium game for girls

content: Do you think people need another lawyer or economist or sales agent? Nonsense! People need high-quality and tasty shawarma! Do you think it’s so simple: you take pita bread, wrap meat in it and you’re done? Launch the game and learn the intricacies and secrets of cooking this ancient, delicious and healthy dish! Then repeat in your mother’s kitchen.
title: Doner Kebab Salade Tomates Oignons

content: The Rocket game is designed for those who want to kill time, but not really strain at the same time. It doesn’t have to be anything special. As well as frantically hitting the keyboard. All you have to do is launch the rocket and make it fly as high as possible. Collect bonuses along the way. Basically, these are coins and cans of fuel. By the way, it can be useful to fly not strictly up, but deviating to the sides - more surprises. Among them there is, for example, a platform. Turn off the engine and sit on it to save fuel. Before the next launch, your rocket can be upgraded.
title: Doodle God Rocket Scientist

content: To enlist in the elite troops, you must pass an exam, which is taken by instructors at the training base. In one of the buildings there will be armed opponents, and you have to break through to the exit, destroying all the enemies. They can attack from anywhere, so try to be very careful.
title: Doomcraft

content: Looking for simple games for kids 4 years old? You found what you were looking for! This toy will perfectly entertain the child, and most importantly, will accelerate his development. All that is needed is to fill the contours of the picture with suitable fragments. The result is a beautiful drawing with one or another animal. The only drawback is a small number of blanks.
title: Dora Spot The Difference

content: Santa’s shop
title: Dotted Girl Christmas Shopping

content: After starting this game, you will be transported to another country. There, a couple of tourists decided to kiss during the tour. But this can only be done when no one is looking at the lovers. If there is a danger of exposure, as indicated by an exclamation point, then you will need to stop the kiss.
title: Dotted Girl Cinema Flirting

content: Christmas is coming soon, and in order to properly welcome Santa, the house must be sparkling clean. Help the two sisters get ready for the holiday. It will be necessary to arrange beautifully wrapped gifts under the tree, and throw everything unnecessary into the wastebasket. Next up is the bedroom and kitchen. There’s plenty of work to do here, so get to work.
title: Dotted Girl Family Christmas

content: In this game you have to create stylish outfits for two charming girls at once. This is done sequentially: first work on the appearance of one girlfriend, and then move on to another. Here you can apply a variety of cosmetics, choose fashionable clothes, shoes, accessories, hairstyles.
title: Dotted Girl New Year Makeup

content: A loving couple from Thailand was able to set a record for the duration of a passionate hug. It is these heroes that the Kissing game is dedicated to. Here you will see the same guy and girl who again want to have a great time with each other. But no one should see them! Pay close attention to what is happening on the screen. If an exclamation mark suddenly appears above someone’s head, then this will be a sign that the person is going to look around. Therefore, the kiss should immediately be stopped, otherwise you will lose. There are several levels in the Kissing Game, and on each one you need to accumulate a certain number of points, which are displayed on a special scale at the top of the screen. Time to pass is limited!
title: Dotted Girl Sauna Flirting

content: Start the process of hairdresser and dress up game for girls and become a hairdressing specialist. Here you will perform the functions of an employee of a beauty salon, to which girls invariably come who want to get an excellent hairstyle and makeup. To get started, choose the hairstyle that you want to do to the client, and then get to work, following the prompts. First you need to wash your hair, and then use a comb to form the selected styling. You can play online hairdresser for free!
title: Dove Shopping Day Dolly Dress Up

content: It’s time to take care of the appearance of the heroine of the game! Now she does not look her best, and your task is to eliminate all the problems that have arisen in her. Use the proposed cosmetics for this, following the game prompts. And then apply makeup and choose a hairstyle. Don’t forget about the outfit.
title: Dove Trendy Dolly Makeup

content: The heroine of the game is preparing for the wedding, and you need to work as her stylist and come up with a cool wedding outfit. In the game assortment you will find puffy dresses, veils, jewelry, bouquets. From all this, you will definitely get the best wedding look that will appeal to the bride herself, and the groom, and all the guests.
title: Dove Wedding Dolly Dress Up H

content: While playing Sports 3d you will have to apply your football skills to prove your title of a football star and win this dynamic duel. Choose one of the six teams that you will play as part of and enter the field. Intercept the ball from the opponent, and then try to break through to the goal or pass the ball to another player on your team to complete the attack.
title: Downhill Ski

content: A very simple toy. Yes, and the passage is not particularly difficult. But it is very bright and will appeal to even the smallest users. If only they knew how to hold a mouse in their hands and use it to move a flying rocket left and right. The goal is maximum points. To increase the speed, just collect the crystals.
title: Dr.Rocket

content: Who wants to mess with a monster girl? By the way, apparently, this is a vampire. But how can you refuse the baby when her angry mother looms behind her. Your task is to make sure that the baby does not cry, otherwise the game will end, and you will turn into a vampire. Therefore, think and act quickly. You have a large set of tools. Just don’t use silver!
title: Draculaura Dentist

content: The meaning of this game is not only banal dress up. The toy is much more complicated than it might seem at first glance. First you need to choose a partner. The next step is to choose a suit for a date. Then you will need to prepare the interior, cook dinner and … hope that your virtual chosen one will like everything and he will not run away. Good luck! If the music gets in the way, you can turn it off.
title: Draculauras Blind Date

content: The game Dragon will be of interest, first of all, to small gamers. The main character himself is drawn in a very funny way, in the style of children’s cartoons, and the surroundings match him well. The rules are simple: run forward, jump over gaps, collect coins. Enemies can either be burned with fire (so as not to injure the child’s psyche, the fire looks like a sound wave, and the enemies simply disappear), or jump on their heads. Enemies in the game about dragons are all sorts of mushrooms and other living creatures. Management is also simple, although somewhat unusual. The character runs by himself, but the player needs to help him jump (up arrow). Back arrow pauses. Pressing it again continues the game.
title: Dragon game

content: Fans of logic puzzles will definitely like this wonderful game, which consists of a huge number of levels. At each stage, you have one goal in front of you: you need to throw the ball to the specified place. To do this, draw suitable shapes in the right places, which will help you cope with the task.
title: Draw Here

content: Logic games for girls 8 9 years old offer to help a flying kitten. They have a huge number of levels, on each of which you will see a construction of ice and stone blocks of various shapes. The cat is inside the building, and you need to clear the way for him to fly upstairs. The level will be considered passed when the character of the game for girls 8 9 years old takes off into the air. Along the way, he can collect stars, which will serve as an additional bonus. If the kitten gets stuck, you will have to restart the level again.
title: Draw One Line

content: You need to help Henry Stickman escape from the prison cell. In order for everything to go smoothly, you need to think carefully about the escape plan. Fortunately, friends gave the hero a cake for his birthday, inside of which there was a surprise. There are some items hidden in it that are worth using. But where and how to apply them - you have to guess.
title: Draw Play Puzzle

content: A unique and at the same time very interesting game Coloring and drawing will give you a lot of fun and will take you for a long time. A map will appear on the screen, which you need to go through, calling for help a number of wild animals that act as such pawns. During the game about drawing, you just need to “grab” them with the mouse and move them to free places. You can draw a line on the map and see how the animal will execute your command. It is possible to play together, competing with a friend in the length of the path traveled. The main thing is that your routes do not intersect.
title: Drawing And Coloring

content: In this game, you will get acquainted with the process of sewing women’s clothing, going through all its stages: from creating a pattern to finishing fitting. But not everything is as difficult as it seems. First you need to decide on the style of the outfit and place all its details on the mannequin. Here you can choose the structure and color of the fabric. At the next levels, you will have to do pattern and tailoring.
title: Dress Design For Princess

content: The girl was invited to an important event, but she has absolutely nothing to wear. Your task is to create a festive dress for the heroine of the game from scrap materials. Find in the room those objects and things that can be used to achieve your goal. Decorate the finished dress with decorative elements.
title: Dress Up Competition

content: The girl is going to an important event, but she does not have a suitable outfit. You need to help the heroine of the game. To do this, go to the studio and choose any four items there that will determine the appearance of the future product. But the result can be very unpredictable, it will not always please the heroine!
title: Dress Up Who Bonnie Coachella

content: Your task in this game is to design your own sports car. First you need to decide on the color of the car. Then choose the desired shade of neon lighting. Following this, you can choose wheels for wheels, as well as a bumper and spoiler. At the end of the game, you must drive the car to the exhibition.
title: Drift Car Driving

content: During the game Fast and Furious 1 you have to participate in survival races. True professionals know that such a ride is associated with a risk to life. And this statement is ideal for describing this game. You have to drive through the city streets, completing various tasks, in which only speed is a priority. During the Fast and the Furious 1 races, you will need to drive through the oncoming traffic lane for 1 minute or catch up with a motorcyclist in a very dense stream of cars. But remember - you will get into an accident and the level will have to be completed again.
title: Drift Club

content: Once a brave dinosaur Rex decided to show everyone what he is capable of in the game Racing for kids 5 years old. This character is sure to win you over with the incredible stunts he can perform on his motorcycle. Racing for children for 5 years allows kids to learn how to use a computer keyboard and clearly demonstrate that even a clumsy dinosaur after flying in the air can just as easily land on the ground as it took off before. It’s up to you to help him win the title. When driving a motorcycle, be careful and do not roll over, otherwise the bike will explode, and our hero may die. Prove to everyone that dinosaurs can also be 5+ racers. The game is controlled using the arrow keys. If something goes wrong, press R to restart the level.
title: Drift Cup Racing

content: You are taking your driving test. To obtain the coveted driver’s license, it remains to pass the last test.
title: Driving school game

content: Welcome to the international boxing tournament. You have to demonstrate your skills and excellent reaction in order to get the belt of the winner of this competition. Try to knock out all your competitors and prove that you are the main contender for the crown of the world boxing champion.
title: Drunk wrestlers game

content: As a rule, in simulation games there is no clearly defined task. You just have to drive around the city blocks.
title: Dubai Police Parking 2

content: The game Hunting Season 2 is trying to convey to the gamer the atmosphere of duck hunting. A pathetic attempt, I must say. But the performance is quite interesting. First-person view. Drawn ducks are sitting on a real (photo) swamp. At each stage, you need to shoot a certain number of birds. It’s not easy even on the easiest difficulty level.
title: Duck Hunter

content: Those gamers who have found another eight-bit consoles are probably familiar with the Duck Hunting game. The one in which the dog mockingly crumpled after a miss and everyone tried to shoot her at least once. And now this epic toy is out for fun online for free. So, for those who do not know, it is interesting to know what the point is. And the point is this. The hunter, that is, the gamer (first-person view and only the cursor-sight is visible) went with a dog to hunt ducks. The dog drives the birds out of the grass under the shots. It is necessary to get into each of them in the least number of attempts. Game is also not endless. That is, the time to play at each stage is limited. The game does not run out of ammo, so you can shoot at the bird either until it flies away or until it is knocked down. First of all, the process of playing for boys will be interesting. You can invite your friends and take turns playing duck hunting.
title: Duck Shooter

content: You have to crush stones, craft items and, of course, survive. The plot of the Minecraft Creeper game consists of many dangerous night adventures in which you need to collect an infinite number of everything that is available on the playing field. The mouse is used to select an item. Arrow keys - to move the character in the minecraft world.
title: Dungeoncraft

Unlike the classic Mahjong, here it is not necessary that the chips have two sides open. Do not stay too long, as the time for passing is limited. And if you suddenly experience difficulties, then the hint button (at the bottom of the screen in the form of a magnifying glass) will help you. It is especially pleasant that the passage of the game Mahjong connect pairs online for free. The participation of only one player is provided, but you can, competing in the set of points and the speed of passage, in Mahjong connect pairs to play with friends in turn.

You can choose a solid color option, you can add patterns, you can decorate your nails with stickers. If desired, add a bracelet or watch, a tattoo, change skin color. The result must be original.

content: The McDonald’s Simulator game invites you to play the role of a fast food restaurant manager. So you can see for yourself how difficult the process is. Starting to play, you have to control all stages of the production of hamburgers. You, as a leader, must see everything, hear everything and imagine step by step how to quickly and efficiently perform this or that work.

content: Control an incredible shark that is ready to devour everyone who gets in its way. Your task is to deal with ships, planes and other objects, getting reward points for it. Don’t forget to destroy people and fish as well. If you grab a plane, you will have to work hard to pull it under the water.

content: frog simulator
title: Feed The Frog

content: The Fidget Spinner game is a 2017 hit simulator. The popular spinner is now available online, and it even pays money to spin it. True, they are also virtual.
title: Fidget Hand Spinner

content: The fidget spinner is the most talked about and controversial toy of 2017. Some schools have banned it altogether. It’s good that there is a virtual version that you can rotate anywhere: on a tablet, PC or phone. How are you doing with her?
title: fidget spinner game

content: All that is required of you during the game “Figet spinner clicker” is to furiously click the mouse. The goal is to make the spinner on the screen spin as fast as possible. During the rotation, coins and banknotes will fall on top of it (these rarely fall). On the right side of the screen are the indicators buttons. For the collected virtual money, you can click on them, increasing your income. The main task of this clicker is to Crazy Games one million points. They are fixed in the upper left corner of the screen.
title: Figet spinner clicker game

content: Figet spinner is a bit of a weird game. You will have to control it with the same spinner, but at the same time you do not need to drive it around the location and collect multi-colored “vitamins”. There will be no opponents who can cause harm either. Instead, the fidget should simply be rotated with the mouse, trying to gain more speed. Instead of reward points, you get game currency that can be spent on changing the design of the spinner, as well as on pumping the rotation speed. The trick is that getting on the blade becomes more difficult, the higher the speed.
title: Figet spinner game

content: If you want a simple game for kids, “Figet spinner hero” will do. It consists of two parts. Moreover, the first one may even please the children more. Indeed, at this stage it is necessary to color the spinner. There are many opportunities for creativity. The meaning of the second stage is that the hero will have to spin with the mouse. To do this, rotate the mouse. The speed of rotation and the number of completed revolutions are indicated at the top of the screen. The faster the fidget spins, the more points you get.
title: Figet spinner hero game

content: “Figet spinner idle” is another clicker game in which you need to spin a spinner familiar to many in real life. The point is to earn virtual currency through rotation. Before the start of the game, the user himself sets the record bar, which must be achieved in order to win. With each mouse click, the fidget gets a boost. The more you click, the faster the toy spins. On the right, there are several indicators that can be improved in exchange for the same currency. This must be done in order not to kill the left mouse button with frequent clicks.
title: Figet spinner idle game

content: If you have an extra mouse and a love for clicker games, Figet spinner master is what you need. The main task is to spin the spinner until you get bored. It is not so easy to do this, because it is necessary to pull the mouse cursor at the same time as the click, giving the fidget a rotational movement. But this is not the only difficulty. It is necessary to unwind it not at any moment, but only at the command given by the game. Only a master can handle such a task. For good work, points are awarded, which can be exchanged in the game store for new skins.
title: Figet spinner master game

content: While playing Airport and Planes you will get an idea of ​​how a small airport works. You will have to make decisions on the order of landing of aircraft. There are many aircraft in the air, and there are only two runways. It is necessary to calculate everything in such a way that the cars do not interfere with each other when landing and do not collide in the air.

content: You are entrusted with a special task - to control a powerful military fighter, to destroy enemy military equipment. You have to complete a series of missions, each of which will be an order of magnitude more difficult than the previous one. Help is nowhere to be found. You have to rely only on yourself and your aircraft. Shoot accurately, don’t be afraid of sharp turns and try not to get hit by enemy bullets.
title: Fighting Planes

content: The tense silence is slightly shocking and alarming. But it is worth finding the first weapon, as the undead will show themselves not from the best side. Move around the old house and search the rooms for items that will help you destroy the monsters and save your life at any cost. It would be nice to be the first to find a pistol or shotgun.

content: An excellent game Hares invites you to help a cartoon character - Bugs Bunny the rabbit. He needs to get as high as possible by jumping on the platforms that appear in different places. Try to make jumps as accurately as possible so as not to fall down, and avoid birds flying past the rabbit.

content: The memory game will definitely appeal to fans of the Winx sorceresses. Three rows of closed cards will be displayed on the screen. You need to turn them over and look for the same images of fairies. Pairs of pictures disappear, bringing bonus points. The task is to get rid of absolutely all the cards.

content: Firefighters are not only those who put out fires. These are the drivers of red cars, and the dispatcher receiving the distress signal. content: Fire and water hit the temple, which consisted of a huge number of rooms. Your task is to help the characters go through all the locations. content: According to the terms of the game Catch Fish, you start your way in business as an ordinary fisherman. Stock up on a fishing rod and go to the pond to catch a couple of fish for lunch. At your disposal is a whole island with shops and special aquariums, where you can no longer catch, but breed fish.

content: The game Fishing 2015 is not a full-fledged simulator of the fishing process, but it can bring a lot of interesting and exciting minutes. At the competitions of famous anglers, you have to prove your skills and catch the right amount of fish in the allotted time, which is quite difficult. Try to lower the hook just in front of the fish’s mouth - then it will definitely bite, and you can pull it out. Pay attention, new fishing games have one condition. To complete the levels, you must complete tasks to catch a certain number and type of underwater inhabitants.

content: After starting the Kissing at School game, you will be taken to a lesson where a girl and a guy are going to kiss each other to their heart’s content. After that, you can continue to kiss. The game for girls is available for free.

content: This game has very attractive graphics. As for the plot, it is extremely simple. The finished image can be saved.

content: The Butterfly Mahjong game is one of the variants of the popular puzzle game, which is laid out on the table not in the form of a pyramid, but in one plane. The rules, however, do not change in this case - only tiles located at the edges work. They depict halves of beautiful butterflies, and if you find paired fragments, they will connect, and the whole butterfly will fly away. The faster you find the same images, the more butterflies flutter over the game field at the same time - this, by the way, is a great sight that can be expanded to full screen. The only inconvenience is that the flying beauties cover with their wings the images they fly over. And although Mahjong is completely free to play, and the rules look simple, it will not be so easy to sort out all the details in pairs. If you start to combine wings around the perimeter of the field, you will deprive yourself of the ability to maneuver in the center. Be extremely attentive and focused, as Mahjong has a time limit that ends very quickly.
title: Flower Slide Mahjong

content: A very beautiful and well-known mahjong logic game “Flowerland” will appeal to all lovers of puzzles. You will find a huge number of different colors on the screen. Similar images need to be removed. A little time is allocated for the passage, but for each pair found, you are added a few seconds.
title: Flower Tower Mahjong

content: In this game you find yourself in a huge flower field. At each stage you have to collect a beautiful bouquet of wildflowers. Making bouquets of three or more flowers, try to break all the prize cells on the field as quickly as possible. There is a limited time to collect a beautiful bouquet, so hurry up and complete the task of each level as quickly as possible.

content: If you like the animated series about cute horses, then you will also like the process of playing My Little Pony for two. Pillow fighting is always fun, and if the process is designed for two and takes place in the company of a little pony, then this promises a lot of positive.

content: After starting the game Racing for two players, you will be able to take part in a high-speed competition. In total, four racers participate in it, including you.
