After you decide on the regime, you can proceed directly to the competition. The entire track will be displayed on the screen at once, since the “top view” is used in the design, and you can immediately assess what this road is like.

content: In this game you are waiting for rides on one of the proposed high-speed cars. You choose it first, and then the game mode: multiplayer or single. In a multiplayer game there will be other gamers and most likely foreign ones. You can arrange races with them, or you can just ride and stunt on flyovers.

content: In this game you will need maximum attention and observation. You have to look for the stars hidden in the picture. But during the day, such searches are very difficult. content: Summer coloring for kids will show you a black and white picture of funny octopuses enjoying a walk. It is proposed to color this cute picture using any of the colors offered on the screen. You will find all available colors at the bottom of it. There are really a lot of them here! Therefore, the image of summer will turn out to be bright and attractive. Click on the selected color, and then click on the area you are going to color. The finished picture on the theme of summer can be saved or printed. To do this, use the appropriate buttons. And in the coloring book for children about summer there is a great tool - an eyedropper, which allows you to quickly find the right color. To do this, you just need to click on the painted part.

content: Coloring for children The ball is not as simple as it might seem from the name. Firstly, the ball itself is a soccer ball, which allows you to paint in its parts in separate colors. Secondly, in addition to the ball, the picture also shows a football player kicking it - this is a kitten that resembles the hero of some cartoon. You also need to make it colorful.

content: This wonderful football simulator will appeal to all fans of the game of millions. Choose the level of your rivals and go to the football field. content: During the Fairy Tail anime dress up game, you have to come up with an image for the cartoon character. content: To play Deer Hunting, you do not need to know the habits of these animals, the ability to silently sneak up, shoot well, know the killer places on the body of the beast, the bullet hitting which reliably hits the target, and so on. All you need is a working mouse and some free time. Deer hunting here resembles a shooting range, in which the targets move along arbitrary trajectories. Shooting is carried out from the first person from a carbine with an optical sight (the weapon is visible on the screen). The ammo doesn’t run out. All you have to do is aim at the deer and pull the trigger. You can shoot not only through the sight, but also without using it. This is an example of a relatively simple game for boys that can go on almost indefinitely. There is a mode for only one gamer, but you can play Deer Hunting with comrades, shooting in turn.

content: The Running Boy game will help you escape from everyday problems, forget about bad grades at school and the upcoming parent-teacher meeting. And all thanks to its dynamism and cool graphics. content: Drifting is a style of cornering that originated in Japan. Take to the racing tracks of the drift fashion trendsetter and prove that you are the master of this extreme driving style. content: Starting the game, you immediately find yourself behind the wheel of a fast car, and there is only one thing left - to get ahead of your rivals. You will have a real race for survival. content: In this race around the city, you need to destroy everything. Use unexpected routes, detours and jumps to Crazy Games higher. Shoot at your opponents in such a way as to blow up the equipment as quickly as possible and come to victory. content: According to the plot of the game for three Motorcycle racing, you are transported to a fantastic island, where you have to become a participant in the motorcycle racing championship. content: After launching this game, you will be asked to try on the image of a girl from Equestria who plays in a musical group. Upload your photo and then create an image using various details. After that, you will need to fill out a short questionnaire with interesting questions.

content: The Kissing Simulator game will take you to a park where people have a great time relaxing. There you will meet a guy and a girl in love who really want to be closer to each other. The kiss simulator consists of several levels, and on each of them you need to Crazy Games a certain number of points, which are schematically displayed on a special scale. content: Anna and Christophe go in search of Princess Elsa, who several years ago left her native castle and went to a distant snowy desert. content: Educational games for children 8 years old offer to solve exciting puzzles. You need to pour water through pipes from one vessel to another. It is necessary to arrange the proposed elements in such a way that not a drop of water spills past, and all of it flows through the pipes.

content: Harvesting is taking place in a fairyland, and you have to help its inhabitants to collect as many wonderful fruits as possible. Using a small platform, try to transfer the fruits falling from the tree into a huge basket. Carefully watch the flight of each of the fruits and try to make sure that not one of them falls to the ground.

content: A funny, but very gluttonous caterpillar decided to eat all the fruits in the garden. She asks you for help. In order for the fruits to get into the stomach of a cute glutton, you must find all the same fruits on the playing field. As soon as a match is found, it immediately becomes the dinner of a green baby who dreams of becoming a butterfly someday.

content: The Fruit Ninja game invites fans of stories about the elusive Eastern warriors to play. But this time there will be no bloody fights, harassment and other adventures. Today you will hone your skills with a samurai sword. The essence of the Fruit Ninja game is simple: you need to cut flying fruits and vegetables in half. You can play by choosing one of three difficulty levels. Start with the simplest. There are no restrictions on it and it is quite possible to consider this mission as a training one. At the next stage, bombs appear among the targets, cutting which inadvertently, you lose one of the three lives. Further it will become even more difficult. Try to be very careful before delivering another blow with the sword. Complete as many levels as possible and earn the title of ninja master in this fruit game.

content: The game Fruit Country Poki invites you to play a funny puzzle. Try to Crazy Games the maximum number of points by collecting chains of various wild berries and exotic fruits. You have a limited amount of time to complete each level, so try to collect the required amount as quickly as possible.

content: The Fruit Cocktail game invites you to a farm where all kinds of fruits are grown. Try to collect as many of them as possible in a limited period of time. To do this, you need to make lines of three or more identical fruits. Prize points are awarded for each collected chain.

content: In this game you have to work in a bar located in the forest. Bunnies constantly come here, wanting to drink delicious juice. Carefully follow the orders of visitors and fulfill them exactly, choosing the right berries and glasses. For fast and correct execution you will receive money.

content: Kids Games Dolls is a beautiful dress up game that invites you to work as a designer in a large toy company. The company’s management proposed to create a collection of original toys for girls. During the game for kids about how to dress stylish modern dolls, you have at your disposal a huge range of clothes, jewelry and accessories. Try to create original images that will appeal to the company’s specialists and delight little buyers.

content: The presented educational games for children aged 8-9 allow not only to have a great time, but also to practice mathematical skills. Here you will find yourself on a pirate island, where you need to move around the locations and collect various items. In addition, you need to solve the given example and find the numbers of the answer.

content: In this fun football simulator, you have to control a big-headed player, fighting 1 on 1 with opponents. A distinctive feature of the match is a huge number of bonuses. In order to get them, you need to touch a certain icon with a ball. But be careful, try not to take those that will only complicate your passage.

content: Get behind the wheel of a car and start your journey through a strange world, where knights dressed in iron armor will lie in wait for you at every step. They are even ready to die under the wheels, just to prevent you from reaching the end of the level. Crush everyone you meet on the way, because you need to somehow move in order to complete the mission in the minimum time.

content: In the game Astronauts you have to control two brothers who decided to go into space to find new planets and make the most accurate star map. Who would have thought that terrible dangers await them, and the guys will have to make a lot of joint efforts to overcome obstacles. The heroes cannot cope together, they need a coordinator. The game invites you to help the brave astronauts in their difficult journey. The main task is to get to your ship and return home safely.

content: Welcome to the fantastic world of magic and runes! In this game you have to control five magical elements. Collect runes of one of the elements in chains of three or more. Put together as much magical energy as you can, and through it, try to learn the most secret techniques of ancient magic.

content: The Crazy Hairstyle game invites you to the hairdresser. In the waiting room, customers are already waiting who want to fix their hair. Choose who you want to work with: a guy or a girl. Then start the exciting process of shaping the hairstyle. At your disposal are all the necessary hairdressing tools that will help you get an attractive result. Style your hair the way you want, after which you can change its color. In the crazy hairstyle game for girls you will find a huge amount of colors, you can even use several at once. And there are also cute accessories that will not be superfluous in a new look.

content: During this interesting game, you will be asked to sew fashionable sneakers for a girl by yourself. Choose a style, paint with any colors you like and add decorative elements. Then go for an eye-catching look by pairing your new sneakers with cute clothes and stylish accessories.

content: While playing Cars 4 1234567890, you become a participant in a street racing competition that takes place in the main metropolis of Singapore. Try to demonstrate all your skills and win as many races as possible. But be careful and don’t crash your supercar as the racing takes place on city roads with lots of cars.

content: The protagonist of the game is a charming furry cube with very long thin legs. Her goal is to go as far as possible without dropping her ward, correctly building the size of the steps using the arrow keys. The process does not require significant brain effort, but it is not as simple as it might seem at first glance.

content: The risen dead have attacked the city, and you need to urgently defend it. Here is a puzzle game in which the main task is to get rid of the zombies with the help of bombs. Use your mouse to select a flight path to tear the monsters to pieces or push them off the stage. The less ammo you use, the more stars you earn.

content: In this exciting game you will have a great time in the company of funny monsters. A field of 16 cells will appear on the screen, two of which contain the original characters. content: In front of you is the famous game 5 Nights at Freddy’s. It belongs to the horror survival genre and has a very original performance. Your hero is a security guard of an entertainment center and a pizzeria. The task is to be on duty for five night shifts and not become a victim of animatronic robots. Throughout the game, the character sits in the office and watches the premises with the help of video cameras.

content: Before you is a children’s version of the game (monsters are not so scary) about the adventures of a security guard in a night eatery. He is not as scary as all the others, but no less difficult. It is necessary to monitor the rooms with surveillance cameras. The doors can be closed, but in this position their batteries are discharged. No power - the doors are open. You can hide in a mask, but also temporarily. The goal is to last all night.

content: This game looks not at all scary and even somehow small. In the sense that all the details and characters in it are small. Side view. Keyboard control. Your hero is a little golden teddy bear. He needs to find and enter all the codes for the lock that locks the elevator doors. So, passing through all the rooms, look for clues. The elevator, of course, is located at the farthest.

content: In some way, in front of you is a parody or banter on the game about Freddie the bear. At first glance, everything is exactly the same: you are a night guard, you sit in a closet and monitor the premises through security cameras. But instead of crazy monsters, there are soft toys here. You can hide from their embrace under a mask. The goal is to last all night.

content: Before you is a very interesting interpretation of the famous horror about 5 nights with Freddie. A kind of cross between this game and Minecraft. View, as before, from the first person. You are sitting in a mine, and 4 tunnels stretch ahead. Watch the torches in them so that they do not go out, and sometimes drive away the monsters. You also need to turn on the fan in time. And most importantly, don’t let Foxy in.

content: Here is a continuation of the terrible game Five Nights at Freddy’s, created by fans. And the main negative character in it is a cat doll named Candy. Stay 5 nights.

content: Today you have to control a cartoon teddy bear who went on a journey and wandered into a strange house. Now he needs to get out of here, solving puzzles along the way. Help the bear cope with all the tasks and find a way to leave the terrible place. Use arrow keys to control.

content: No luck for that security guard who dares to get a job at Freddy’s Pizzeria - the most famous and most terrible place in the city. This cafe was once popular until a few children entered and disappeared. At night, really scary things happen in the corridors of a pizzeria, and you have to figure out what’s the matter.

content: It is worth starting the game only if you have strong nerves and are not afraid to shake them. You have to defend yourself from bloodthirsty monsters, armed only with a powerful flashlight. content: 5 Nights at Freddy’s Bear 2 is the sequel to the very popular survival horror game. content: The action game Frozen sends you along with Anna and her friends in search of the girl’s older sister. Elsa, that’s the name of Anna’s sister, received a unique gift at birth. She could control the cold, turning everything around her into ice. Having matured, the beauty realized that her ability is dangerous for others, and retired far, far away, to the land of snow. While playing an adventure game about Elsa and Anna, you have to help the main characters overcome a huge number of dangers and obstacles, avoid meeting with wild animals and terrible monsters. Try to find the castle where the beautiful princess hid from people, save her from the terrible witch and return her to the royal castle. The inhabitants of the fairy kingdom and the entire royal family will be grateful for your help in returning Elsa and will definitely invite you to the festive ball.

content: Not a very colorful game and without any detailed plot. Everything is very simple. You were alone in a car in the middle of the highway. The transport is broken, and there are zombies on all sides. Shoot them and throw grenades at them. If they get to you, it’s game over. Spare no cartridges and spin in all directions. But grenades are tough. View from above.

Help the unlucky traveler to get out of the trap, and at the same time collect all your spare parts. Climbing up, use the help of Sven’s reindeer, who will gladly throw the snowman high up.

content: Princess Anna and her friend Christophe go in search of the eldest daughter of the ruler of the kingdom of Arendelle. Thanks to your help, Anna and Christoph will be able to bring the princess back home.

content: It is not known how you ended up in a dungeon infested with crowds of zombies. But now the main task is to get out of this hell alive by finding the key to the door and the way to the exit. content: At first glance, Angry snakes io is another game in which you need to grow your worm to the maximum possible size. Moreover, in “Angry snakes” it is not necessary to kill opponents yourself. You can steal loot from a competitor and grow up a little too. You don’t need to download anything to play. But the passage is only online, so for “snakes” a stable Internet is important.

content: You will need the Firefox browser to run this game. But it’s worth it, because the game immerses the user in the world of Medieval Japan, where you will be in the role of an archery master. content: McQueen was furious. He fastened two rather big cannons under the hood and a gas installation in the back. content: The game takes place on the streets of Shanghai. Hit the gas pedal with all your might and rush into the thick of traffic, flying past the radar. content: According to the game Charlotte Strawberry Run 3D, you need to help the heroine overcome a certain distance. As you know, Charlotte is very fond of sports and everything connected with it. content: Gambling entertainment for fans of a good fight! We bring to your attention the perfect way to let off steam without endangering the peace of others.

content: The game offers you to spin the spinner not just like that, but for money. The longer you spin, the more coins fall into your game account. Money can be spent on upgrading toys. For example, buy her several accelerators, put oil on the core for better rotation, or change the color of the blades (the last option is the cheapest). The spinner spins with the mouse. Set the cursor to the center of the screen with it, and then sharply swipe it down. Under the spinner is a counter of earned coins, and on the left is a scale of rotation force. If you are lucky enough to fill it to the limit, the number of points you earn will double. You can play endlessly - there is no upper limit on the amount that you can earn.

content: The Crisis game only works in those browsers that support Unity. In addition, it is quite “heavy”, and loading can take a long time. However, the wait will be rewarded with a vengeance.

content: Ghost Team is a first person shooting simulator. After downloading, the user finds himself among some ancient ruins. He needs to fight off opponents rolling in waves. content: Hold on tight - the rollercoaster ride promises to be challenging. Choose normal or extreme mode and try to complete the track without falling out of the trolley. During the passage of the way, collect money, then to purchase improvements. Use the up or down arrow keys to duck or jump.

At each stage, it displays exactly how many apples you need to collect, and this number is worth striving for. For each level of the school adventure you will get a grade, so try to pass them quickly and collect more apples.

content: High Crazy Games is the most exciting and realistic spinner simulator you’ve ever played. It is even cooler than the real one, because it has a pumping option. After launching, you will see a fidget on the screen, and a vertical scale to the left of it. It captures the force with which it was possible to spin the toy. This is done as follows: a cursor is set on the screen on the image of the spinner, and then it sharply drops down with the mouse. The toy spins, and the level on the scale rises. For the rotation of the fidget rely on points (you can then buy upgrades on them). The longer it spins, the larger the amount. If you manage to spin the spinner at maximum speed, the number of points earned will double.
title: Game Fidget Spinner: High Crazy Games

content: Today you have a responsible job. You need to get to the place of the fire in a certain time and park your truck there. If the car is damaged during the parking process, or if you do not have time to meet the regular time, this will be regarded as a mission failure. With each new level, the task will gradually become more difficult, so be careful.

content: The essence of the game Fitness and Ferb 3d is that one insidious genius decided to attack the galaxy. For a long time he worked on an invention that could destroy the entire world in a few seconds. Your task is to help the heroes save the planet from an armed invasion. Develop a strategy, think over a plan - all this will not be superfluous and will allow one step closer to victory.

content: A game for boys for 10 years old invites you to go on an exciting duck hunt. By controlling the movements of the sight with the arrow keys on the keyboard, try to shoot as many ducks as possible. content: The action of this game for boys for 6 7 years is developed in the water park. Here we decided to arrange a race on inflatable circles. Your character must not only quickly slide, but also perform all sorts of somersaults, jumps with a subfold, and so on. In a word, you need to Crazy Games points by tricks and knocking out all the beachgoers you meet on the way. Everywhere has its charms, although the complexity remains the same.

content: At the very beginning of the game for boys Freddy, you get a job as a security guard at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza. Funny animatronic robots serve visitors here. They create an incredibly positive atmosphere. But only during the day. At night, things begin to happen, from which the blood runs cold. Robots roam freely around the pizzeria, and it is better not to run into them at this time of day. But according to the rules of the game for boys, you need to spend 5 nights with Freddie, monitoring the situation with the help of security cameras. Try not to let the animatronics out of your sight. If they start to move, you should immediately close the door by pressing the appropriate button.

Starting to play for free driving an ultra-modern motorcycle, try not to get into an accident and collect the maximum number of gold badges, which can be used to buy new, more powerful bikes.

But the most important thing is that different bonuses often remain in place of the obstacle. The main goal, as you understand, is to kill opponents by laying mines. Well, if you need games about Naruto for 2 fights, then it’s better to look for something else.

content: Tired of playing Garis mod 3d? No problem! Try for a change to have some fun with the Freddy bear. You will know what fear and horror are. content: Welcome to the third part of the adventures of the night guard of the pizzeria, in which Freddy bear cub lives! Stock up on diapers and start playing. This time the scene has changed a bit. content: Gambling online platformer “Geometry Dash: Journey in Space” offers to control a small lilac ball rushing through the endless universe. From time to time, blood-red rubies float around him. content: The locations of the online game “Geometry Dash: Paper World” look like they were drawn by the inept hand of a first-grader. But don’t let their frivolous graphics fool you. The passage will be difficult. Once you start playing, you won’t be able to relax until the end of the last level. The main character, a cube with eyes, has to jump from platform to platform, moving towards the transition portal to the next stage. The gamer’s task is to help the character not fall into the abyss and run into sharp spikes for free. Management - mouse.

content: Kik Butovsky got his own car. But to ride, like all people through the streets, he is bored, so he had to come up with fun for himself. content: Game process Little pet shop Little Pet Shop is dedicated to the exciting search for animals. It consists of several levels, and on each you will see a new location. The task is to look for all the hidden animals. They can end up in a variety of places. Animals sometimes show up from their hiding places, and thanks to this, therefore, you will be able to understand exactly where you need to move. Move around the location and find animals, and don’t forget to collect decorations that will bring additional reward points. After you complete one task, a new stage will immediately open. At each level of the Little Pet Shop pet shop game, the number of animals to be found increases. If you don’t like the result you get, you can try again and try to Crazy Games more points.

content: Your task in this game looks simple - you just need to load the boxes into the truck. Use the mouse and keyboard to move the forklift, pick up the boxes and put them in the back of the car. This is not as easy as it seems - you will have to think through the sequence of actions in advance, overcome obstacles and carefully handle fragile cargo.

content: The game Madagascar 3 introduces you to one of the characters of the popular cartoon. Granny goes racing across Europe and invites you to join her. Grandma does not like wild animals, and especially Alex and his friends, so she tries to hit them with her huge bag. Are you ready to help her? But keep in mind, the passage of the game Madagascar 3 will require excellent reaction and dexterity from you. It is necessary to hit the good-natured animals with granny’s bag as many times as possible. For each hit you will receive points, to win the game you need to Crazy Games their maximum number. Be careful, because if you miss three times, the game will be over and you will have to start it from the beginning. So do not yawn and try to cheer up the elderly lover of fights, time after time, dropping a heavy bag on the head of these nasty animals. You can play Madagascar 3 both on your own and with your friends, competing with each other in hit accuracy and the number of bonus points Crazy Gamesd.

content: Alex the lion and his friends travel to Africa in a small plane assembled by a team of penguins based on the drawings of the supergenius Kowalski. Help the brave residents of the New York Zoo get to their homeland by sitting at the helm of a small airplane. Control the movements of the plane on which the heroes of the game fly, and try to deliver them to their destination safe and sound.

content: During the game Madagascar rpg around the zoo, a team of penguins led by the Skipper decide on another escape. To do this, they descend into the sewers that run under the zoo. Help the brave birds overcome all the obstacles on their way, get to the exit from the labyrinth of sewer pipes and breathe in the air of true freedom.

content: Games Make a car and drive wherever you want will take you to a world drawn in a school notebook, where a cartoon car overcomes all sorts of obstacles. Well, you will manage it using the arrow keys. The main thing is not to roll over and not fall into a cliff - in this case, the game will be over, and you will lose. Try to keep your balance after jumping and carefully overcome obstacles. Be attentive and patient to master the control of the machine perfectly and rush off on it wherever you want.

content: Aliens have begun an invasion of Earth. The goal of the monsters is to destroy all cities: from the largest to the smallest. You will have to choose - which side are you on? You can play as a huge monster Godzilla and cause crazy damage to cities or try to destroy the alien. Make your choice and go!

content: Today you have to control Iron Man, who flies over the city, destroying enemy helicopters. Using high-tech blasters and ballistic missile launchers in his suit, he successfully repels all enemy attacks. Try to dodge enemy projectiles and use the mouse button to shoot.

content: The events of the game Marvel Superheroes are developing in the near future. Tony Stark (Iron Man) - an outstanding inventor, is engaged in the creation of new weapons. During a routine transport of one of the latest technological innovations to the lab, the terrorist organization Hydra attacks agents working for Iron Man. Hawkeye and other superheroes are trying to repel the enemy’s attacks. You have to help them defeat Stark’s main enemy - the Red Skull.
title: Game Marvel Superheroes

content: Online game Mat Solitaire play for free invites everyone. It has fairly simple rules. The screen displays seven stacks of a different number of cards, the top of which are open. A little higher is the remaining deck and empty spaces for placing the collected combinations. There will be four of them in total, according to the number of suits. First you need to find and move aces there, and then continue the sequence: twos, threes, and so on, until the king.
title: Game Mat Solitaire online for free

content: The ability to generate energy gives a sixteen-year-old boy incredible strengths and abilities. Max will become a member of the organization that his late father created, and will fight the villains. This guy will have to go through many incredible adventures, fight opponents and free the planet from alien invaders.
title: Game Max Steel - city defense

content: After starting this game, you will go straight to the war. Allies are in dire need of help. Your task is to complete various tasks and eventually lead your army to victory. You will need to deftly move through the streets, which are shot through by enemies, attacking opponents yourself.
title: Game Mazinger z Unity 3D

content: An excellent simulator for fans of archery. The castle is under siege, and you have to hold the line for 25 days until reinforcements arrive. Shoot from the bow at the approaching enemies, preventing them from approaching the walls of the fortress. After each repulsed attack, you will have the opportunity to improve your skills and improve your weapons.
title: Game Medieval Soldier Archer

content: During Chess 9 Mind Game you will be able to train your logic and thinking. Here you are invited to try to beat the computer by moving pieces around the board. Each of the figures walks in a special way, try not to confuse. However, if you make a mistake, you simply won’t be able to complete the turn.
title: Game Mind Chess 9

content: In this game you have to control a funny little man. He must run a certain distance, and you need to help the character overcome the obstacles that stand in the way. Their role is played by pipes of different heights. Quickly jump over them, trying to avoid a collision, otherwise you will immediately lose.
title: Game Mouse Mario McBee

content: Find all the little animals that decided to play hide and seek with you! The task is to carefully follow what is happening on the screen. If an animal appears somewhere, quickly click on it. At each level, the number of pets to find increases. Time to pass is limited.
title: Game My little pet shop - hide and seek

content: Managing the characters of the game Naruto for two all the characters, as in most Chinese entertainment, is cumbersome and requires getting used to. But fans of the popular cartoon, based on which this miracle was made, are no strangers. They are already pleased with the fact that for the passage you can choose any fighter present in the mentioned series. Well, and engage in endless combat 1 on 1.
title: Game Naruto for two all heroes

content: The game New need for speed 2015 invites you to become a stuntman of the world famous circus. Choose one of the supercars that are in the garage and go to the arena. The organizers of the circus have created a unique track with a huge number of various jumps, where you can show your abilities and talent as a racer. Try to perform as many breathtaking stunts as you can before your car runs out of fuel. For each of the completed tricks you will receive a cash reward that you can use to buy new cars or improve the performance of your existing one. In the Need for Speed ​​2015 game, you can play alone or together with your best friend, competing in the ability to drive a sports car and the complexity of the stunts that you will perform.
title: Game New Need for speed 2015

content: The new Winx Bloomix games invite you on an exciting journey through a magical dimension, during which, among other things, you will have to fight the insidious Trix and their minions. Wicked witches have come up with new traps for the Winx fairies and hope to lure them there. But, thanks to your help, the insidious plans of the villains will not come true. If you try, the Trix will be defeated in a fair fight, unable to withstand the magical power of Bloomix.
title: Game New Winx Bloomix

content: In this game you will go to conquer the seas. Control your ship by moving it across the water in any direction. If you meet an enemy ship on the way, boldly attack it by selecting the desired function from the menu of the bottom panel. Your task is to completely destroy the opponent’s ships.
title: Game of Thrones - Horror of the Ironborn

content: So, you are waiting for another adventure based on your favorite series. This time at the disposal of users will be a warship with dragons on sails. In the process of passing, you will have to establish the dominance of your clan over the sea. The first stage will be educational. True, all the tips are given in English, but it’s easy to figure it out.
title: Game of Thrones 3 - Martells

content: The game will appeal to fans of knights and tournaments. At the very beginning, you can choose the mode: for one or for two users. In the process of passing, you will have to take part in the tournament of equestrian knights. The most interesting thing is that both riders and horses suffer in fights, although they have to fight with blunt weapons. There is a lot of blood in the game.
title: Game of Thrones 4 - House Bet

content: If you love virtual battles, it’s time to launch this wonderful game. Here you will find an exciting process, during which you will need to fight with rivals, strong and not very strong. Try to cope with all the opponents that come against you. It will be really interesting!
title: Game of Thrones Tournament in Harrenhal

content: Gamers are offered a very unusual performance of the popular game. The view in it is from the first person, and the action takes place in a three-dimensional maze. As before, you need to collect vitamins and avoid encounters with monsters in the maze. To help the player is given a map located in the upper left corner of the screen. It depicts the labyrinth itself, all the characters and tablets.
title: Game Pacman Maze 3D

content: Today the puppies have master classes in rescue missions. The rider starts first. He will race in his police car along the track. All he has to do is collect nine little ducks. Every time when, together with the racer, you collect the first three, a truck will drive up to you and the ducks will jump into the body.
title: Game Paw Patrol 2

content: To successfully complete this game, you will need to get together and get ready to press the mouse button. One of the dogs will appear in front of you. You need to quickly find the same puppy at the bottom of the screen, and click on it with the mouse. Before the end of the level, you need to find as many identical dogs as possible.
title: Game Paw Patrol 2 Find Your Mate

content: Help the paw patrol collect as much food as possible. At your disposal is a special device from which chops, chicken legs and other goodies are thrown out. It remains only to choose the right flight path so that the food is right inside the fire tower. Time to pass is limited.
title: Game Paw Patrol catch food

content: Dogs from the Paw Patrol always try to complete their missions perfectly. In this game, you are invited to help cartoon characters cope with new tasks. Choose any of the characters to start an exciting process. You will be asked, for example, to drive a car and save ducklings or put out a fire.
title: Game Paw Patrol for boys for 5 years

content: The game Peppa Pig builds a house is a kind of constructor, where every kid can test himself as a builder. Today the heroine decided to please her father and build a small house for him. But everything turned out to be not as easy for Peppa as she expected. Now the pig is asking you for help in such a difficult but important matter. In order to simplify the task, tips and advice from a real specialist are waiting for you in the game. You can play for free and build a new house.
title: Game Peppa Pig builds a house

content: Do you want to try your hand at firefighting? During the game Planes fire and water you will have such an opportunity. So, from the name it is already clear that you will have to fly a special aircraft that helps to extinguish forest fires. All you need to play Airplanes is the ability to maintain altitude with two buttons and a little attention. You take off from the base with a small supply of water on board. In the nearest reservoir you collect full tanks of water (just slip on the surface of the lake) and empty them over the fire (spacebar). Still worth collecting coins. The assessment of passing the level depends on them. By the way, there are several of them in the game. They differ from each other in the complexity of the flight and the amount of available water. You can play this game online for free.
title: Game Planes fire and water

content: Equestria is in danger, and you need to urgently take action to save it! To do this, help Applejack find apples while playing Pony 5. In it, you will find an analogue of the well-known thimbles: there are three covers on the table, and under one of them there is an apple. To win, you need to point to the correct cover three times in a row. If you make a mistake these three times, then the pony game, unfortunately, will end in a loss. By the way, it provides two levels of difficulty that affect the speed of movement of the “thimbles”.
title: Game Pony 5

content: The heroes of the game Pony Frozen - Anna and Christoph, go in search of Elsa, a beautiful princess, who, due to a terrible curse, retired to a snowy castle somewhere in the expanses of the northern lands. Elsa has a unique gift to freeze everything around, but, unfortunately, it is very dangerous for others. Help the brave couple go through all the trials on the way, find out where the castle of the frosty princess is located and convince the heroine of Frozen to return home as soon as possible.
title: Game Pony Frozen

content: The process of playing Princess Pony Twilight Sparkle will perfectly train your memory and attention. Cute horses have decided to have a holiday, and you need to help them decorate the place for the celebration. To do this, remember how the elements are arranged here, and then also arrange them in a limited time.
title: Game Pony Princess Twilight Sparkle

content: One of the most serious criminals in the entire galaxy was about to destroy the Rangers, using the services of the monsters that he collected from the universe. You have to fight back the attacking enemies in order to prevent the capture of the Earth. If you allow yourself to be defeated, you will not only lose, but also give the enemy the entire planet to plunder.
title: Game Power Rangers Duel Megaforce

content: During the game Power Rangers Megaforce 2, in addition to killing opponents, you need to collect plasma balls that will give extra points. At the end of each level, a boss will be waiting for you. After a short dialogue, it must be destroyed using the entire available arsenal of weapons.
title: Game Power Rangers Megaforce 2

content: Creepy monsters from prehistoric times have suddenly appeared in the modern world. Dinosaurs launch an attack on cities, villages and strategic fortifications. Your task is to try to hold the defense by all possible means. You have access to powerful modern equipment and ammunition, allowing you to build a reliable line of defense.
title: Game Powerful Defense

content: The game “Pro Tribs io” is based on the eternal opposition of three elements: water, earth and fire. At the very beginning, you can choose which of the elements to play, and then your character will take on the appropriate appearance. Tribs IO rules are a bit unusual. As in other io projects, here you need to kill rivals to earn points and break through to the first place in the ranking, as well as multiply by division to get your tribe. But in “Tribs io” you can not destroy anyone. Water acts only on fire, fire on earth, and earth on water.
title: Game Pro tribs.io

content: A very unusual first-person shooter game. She has original graphics without frills, but cool special effects and tasks. At the first level, you need to kill a certain number of opponents. Ammunition is limited. The next level will begin even when you kill the enemies at the cost of your life. At the second stage, the task becomes more difficult and you have to run.
title: Game Prototype 2

content: Thanks to the very realistic graphics, you will instantly feel like you are driving a real Formula 1 car.
title: Game Racer Ho Ping Tang

content: During Racing 2014 you will have to get behind the wheel of a modern F1 car and show the best time at the finish line. In the course of the race, you will have to leave behind the other participants in the competition and be the first to cross the coveted line. Match nitro symbols to speed up on the straight sections of the track. Between races, don’t forget to upgrade your car with the money you earn.
title: Game Racing 2014

content: While playing Racing 3D Driving Simulator 2, you have the opportunity to drive through the streets of a huge metropolis in an ultra-modern sports car. Try to accelerate the iron monster to maximum speed without getting into an accident. It is especially pleasant to play the 2nd part of the 3D driving simulator, because you have to drive one of the best models of the famous Italian automobile manufacturer Ferrari. The authors of this wonderful toy managed to create a unique simulator that will allow you to fully enjoy the trip along the wide avenues of a huge city, thanks to excellent graphics and sound.
title: Game Racing 3d driving simulator 2

content: During the game Racing Cars 2 you will be able to participate in the very competitions about which the famous cartoon was filmed. To begin with, you will be asked to play Lightning McQueen, but as you progress, other characters will open up, after which you can choose a new car for yourself.
title: Game Racing cars 2

content: With the help of the Hot Wheels Racing game for two, you will get a unique opportunity to measure your strength with your best friend on the football field. Having at your disposal small but nimble cars, you need to Crazy Games as many goals as possible against the opponent. Before the start of the race, decide on the management, and forward - to new victories.
title: Game Racing for two Hot Wheels

content: The graphics are reminiscent of games for old eight-bit consoles. The plot is also very simple: Godzilla has attacked the city and is trying to destroy it. The user had the honor to control this particular monster. However, management is too strong a word. The gamer can only jump up and shoot fire. The goal is the destruction of buildings and the destruction of military equipment.
title: Game Radiation Godzilla

content: You have to drive a powerful truck carrying radioactive waste. Take a training course and prove your skills as a first-class driver. Pick up the cargo and deliver it to the burial place. Each new level starts from the parking point of the previous mission. This requires precise and careful driving.
title: Game Radioactive Trucks

content: Rally 2015 offers you new tracks and super powerful cars to race. Warm up the engine and start winding lap after lap around the track. Use arrow keys to control. By pressing the Shift button, you can enter a turn with a skid. By winning, you get access to new cars and even steeper tracks.
title: Game Rally 2015

content: With Red Balloon 3 you have to help a funny balloonist. You need to overcome many obstacles, flying over the city, and have time to collect all the bonuses you meet on the way. Control the character with the mouse, constantly clicking the left button to climb or releasing it to lower the hero.
title: Game Red balloon 3

content: The addictive game Rise of the Ravenous Machines invites you to immerse yourself in incredible adventures on wheels. You will be able to drive powerful cars, fight opponents and become the winner in a dangerous fight. Do not forget to periodically improve your car to make it even cooler.
title: Game Rise of the Predatory Machines

content: Today you will control a robot that is protecting its race from villains somewhere in a parallel universe. His enemies are the same iron monsters, but they just didn’t work out with their minds. Killers do only what the master orders. And this villain wants to destroy the race of the protagonist. The task in the game is to prove that everyone has the right to life.
title: Game Robots of Living Steel

content: In this exciting game you have to help a cute dog who needs to collect a lot of bones. Move forward and only forward, jumping up if necessary. Try to avoid dangers, otherwise, if you encounter a trap, the game will immediately end. After the loss, if desired, you can restart the process.
title: Game Rocket Paw Patrol

content: The main character of this game is a mischievous old woman who escaped from a madhouse. This is where you will be in control. This is not difficult, but it will require a good reaction and attention. The point is to run as far as possible. Points are Crazy Gamesd for knocked down pedestrians. You can play in turns with friends, competing in the set of points.
title: Game Run with a crazy old lady

content: Do you feel an acute lack of adrenaline in a series of dull everyday life? Running Fred will make up for the lack of this miraculous substance in your body. This time the restless boy decided to do parkour on the roofs of the skyscrapers of the virtual metropolis. Your task is not to let him fall out of there before the end of the current level.
title: Game Running Fred - parkour

content: The protagonist of the game Running Fred 5 years ago was just a boy. Since then, his hobby - running around the castle from death, has turned into a professional occupation. He still rushes through the labyrinths (though not in the castle anymore) and collects treasures. The task of the user is to press the right button in time and Crazy Games the maximum number of points.
title: Game Running Fred 5

content: Online action “Running Fred in the Army” will take you to the military unit. Very soon, the main character will have to go to perform a difficult task, but first you will have to undergo training. To do this, follow all the commands of the training stage. The game has three locations - camp, desert and snowy wastelands. For passing you will be given points. But be extremely careful, there are many dangers around: swamps, avalanches and quicksands. To control the hero, just use the arrows or the letters “W”, “D”, “S” and “A”, to jump, use the space bar, and to climb, press “X”.
title: Game Running Fred in the Army

content: Samurai Red Ranger continues his fight against evil. A real warrior is not afraid of any obstacles, no one and nothing is able to stop him. The goal he pursues is to catch and punish the bad guys. Help him complete the mission to clean up the city from criminals. During the battles, the hero will demonstrate good parkour skills.
title: Game Samurai 3d

content: In this interesting game you have to control a brave boy who is constantly moving forward. Along the way, it is proposed to collect coins that bring bonus points and fight enemies. A collision with an enemy will result in the loss of a game life, and you have three of them in total. Don’t miss out on various bonus items.
title: Game School defender for boys for 5 years

content: In this race, you will have complete freedom of action: choose your favorite car and test it for speed and durability. But for this you need to build your own training ground with jumps and obstacles. You can also drive a huge ball across the field or hunt a running person. Use arrow keys to control.
title: Game Scrap Metal 2012

content: Enter the ring and fight with your opponent on equal terms. You have the option to choose the skirmish mode. Thrashing the computer is fun, but it’s much more fun to meet another player who has more cunning, strikes more often, and dodges attacks more correctly than an artificial intelligence going on a frontal attack.
title: Game Shadow Fight 2

content: The fight here is for the belt of the world boxing champion, so gather all your strength into a fist and prove that you are a worthy opponent. First you need to learn how to accurately strike. After all, with the transition to the next game level, the rules of battle become tougher. Remember, if you defeat the enemy with a technical knockout, then the victory will look much more spectacular.
title: Game Shadow Fight 2 Duel

content: The game Shark Killer 3 presents you with a powerful marine predator, which has no equal in the ocean in terms of bloodthirstiness. But today people have learned to resist these monsters. Therefore, you need to play carefully. By controlling a shark, you can eat everything around, but you should beware of fishing schooners that throw nets and even dynamite into the sea.
title: Game Shark Killer 3

content: This game is for connoisseurs of logic puzzles. Your task is simply to assemble a picture from a variety of fragments, which depicts Shaun the Sheep and his friends. To restore the image, use the left mouse button. Grab the desired fragment with the cursor and drag it to the playing field. Try to keep within the allotted time.
title: Game Shaun the Sheep on a hang glider

content: During the game “Sheep go home in Paris” users will have to do the construction of the city. To do this, they have at their disposal a workshop where you can choose what you want to build at the moment. You can complete tasks or play in free mode. Use the mouse to control.
title: Game Sheep go home in Paris

content: During the game Shooting Helicopters you will control a combat rotorcraft, performing command tasks. You are armed with laser weapons, but you can additionally buy yourself a rapid-fire machine gun, rocket launcher and even a flamethrower. The task is to destroy the accumulation of enemy equipment and defeat the base where the main enemy troops are concentrated.
title: Game Shooting Helicopters

content: Shooting Adventure game will allow you to take part in the fighting during the First World War. Fight your way through the hordes of enemies on the Western Front, complete task after task, reclaiming the territory captured by the enemy. Don’t forget to look at the sky - the enemy can attack from there too. Use all available weapons to win the battle on the front lines.
title: Game Shooting rpg

content: Have you been playing with the railway and trains for a long time? In our game, you can remember this fun, and even engage in cargo transportation. The task of the gamer is to switch the arrows in time and direct the train along the desired route so that he can collect the cargo, take it to the right place, and also collect the reward due. The number of wagons will grow.
title: game siding

content: The hero of the game Similar to Subway Surf is professionally engaged in one of the most unique sports - parkour. Extreme occupation requires the athlete to be in excellent physical shape and reaction. Test your abilities and feel like a real parkour player. At each stage of the game, you have to go through a section of the track passing on the roofs of skyscrapers in a limited time. Try not only to overcome all the obstacles on the way, but also to collect magical Subway Surf medallions that turn you into a real superhero.
title: Game Similar to Subway Surf

content: Many people like Lego, and if you love it too, then it’s time to launch this exciting game. Here it is proposed to build your own city from the details of the designer. There are many different elements at your disposal, so you should show your imagination at the maximum level. The city will be great!
title: Game similar to The Sims Lego

content: In this game you will find a huge number of crystals of different shapes and colors. The task is to swap adjacent elements, trying to form combinations of three or more identical stones. If you succeed, a combination of identical crystals will disappear and give you bonus points.
title: Game Simple Crystals

content: Princess Sofia decided to play cards with the wizard Cedric. You need to help the girl beat the opponent. The essence of the game is simple: you need to guess what cards the opponent has. If you select the correct option, Cedric will give these cards to the heroine. But if you make a mistake, you have to take a card from the deck.
title: Game Sofia the First in the floating palace

content: The famous skateboarder Kolakao, thanks to the miracle machine of his friend Professor, got into intergalactic skateboard competitions. Help the earthling win in unique competitions by controlling his spaceskate. On the way, do not forget to collect prize stars and cans of the athlete’s favorite drink.
title: Game Space Skateboarder Unity 3D

content: Welcome to the extreme car racing tournament. Choose one of the characters in the game and go to the racing track. Try to complete each of the stages as quickly as possible and earn the main cash prize. Use the money won for participating in races to buy new, more powerful cars.
title: Game Speed ​​Challenge

content: Three-dimensional game Spiderman 2014 will take you to a huge metropolis, where you have to help the superhero fly around the city. But ahead of you is not just a flight. You need to collect all the tokens with the image of Spider-Man and try not to crash into any buildings. Control your character with the arrow keys and try to complete the task as quickly as possible.
title: Game Spiderman 2014

content: The Spin Your Spinner game is a simulation of the popular three-blade spinner, which is customary to spin in your hands to calm down or just for fun.
title: Game spin your spinner

content: This spinner simulator is primarily designed for girls. It is impossible to pump over the technical parameters of the toy in it, but you can bring beauty. In part, it is already present in the form of blades of an unusual shape and a contrasting core. But you can create a really unique fidget (and more than one!) using the menu at the bottom of the screen. There are plates with different decor options. You can change the color of the spinner, add a pattern on top, interspersed with contrasting shades and a new core. When the decorations are finished, move on to using the toy for its intended purpose. Try to spin it as much as possible and set a personal speed record. Thanks to its unusual shape, the spinner looks like a huge flower in motion.
title: Game spinner hero

content: Patrick gets on an ominous ship, where he needs to find SpongeBob. Move around the locations, collecting coins and exploring the most hidden corners. Sometimes ghosts will jump out of the darkness, they can be dealt with with a flashlight. But note that its charge is limited. However, it fills up quickly.
title: game SpongeBob on the ship

content: Game for girls SpongeBob Squarepants is quite suitable for boys too. It has a neutral plot and develops logical thinking very well. In the process, you need to quickly and carefully think through all the movements of the character. The level is considered successfully completed when SpongeBob Squarepants collects all the trash and bonuses on the table. Jellyfish scurrying back and forth only provide additional points, but no more. The sharpness is added by the limited time to complete the level.
title: Game Spongebob Squarepants for girls

content: The Krusty Krab and SpongeBob SquarePants have built a defensive tower in order to protect themselves from the attack of the treacherous Plankton’s army. You have to help the guys repel the attacks of the enemy. But first you need to correctly place the defensive guns in order to prevent the enemy from even getting close to the tower.
title: game spongebob tower defense

content: Sports games 3D invite you to plunge into the world of football champions and become a recognized star in them. Intercept the ball from the opponent, and then try to break into his half of the field or pass the ball to another player on your team. Choose the moment and hit the gate. Show your true style and protect the sporting honor of your team.
title: Game Sports 3D

content: Fantastic shooter with RPG elements about the adventures of a stalker in the exclusion zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. You have to complete several difficult tasks, making your way through the abandoned territory. But be careful, there are a lot of mutants and artifact hunters around. Keep your weapons ready and don’t relax.
title: Game Stalker Gas Sector

content: Today you have the opportunity to sit in the cockpit and complete several tasks to destroy the enemy. You have to fight enemy fighters, destroy ground targets and follow other instructions from the command. Use the mouse to control. Left button - fire at the enemy.
title: Game Stalker in the air

content: Together with the famous captain of the ship “Ghost” Kanan Jerus and his team, you have to go on a dangerous mission. By controlling the movement of the ship, try to break through the protective formations of the imperial troops, knock out a transport ship and free one of the leaders of the republican underground from captivity.
title: Game Star Wars episode 4

content: While playing Star Wars Episode 7, you meet the crew of a rebel ship with the formidable name “Ghost”. Over the years, the brave men under the command of Kanan Yarus have been destroying the bases of the emperor’s troops and performing other dangerous tasks of the rebel leadership. By controlling the movements of the Ghost, try to destroy as many ships of the imperial fleet as possible.
title: Game Star Wars episode 7

content: The empire built a huge warship. Your task is to get there and save your failed agents. Make your way into the very bowels of the secret base and let all the villains regret that they got in your way. But remember, you have to run through endless corridors, climb walls, jump on numerous platforms.
title: Game Star Wars space agent

content: An interesting twist awaits the gamer at the very beginning. After all, the game offers him a choice of character: Obama or McCain! And after that, it will be necessary, no less, to save the world from terrorism with the direct participation of one of the politicians. Third person view. Moving from screen to screen, kill all the terrorists, collect weapons and ammo. You can bring down people and even birds.
title: Game Strike Force Heroes 2 - Stars in Action

content: In this game, you have to control a character who is trying to run through the underground catacombs, collecting gold coins. But the road is full of dangers and unexpected obstacles. Some of them you need to jump over, and under the rest you need to slip. Use the arrow keys to control and take the hero to the end of the level.
title: Game Subway surfers run

content: In this game, you will have the opportunity to control a superhero who has decided to test his new suit that gives him the ability to fly. But it turned out that while he could not gain great height, which means that he would have to fly around large houses so as not to hit the wall. But it is possible to accelerate by clicking on the right mouse button.
title: Game Superheroes in Zd

content: Quite an interesting game where you have to meet in a duel with your best friend or a computer. Controlling your character, try to cut the rope on which a huge ball dangles. But you need to do this so that the ball falls on the opponent’s head. And then you will win. Use the A and D keys to control.
title: Game sushi battle for two 3d

content: This game is one of the analogues of the popular counter. Open any location you like and measure your strength with gamers from all over the world. And if you want to fight with your friends, create your own map and invite them to the game. Show all your skills and prove that you are one of the best fighters in the world.
title: Game SWAT vs zombies unity 3D

content: During this game you will go on an exciting journey. Start an adventure, move around the location, communicate with other characters and find useful items. Of course, battles are also waiting for you, during which you will need to destroy evil enemies. Attack opponents and defeat them, trying to increase your skill level.
title: Game Swords and Sandals Online

content: Syndicate 2012 was developed in the first-person fantasy action genre. The action takes place in the distant year 2069. Power is no longer held by the states – it has been shared among numerous syndicates, constantly fighting for control of the markets. The main war is between three corporations. The plot of the game Syndicate is built on the widespread use of electronics. The fighters have at their disposal not only conventional weapons, they can break the laws of the digital world in which they are located, destroying enemies with the help of hacker techniques.
title: Game Syndicate 2012

content: Teenage mutant ninja turtles game invites you to help Michelangelo in the fight against monster robots. They are always trying to escape from their “pen”, but you need to act as quickly as possible and stop them. You will need the arrow keys for this. Press them in the correct order and then the escaped characters of the arcade game will be stopped. Be careful, because those mutant monsters that break free will certainly attack Michelangelo and try to bite him.
title: Game Teenage mutant ninja turtles

content: The turtle brothers decided to have some fun and went to the skateboarding area. But even here they were not allowed to rest in peace: mutant teenagers were attacked by warriors from the Nogi clan. While driving a skateboard, help one of the heroes of the game repulse the attacks of the attackers, and don’t forget to collect all the prize points for performing tricks.
title: Game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - all on the boards

content: Nightmare Krang managed to steal a mutagen from a secret laboratory, which they plan to use to create an army of mutants. According to their insidious plan, it should capture the entire planet. Help one of the game’s characters defeat the guards, consisting of android robots, collect all the containers with a dangerous chemical and break the evil plans of the aliens.
title: Game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - collect and win

content: Talented ninja turtles are trying to demonstrate their excellent physical shape. This time their choice fell on skateboards. content: After starting the Ninja Turtles adventure game, you will control Raphael, who is forced to face a huge number of enemies. content: The game The Lord of the Rings 2014 Shadow of Mordor invites you to repel the attack of the orcs, controlling the elf archer. content: Game Truckers 2015 gives you the opportunity to get behind the wheel of a huge truck and deliver various goods. In this case, your first task is to transport a heavy army tank. content: You will find a game about a very cheerful and kind old man. Uncle Grandpa offers to take part in fun quests with an excellent plot and bright graphics. Together with him you will have to fight the horrors of the night, transform into some fairy-tale character and go on a journey.

content: An unusual race will take place at the zoo today. Local animals decided to drive on small cars.

Try to collect more money along the way. And this is only the first stage of the game.

content: Refresh the design of this boring truck. Use all the available paints to get creative and create some cool options. content: Gambling online platformer “Geometry Dash: Cube Adventures” consists of 21 levels of varying difficulty. At the start of the game, they all open for free and immediately. But, if you have never played Geometry Dash up to this point, it is better to start the passage from the beginning, gradually moving towards the end. The main character is a cartoon cube, running through a location full of all sorts of obstacles. It is necessary to stumble just once, and he flies out of the game. The goal of the user is to help the cube get to the portal-transition to the next stage safe and sound.

content: The locations of the online game “Geometry Dash: Dungeon Escape” are a gloomy, confusing labyrinth. Its numerous corridors are littered with traps, like a hedgehog with needles. It’s worth hitting even one when the game is over. The task of the gamer is to help the main character, the cube, escape from the gloomy place to freedom. To do this, you need to find the yellow door - the transition to the next stage. To play, use the arrow keys: “left”, “right” - move around the screen, “up” - jump.

content: The protagonist of the gambling online arcade - a black ball, goes in search of treasures. You can keep him company for free. The game location looks like an ancient Indonesian temple with a lot of artifacts. The task of the character is to collect as many of them as possible. The difficulty is that the ancient monks, leaving their native monastery, set up many traps inside it. It is necessary to please one, and the game will immediately end. Help the ball not to die prematurely and explore the entire ancient temple. To play, use the mouse.

content: He prepared the biggest difficulties for users when passing the online project “Geometry Dash” level 5. If you’re a weakling, it will make your eyes bleed. Only users with steel ropes instead of nerves and ultra-modern mice are able to overcome everything that the game will present them. By the way, access to it is provided for free. When you start playing, you will understand that it’s not about geometry, but about your reaction. You need to click the mouse in time so that the character, nicknamed Dash, has time to jump over obstacles.

content: The online project “Geometry dash subzero” quickly became popular. Schoolchildren around the world are fighting for the right to play it, but only you can do it for free. Be proud and download.

content: Geometry Dash: Neon Jump is a new addition to the Geometry Dash series of gambling platform games. To go through it to the end, you will need attentiveness. Use the mouse to control. Press her left button every time the main character - a cartoon cube, there will be some kind of obstacle. It will be difficult to play because the terrain of locations is changing all the time. Just get used to the horizontal passage, as it will be replaced by a vertical movement from the bottom up. You will deal with him, and the character is already floating in the air.

content: The gameplay of the online game “Geometry Dash for Girls” is no different from the same arcade games for boys. Unless the design of the location is brighter. You have to play in exactly the same way: by clicking the mouse in time, help the cartoon cube to overcome obstacles for free. Passage includes two dozen levels. First, the main character moves on the ground, and then soars into the air on a small painted rocket. There are also enough dangers in the sky, so try not to lose your vigilance until the very end of the game.

Money is dropped for each killed monster, they can be spent on upgrading a brave car. Get to the helicopter and leave this dangerous place.

content: The crew of the famous spaceship “Ghost” went on another dangerous mission. Help Captain Kanan Jaruss and his team overcome a huge distance and destroy the warships of the emperor’s troops. Chase the space courier ship and take the secret information to the rebel base.

content: In this game, together with a funny kolobok, you go on an exciting journey through a fabulous galaxy. Help the brave hero collect the maximum amount of sweets at each of the game stages. Also, don’t forget to get to the key, with which you can open the portal to the next location.

The kids will really like this photo-work, and they will definitely invite you to their wedding as a designer.

content: The game House Cleaning puts you in front of a rather difficult task. We urgently need to put things in order in the room after gatherings with girlfriends. An online game about gladiators allows you to enjoy spectacular, exciting battles, participate in various tournaments and championships, winning money and fame. Develop your school, unlock new opportunities and fight for control of the empire.

On the left of the game screen there are things for the guy, and on the right - for the girl. You can choose any jacket, scarf, shoes. Just click on the option you like, and the clothes will appear on the characters.

content: Optimus Prime sent one of his motorbots deep into the depths of Antarctica, where he needs to find nine parts from a long-lost superdrill. Help the brave hero of this game to get through the snowy mountains, collect the maximum number of energy cubes and find all the parts of the drill.

content: The robot-hero and savior of the galaxy unsuccessfully calculated the trajectory of his intergalactic flight, collided with one of the satellites and ended up on an unknown planet. With the help of a huge alien flower, try to throw the android as close as possible to the rescue station.

content: Goat Simulator game invites you to a small abandoned farm, the inhabitants of which need help, attention and care. Due to the absence of the owner, the local economy has long collapsed, the animals have dispersed, and almost all the plants have died. You have to work hard to restore order here and turn a run-down farm into one of the best agricultural companies in the country. You can play the Goat Simulator game both on your own and in the company of your girlfriends, together ennobling the territory and caring for the living creatures.
