content: Today you will meet a sniper girl who is entrusted with a responsible task. Before starting the mission, carefully read the instructions to know which targets need to be eliminated. Use the space bar to turn on the optical sight. The mouse is needed in order to aim and shoot.
title: Kogama: Pirate Adventure

content: Launching the game Plants vs Zombies Garden Warfare will introduce you to Dave the weirdo who survived the zombie apocalypse. Now you need to help him cope with the onslaught of monsters that keep coming and going to fresh blood. You also need to attack them with the help of existing plants in order to avoid the destruction of the fortification on the rock. The game consists of a huge number of levels, and each one has new types of zombies with special characteristics. In difficult situations, you can click on the image of a sunflower, which uses a whole handful of meteorites against zombies.
title: Kogama: Plants Vs Zombie

content: The school building is under threat. Former students - losers, disliked the “alma mater” so much that they decided to destroy it to the ground. You also study at this school and do not want to give it to hooligans. That is why, taking a pistol and sitting on the roof, you shoot back from the attackers. For each kill, a monetary reward is due, which can be spent on ammunition.
title: Kogama: Shooter

content: This original puzzle game featuring SpongeBob is a bit like a construction set. In it, you will receive various geometric shapes and place them on the screen so that you get a stable design. You need to build a high tower that should not fall. If you succeed, great, you will be able to move on to more difficult levels.
title: Kogama: Spongebob Parkour

content: In this game, you need to collect all the gems in the room and do it within a limited amount of time. As you progress through the levels, you will have to face many enemies, solve several puzzles and perform other unusual actions in order to find a way out.
title: Kogama: Temple Escape

content: A loud fight, or rather, a loud tournament in fights without rules between cartoon characters is waiting for you in this game. Stretch your fingers, clean your mouse, check your keyboard and join the fight! First, choose who you will manage. Several characters from the most popular cartoons are available. Unfortunately, the game does not provide a mode for two.
title: Krabby Patty Crisis

content: After launching “Krew io”, the user will be on the deck of a pirate ship. From all sides the ship is attacked by enemies. Fortunately, you are not alone on deck. Krev.io is a multiplayer game, and at the same time there are a lot of people at the location. You can defeat the enemy only if you act together.
title: Krew.io games

content: What programmers will not come up with to diversify the most common toys and make their brainchild unlike other similar products. This is how the game Mahjong Fruit appeared. But just putting pictures of a certain theme on the chips was not enough, so it was also endowed with a developing function. After all, young children, looking for the same chips, will be able to simultaneously study a variety of fruits and vegetables.
title: Kris Mahjong

content: While playing Do Your Own Hair you will meet a cute girl. She decided to change the image, and you have to help in this charmer. To get started, work on her hair, using the proposed tools for this: hair dryer, scissors, curlers, iron. It is also worth adding cute hair accessories and changing the color. But the game for girls is not limited to hairstyles alone, in it you can also take care of the makeup of the heroine and choose her outfit. To apply makeup, use any decorative cosmetics, dwelling on the shades you like. There are a lot of outfits here, choose what fits into the overall image. After you finish working on the image, two pictures will be displayed on the screen: “before” and “after”. Evaluate the result of your efforts! Doing your own hair is incredibly fun.
title: Kristoffs Hair Salon

content: An interesting game that will require players to be smart and precise. You and your opponent will find yourself on a white square, gradually breaking up into smaller parts. The task is to jump on the remaining pieces of the platform and hold out as long as possible. Use the arrow keys to control.
title: Krunker.io

content: The Fight Simulator game is designed for those who love a variety of fights. You need to choose a character for which you will play, and then go with him to the place of the battle. The fight can take place in a bar or in any other location. Hit your opponent to eventually take away all his health points. You can play with both a virtual opponent and a real friend. Try not to succumb to enemy attacks, otherwise you may lose. Dodge blows and don’t forget about the possibility of combo attacks.
title: Kung Fu Fighting

content: After starting this game, you will open the original graphics editor, in which you can create a variety of images. There are several “pencil” shapes here, some of which allow you to draw animated lines. Choose the right shape, as well as the color you like, by combining different options.
title: Kylie Jenner Halloween Face Art

content: The Jurassic Park 3 game invites you on a long journey into the past with the famous professor who created the time machine. Unfortunately, the invention of the hero of the game is out of order, and now you have to defend the scientific station from nightmarish monsters who dream of getting to you and your friends.
title: L.A. REX

content: During the Supermarket Shopping game you have to help the fairy Stella get ready for the wedding ceremony. To do this, you need to go to the store and buy there the things that she will need for the wedding. There is a limited time allotted for this, and you should hurry up, otherwise Stella will be very upset.
title: Lady Mommy Goes Shopping

content: The girl and the guy are walking in the park, and they really like to spend time together. A couple in love is going to kiss a lot, but it is very undesirable to catch someone’s eye. If someone notices the kiss, the game will immediately end with you losing. Therefore, act as carefully as possible.
title: Ladybug First Date

content: During the game for two Makeup, two pretty girls appear on the screen in front of you. They are preparing for the school ball and can not put themselves in order. Help the beauties apply shadows, tint lips and blush cheeks. Then you need to pick up fashionable hairstyles for your girlfriends and try on ball gowns.
title: Ladybug Glittery Makeup

content: Become a hairdresser for a while and make the heroine of the game an excellent fashionable hairstyle. First you need to wash her hair and apply useful products to them. Next, shape the styling and choose a pretty color of curls that is perfect for a fashionista. The final stage is applying makeup and choosing a stylish outfit.
title: Ladybug Halloween Hairstyles

content: Cool Racing 3D games are created according to the plot of the movie about Luke Hobbs, driving through the streets of Rio de Janeiro. Discover the rewind function and get another opportunity to get around a dangerous turn or avoid a collision. Objects on the street can collapse or explode, changing the track and putting up new obstacles.
title: Lambo Drifter

content: If you like cool and powerful cars and everything connected with them, this wonderful game was created especially for you. It can completely remake the latest Lamborghini model. Change the color of the body, wheels, windows and even apply stylish airbrushing to the car. Create as many different variants of the sports car as you want.
title: Lamborghini Car Drifting

content: An ice cream company decided to paint their cars in original colors. Representatives of the company organized a competition. The winner will receive a small reward and the opportunity to come up with a design for Volkswagen transporters. Try to create an original coloring for your car and win this competition.
title: Lamborghini Coloring Book

content: Cute cartoon princess Elsa always strives to dress up in cute outfits and do cool hairstyles. This time she decided to turn to you for help. Choose from the proposed range of the most fashionable little things and create an attractive image for the heroine of the game. It is also worth doing makeup!
title: Land Vs Sea Moana Vs Elsa

content: Help cute Rapunzel to clean up. Your task is to make her a great hairdo, as well as choose an outfit and jewelry. First, take care of the heroine’s hair. Wash and dry them, then use hairdressing tools to get the cutest result possible. You can even cut the princess’s hair.
title: Late To School Hairstyles

content: Any student of the school of monsters wants to look attractive, and Bonita Femur was no exception. Work on her unusual multi-colored hair to eventually shape them into a cute hairstyle. Arm yourself with scissors, curlers and other useful tools - with their help, styling will be unique. Don’t forget your make-up and attire.
title: Latina Princess Real Haircuts

content: masks
title: Latina Princess Spa Day

content: An exciting shooter with a very unusual entourage. All the characters in it are made of paper, which does not prevent them from fighting fiercely. You will control one of the fighters, whose task is to clear the building from terrorists. And you will shoot directly from the finger. In this game, the main thing is to dodge enemy shots and collect bonuses as the battle progresses.
title: Left 4 Dead

content: After starting this game, you will be transported to Ancient Egypt, where you will meet Cleopatra. This queen is used to always looking attractive, and now she is waiting for your help. You need to create an outfit for her by selecting the elements of clothing and their color. Also take care of the hair and makeup of this femme fatale.
title: Legendary Fashion: Cleopatra

content: The game Tudor Dress Up invites you to invent characters in a medieval style. First, decide who you want to create - a guy or a girl. Next, proceed to the selection of elements of the image, and you can change the color of any thing at your discretion. If desired, you can even add patterns that make clothes even more original.
title: Legendary Fashion: Greek Goddess

content: Game Goblins war of clans tells about the great confrontation between individual families in the country of the ancient Vikings. As the leader of one of them, you will have to think over a strategy to protect your possessions. Create your own army and earn experience to gain skills and magical powers to repel enemy attacks.
title: Legendary Warrior Globin Rush

content: While playing Lego Avengers 2, Tony Parker invites you to his secret lab where a famous engineer is designing new suits for Iron Man. Help a specialist flight test fresh prototypes. In each of them, you need to fly as far as possible, hitting educational targets with the help of a Lego laser and missiles. Do not forget that, despite the fact that the flight is a test, you will be fired upon with real weapons, testing the capabilities of one of the Avengers. The toy develops reaction and decision-making speed well.
title: Lego Avengers 2 game

content: According to the plot of the Lego Avengers game for two, the greatest criminals have teamed up in order to capture an energy source developed by a famous inventor. A team of superheroes is sent to protect the scientific laboratory. Choose from them three characters and go to battle. Invite your best friend and you will be able to fight back against the insidious villains together, taking it in turns to control the brave Avengers.
title: Lego Avengers game for two

content: Head to the salon equipped with the latest technology and start your career as a hairdresser. Your task is to delight clients with new hairstyles. The girls will tell you exactly what they want, and you just have to perform the appropriate actions based on the tooltips.
title: Lego barbershop game

content: The game offers gamers to take care of cute pets. Girls will bring their pets to you, and you will need to carry out the necessary care procedures for them. Take care of the hygiene and appearance of each animal, and when it becomes really attractive, feed it. For a meal, you need to choose the right food.
title: Lego beauty salon game

content: While playing Lego cars you have to take part in a racing competition. Your task is simple: you need to drive as far as possible, moving along winding tracks in the company of other riders. Their Lego cars can interfere with yours, so try to find the best path for yourself without bumping into obstacles, because they slow down the car a lot. Before you start playing, you need to choose the car you like the most. There is no need to assemble Lego cars here, they are already ready and waiting for their drivers. Green arrows will come across the track, if you drive through them, you will get a good acceleration. After the race is over, detailed statistics will be displayed on the screen. Upon successful completion, you will receive a new transport and you can immediately try it out in the race!
title: Lego car game

content: According to the plot of the Lego Cars game, you will, along with the heroes of the cartoon of the same name, take part in an exciting racing competition. Right at the start, you meet Lightning McQueen - the best racer in the world of Cars, it is with him that you have to fight for the crown of the tournament winner. Lego championship races are held all over the world, and you will have to make every effort to achieve victory in each of them. Help McQueen and his friends win all the Lego races sponsored by one of its most famous series - Duplo.
title: Lego Cars game

content: After launching Lego City for Girls, you will enter a special salon designed to take care of cute pets. You will be brought various pets that need to undergo scheduled procedures. To begin with, you should bathe the animal, comb it, and take care of the hygiene of teeth and claws. And after the care process is completed, you need to remember to feed the baby. To do this, a lot of different foods are presented on the screen, but you need to choose exactly what your pet loves. For good work you will receive money.
title: Lego city game for girls

content: Pay attention to the plot of the game Lego city police. In it, you can check how various services of the city work in emergency situations. For example, a convict escaped from prison - he must be caught, and the police take over the case. There is a fire, who can help? Certainly courageous firefighters. If a tire is punctured on the road or a car breaks down, a tow truck rushes to the rescue. It is interesting to play, the control is simple - with the help of the mouse and the arrow keys on the keyboard. But you have the opportunity to get acquainted with the work of each of the listed Lego City services, and take part in solving a particular problem yourself.
title: Lego city police game

content: The insidious Shredder and his minions from the Foot clan attacked the building under which the house of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles was located. Help the brave reptiles destroy the maximum number of enemies in a limited time. Carefully monitor the situation on the battlefield, try to meet Shredder himself on the battlefield and defeat him.
title: Lego City Turtle game

content: While playing Lego Friends Adventure you have to help cute girls to have a chic pool party. To do this, at your disposal is a huge number of different buildings. Choose any of them, and then install on one of the available places. You can change the color of the parts as you wish.
title: Lego Friends Heartlake Rush

content: And again we will play with inertial cars. This time you will not have to overtake anyone, but it will be possible to show the skill of avoiding obstacles. Collect parts along the way - extra points are awarded for them. The number of starts in one run is limited, so handlebars are careful to stop less. New tracks open gradually.
title: Lego fun racing game

content: In Lego City, one of the stages of the World Motocross Championship is organized, in which you also take part. Show all your talents and win in each of the races of the tournament. Do not forget to please the audience with dangerous and spectacular stunts on the track. Your performance will not leave indifferent any person present on the track.
title: Lego game beautiful motors 2

content: While playing Lego for kids, you will be asked to take care of the pets. Pet owners will bring their pets to your hotel, and not only banal cats or dogs. This time you will be able to tinker with a bunny, a deer and many other animals. Children’s game consists of several stages, or rather, of five. To begin with, you will need to wash your pet, then take him to a haircut and brush his teeth. After that, you will be asked to choose a small decoration for the animal, and the final step will be feeding, and you need to choose exactly the product that is suitable for animal children. For example, a Lego hare (however, like a regular one) will be satisfied with a carrot, but not a piece of meat. After you finish with one animal, the next pet will be brought to you.
title: Lego game for kids

content: Take control of a small clockwork car and take part in the races. Pull the car back with the mouse, and then release it to give it acceleration and get to the finish line as quickly as possible. Collect gears along the way - they will be useful when upgrading the car. Win races to unlock even more challenging races.
title: Lego game real cars

content: In this game, you have to destroy the dead, who are trying to take over the territory of the city and enslave all its inhabitants. At the very beginning of the battle, you have only one shooter. Aim with your mouse and destroy the monsters. After the first victory, you will be able to replenish the ranks of your warriors, as well as choose the right weapon for them.
title: Lego heroic game - valley of the dead

content: The protagonist of the game Lego Indiana Jones goes in search of rare artifacts and invites you to join him. In one of the ancient manuscripts, the famous archaeologist and adventurer discovered a map that indicates the places where parts of a mysterious object are hidden. Passing missions will require you to have a good reaction and attentiveness. Lego adventures capture from the first seconds and do not let you leave the monitor until Indiana Jones is able to collect all the parts of the artifact and restore the ancient relic.
title: Lego Indiana Jones game

content: Renowned scientist and inventor Tony Stark has developed several new Iron Man suits and invites you to test them. While Tonny is testing the systems in his lab, you must operate the suit in real-life conditions. On the track you will find many challenges that you will have to overcome.
title: Lego iron man game

content: Lego Heroes are sent to fight terrible alien monsters. The aliens tried to capture one of the cities of the home planet of Lego heroes, and now you have to help the brave defenders repel the attack. Control your character’s movements, destroy enemies and collect parts that will allow your hero to transform.
title: Lego Marvel Hero Factory game

content: The process of playing Lego Makvin echoes the plot of the famous cartoon “Cars”. In it you will not only take part in the race, but also win. At the beginning of the game, you can only control Lightning McQueen, but other cars from the cartoon will gradually open. You can choose any of the unlocked cars.
title: Lego McQueen game

content: Feel like a popular superhero - Batman, who will have to race through the night alleys of the city with many obstacles. At the top of the playing field there is an indicator showing the cars of criminals that need to be neutralized. To do this, your Batmobile has a missile system installed. The shot is made by pressing the spacebar.
title: Lego police assistants game

content: After launching the Lego space game, you will find yourself in the world of Star Wars. Next, you need to decide which side attracts you more: dark or light. After the choice is made, indicate the location where you want to play and start your adventure in space. At each level, a separate task awaits you, and you need to complete it to complete the mission. Lego astronauts of the enemy army will attack you, so you need to act quickly and without too much fuss. Your task is to collect as many blue pieces as possible.
title: Lego space game

content: The Lego car building game takes you to a magical land of plastic cubes. There you turn into a criminal racer. In Car Builder, you’re on your way to meet your accomplice, but you catch the eye of a policeman. Try to evade pursuit, destroy the law enforcement officer’s Lego car and pick up your friend who just managed to rob one of the most impregnable banks in the world. During the chase, don’t forget to collect bonus Lego bricks, thanks to which you can upgrade your car. Skill and driving talent will help you drive your lego car in difficult situations, and excellent reaction will make it easy to break away from the police car and bring your cunning plan to life. Money stolen from the bank will be worthy compensation for minutes of extreme driving.
title: Lego Speed Champions

content: While playing Lego Spider-Man 3 you have to join the famous hero in his fight against criminals. Go with Spiderman to patrol the streets of the city. Use the PC keyboard to control the movements of the main character and help to overcome the obstacles that are often encountered on his way.
title: Lego Spiderman 3 game

content: The Lego Spider-Man game offers you to control a hero created from a popular constructor. The unusual appearance did not limit the possibilities inherent in this amazing character. Spiderman can still launch webs (spacebar), move on the roofs and walls of skyscrapers, which allows him to skillfully move away from enemies. At the beginning of the game, hints in the form of red arrows will appear to help you navigate. The goal is to go as far as possible through the world of Lego and earn the maximum reward points.
title: Lego Spiderman game

content: Set six years before the Battle of Yavin, Lego Star Wars Rebels focuses on the actions of a small group of heroes who helped spark a liberation rebellion. Before you is an excellent turn-based strategy, where the Lego rebels are fighting to save the inhabitants of Lothal in order to give the universe new hope. Empire’s assault troops are very strong and you will have to use special tactics. Help the main characters Ezra and Kanan develop a strategic plan to strike back at the enemy troops. You will need intelligence and ingenuity to destroy as many enemies as possible with the least loss to yourself. It is difficult to play, but interesting. During Star Wars, you have the ability to create and equip rebel hideouts, watchtowers, and entire buildings. Collect hope tokens and give them to citizens to get additional powers and weapons.
title: Lego star wars rebels game

content: On a giant arena in the presence of a huge number of spectators, races to the bottom are held, the participants of which are the characters of comics dedicated to Batman. Choose one of the characters in the game and go to the track. Try to avoid collisions with opponents and try to destroy them with the help of devices that will meet on the way.
title: Lego superhero racing game

content: While playing Lego superheroes Peter Quill and his team of Guardians of the Galaxy go in search of a sphere that can destroy entire planets. Peter invites you to join his friends in this dangerous adventure. Choose one of the Marvel heroes and go to the labyrinths of the dungeons of the abandoned planet Mogar. The passage of this exciting toy from Lego will require you to have a good reaction and attentiveness. Try to avoid the traps set by an ancient and long-extinct alien race and destroy the henchmen of Roran, a fanatic who dreams of taking over the galaxy. Thanks to your help, the Guardians of the Galaxy will surely capture the dangerous artifact and hand it over to the Nova Corps for safekeeping. The entire Guardian team will be hailed as the superheroes of the Lego Galaxy, and Peter will be sure to invite you to join them on their next adventure.
title: Lego Superheroes game

content: Help the ninja turtle defeat the evil that has gripped the city. The streets and sewer passages are filled with enemies, and you need to navigate through the given locations and destroy the enemies. Try not to fall under their blows, otherwise you can lose all game lives and fly out of the game. You need to become a real hero!
title: Lego turtle game for girls

content: Minecraft 200000000000
title: Legocraft

content: Your friend is asking for help, and you need to hurry, otherwise he will be killed. Navigate through game locations to find the items you need to save. It is worth exploring the most mysterious corners of the gaming space, but be very careful, because scary monsters can attack you at any moment.
title: Lets Kill Jeff The Killer Jeffs Revenge 2020

content: You have to get rid of all the bad guys in the new shooting game from the Stickman adventure series “Headhunter”. Upgrade your weapons, get grenades and armor in between missions, trying to defeat enemies at all levels of the game. Remember to reload regularly using the R key and take cover in time.
title: Light It Up Online

content: Mind games for children 7 years old will make you rack your brains over puzzles, the conditions of which are laid out against the background of the starry sky. Here you will need to unravel the shape so that none of its lines intersect the others. With each figure, the task will become more difficult, more and more lines will be used in the composition.
title: Line Puzzle Artist

content: Tigers are big and strong animals. But until they grow up, they need care. So your task is to provide the tiger cub with everything it needs. In the upper left corner of the screen are images of various objects. For example, milk bottles. By clicking on it, you will be taken to another screen, where you will need to hold down the mouse button on the animal so that the bar on top is filled.
title: Little Cat Doctor

content: In this game you have to play the role of a doctor who is able to cope with any problems. This time the patient complains about his teeth. He was playing baseball and got hit in the jaw. Your task is to examine the boy and carry out all the necessary procedures that will help the patient.
title: Little Dentist

content: The Dino game will be very popular with small users because of the main character. After all, this is the same dinosaur from a box of children’s lactic acid dessert. Management, however, can cause difficulty for kids. First, it is carried out using the keyboard. Secondly, it is quite difficult to deal with opponents. By the way, the character in the story went on a campaign. He has to jump over the abyss and deal with enemies. There is a limited number of darts for this. But even without them, you can neutralize the threat by jumping on top of it. A mistake can cost the player dearly - they will have to start the level all over again. By the way, there are ten interesting stages to go through. Taking the character from Rastishka’s packaging as the main character, Dino’s game doomed itself to success with kids. And with complicated controls, it also attracted an adult audience, which will help the children in passing.
title: Little Dino Adventure

content: Tim worked on a farm, and Anna organized her own business in the heart of a huge metropolis. Once the girl went out of town to relax and had an accident. It was then that the guys met for the first time and fell in love at first sight. Help the couple in love pass all the tests and create their own family.
title: Little Heart Flying

content: A cute little mermaid fell in love with a human prince. By all means, she decided to turn into a girl and turned to the underwater witch. In order for the witch’s spell to work, the little mermaid must find magical notes at the bottom of the ocean. Help the brave heroine of the game complete the task of the insidious witch.
title: Little Mermaid Mystery

content: In this game, you can make all your fantasies about your favorite horse come true. Today you will create hairstyles, but not for a girl, but for a cute pony. Choose a new color for her mane, braid it and decorate it with bows. In addition, do not forget to pick up colored reins and a few stylish accessories.
title: Little Pony Caretaker

content: Cartoon horses are very fond of dancing, and now you have to help them move to the music. The game Little Ponies shows the characters of the animated series, frozen in anticipation of a great disco. The dancers lined up near a special panel on which images of objects move. You need to have time to click on them at the moment when the objects are within the frames that coincide with them along the contour. Only surgically precise clicks will allow little ponies to plunge into the dance. A limited time is allotted to “ignite” the dance floor (it is displayed on a color scale).
title: Little pony game

content: During this game you will meet cute little girl Daisy. She wants to get a new hairstyle, but you have to help her. The game consists of several stages, and at each of them it is proposed to perform a number of tasks. You need to deal with them in a limited time. Hurry up if you don’t want to upset the girl.
title: Little Princess Hair Treatment

content: Despite the fact that the interface and all the tips in the game are in English, it will be very easy to understand what is required of the gamer. The process of passing consists in tailoring the dress chosen at the very beginning. Young designers will be able to get acquainted with the main stages of creating clothes and take a direct part in this matter.
title: Lolita Princess Party

content: The game is as simple as a pine board! You choose a character: archer-man or archer-woman. All. You are standing on the right side of the screen in the outfit of an English archer, and on the left you are being attacked by enemies. Apparently, these are some kind of Saracens. If they reach your character, they will start slashing very quickly with a sword and then it will be over. You need to point the bow and have time to shoot at them first. They die from one arrow.
title: Lord Of The Knights

content: The developers of this game send you to a farm filled with a huge number of dead people. Unfortunately, you cannot run away or call someone for help. The only way to survive in this nightmarish place is to take a gun and go hunting for zombies. Show your abilities in the field of fighting evil spirits and destroy all the monsters.
title: Lost Alone: Zombie Land

content: In this game you will find interesting puzzles with the participation of colorful balls. There are several levels, and on each of them a circle filled with balls will be displayed on the screen. There is also a pattern by which you need to reproduce the order of the balls. Rotate them until you achieve your goal.
title: Love Balls

content: Help the character of this game to meet his beloved. You will find a huge number of levels, on each of which you need to get to the bench where the girl is sitting. Overcome various obstacles, collect sweets and turn the world around if necessary. With each stage, the game becomes more difficult.
title: Love Balls 2

content: Entertaining games for children 8 years old offer you to help a little bird who really needs to get to his birdhouse. Guide the feathered heroine through the intricate labyrinth so that she can finally return home. Arrow buttons are used to control the cute bird.
title: Love Bears

content: In Girls Coloring Book Dress Up you will see a fashionable girl who loves to dress stylishly. It’s time to show your creativity, creating modern images from the presented elements. The game is good because it allows you to slightly change the appearance of things you like.
title: Mabel Dress Up Game

content: This game really evokes the last part of the Mad Max movie: combat vehicles, post-industrial landscape and so on. There is no plot, as such. The point is that teams must capture the enemy’s flag and protect their own. Multiplayer mode, online. In between battles, you can upgrade.
title: Mad Max 3D game

content: Indeed, to carry all the arsenal that your character has on you or in your pockets, you need to be a magical dude! But that’s not the point. The main thing is to fight off the creatures that climb on you from open portals. It is also important not to get too close to the edges of the platform on which the battle is taking place, otherwise you will fall into the abyss. When you have enough energy, you can deliver a super blow.
title: Magic Dinosaur Hunt game

content: In this game you have to help a little bird. The screen displays moving notes, which sequentially fall into the screen frame. You need to quickly tap on the corresponding note at the bottom of the screen to lock the symbol. If you make mistakes too often, trouble will happen to the bird.
title: Magic Easter Tiles

content: Create an original manicure using the presented features. Decide on the shape of the nails, choose the color of the varnish with which you will paint your nails. You can choose a solid color, or you can use attractive patterns. Also, if you wish, you can add decorative stickers in the form of cute figures.
title: Magic Nail Salon

content: After starting the Musical Instruments game, you will see the well-known traveler Dasha. She offers to create great melodies using different instruments for this. So, on the screen you will see a guitar, maracas, a flute and other objects that make pleasant sounds. You just need to click on the instrument you like to start playing. Do not forget to choose the speed of the melody, the buttons under the singing objects are designed for this. Feel like a real musician and don’t hold back your creative impulses!
title: Magic Piano Tiles

content: In this game, you and the main character go to the zoo for an excursion. There you meet a nasty monkey who throws stones at visitors. Together with your ward on the screen, try to throw stones at the nasty monkey, correctly calculating the trajectory of the flight, the force with which you must launch the projectile.
title: Magic Zoo

content: A cute anime girl, the heroine of the game Robots for Girls 5, turned to your beauty salon with a huge request. Together with their friend - the iron man, they go to the carnival, and they just need new costumes. Come up with new images for your friends, thanks to which they will become the stars of the holiday.
title: Magical Girl Save The School

content: The game was originally designed for girls, judging by the characters. However, it may be of interest to gamers of any gender and age. The goal is to keep the vital signs of the main characters (looking at the wall behind the pet) at a high level in the allotted time. There are ten of them in total, so for a successful passage you will have to sweat.
title: Magical Pony Caring

content: In front of you is a football stadium tribune filled with fans. But some of them are wearing masks. These people obviously planned some kind of provocation from which civilians could suffer. Now you are entrusted with a responsible mission - to find among the countless crowd of fans in masks. You need to do this with a bow and arrows.
title: Magicians Carnival

content: Mahjong 1 is an almost classic version of this Chinese solitaire game. It consists of several levels, the transition to which looks like a journey through the map. Time to complete each stage is limited. There are several auxiliary buttons on the right side of the screen that either remove chips or give a hint.
title: Mahjong Connect

content: Dragon Mahjong game is not very similar to the classic version of this puzzle. The only thing they have in common is the need to search for and remove chips with the same pictures from the field. On the right side of the screen is a set of mahjong tiles. On the left, a dragon flies slowly, on which “bones” are also located. You need to quickly find pairings. Any gamer can play the exciting Mahjong Dragon for free.
title: Mahjong Gardens

content: Quite interesting will be the passage of the game Mahjong paired patterns. Yes, it only remotely resembles the Chinese version of solitaire, but it is not without its charm and even originality. The rules will become more difficult from level to level. The number of hints when moving to the next stage is not restored (if you used them). In a word, vivid impressions are guaranteed.
title: Mahjong King

content: Solitaire is a traditional Chinese board game. It consists of tablets with hieroglyphs, which are laid out on the playing field face down in the form of a pyramid or a simple platform. The goal of the game of mahjong is to disassemble the figure by removing cards with paired images from it, but only those that are on top and have already been opened.
title: Mahjong Titans

content: Puzzle games Mahjong Shanghai Dynasty take you back to ancient times. It was there that the logical fun was born, which eventually became popular all over the world. According to the rules of the game, you need to find two identical tiles in a pyramid of tiles. Carefully inspect the structure and try to find bones with an identical denomination in it. You can play this old but very exciting Shanghai mahjong both on your own and with your parents, competing with them in observation skills and the ability to think logically.
title: Mahjong: Age of Alchemy

content: The Bread Simulator game invites you to make a variety of sandwiches. Control a funny character who needs to catch products falling from above. Inedible items should be avoided. If you catch some nonsense three times, then the game will end in a loss. So be careful!
title: Make A Gingerbread House Cake

content: The process of the game Celebrity Makeup is dedicated to the well-known film “Twilight”. In it you will be able to change the appearance of three characters of the saga at once - Bella, Edward and Jacob. Choose any of them and immediately proceed to the transformation. You have three options for hairstyles for each hero. In addition, in the game for girls, you can change their hair color. And after that, apply makeup for the stars and choose an outfit, the color of which, by the way, can also be chosen by yourself. And don’t forget about cute accessories, thanks to which the image will be as complete as possible.
title: Makeup For A Star

content: During this wonderful game you will be able to create your own coloring book. On the screen you will see an image of a girl, choose the background on which she will be, as well as clothes, shoes and accessories. Then it remains only to color the resulting picture using a variety of colors. The finished result can be printed.
title: Mandala Coloring Book

content: And here is everyone’s favorite game about crazy birds who entered the battle with arrogant pigs. It is built on the principle of “from simple to complex”. At the first level, you need to launch a bird from a slingshot (Greenpeace people hang themselves out of anger), gouging the pig’s shelter along with the pig itself. At the next level, the task becomes more difficult, and so on.
title: Mango Piggy Piggy Hero

content: Every home needs to be cleaned from time to time. It’s time to clean up this kitchen. It takes a little bit of effort and patience. You need to collect all the garbage: bottles, bags, scraps and throw them away. Wash the dishes and put all the items in their places. And hurry up, time is limited.
title: Marie Kondo Clean Up

content: Mario turned out to be not only a tourist, but also a fly agaric lover. Apparently, for this reason, he is worn like mad. Your task is to help the brave plumber collect mushrooms and get to the end of the level. It will not be very easy, but all because of the speed of movement of the character. So you have to get used to the controls.
title: Mario FPS

content: Calmly! There will be no need to drop nuclear bombs on anyone. You need to fight only with the monsters in the labyrinth, and even then, as a last resort. In general, your goal is to free the princess. The game has a mode for two players at the same time. At the same time, you can control the characters from one keyboard without interfering with each other. Before starting the game, it is better to familiarize yourself with the controls.
title: Mario Invaders

content: Terrorists have seized 10 very important objects and are going to blow them up. To prevent this, a special elite detachment of the tactical unit is taken to work. Your task is to eliminate the emerging threat, destroy the bandits and free the captured hostages. You have to go through 10 difficult levels and complete the mission without loss.
title: Martian Alien Combat

content: The Dreams of War game is an exciting aerial shooter from World War II. You have to become a fighter pilot and follow the orders of the command. Playing online, you can choose a plane, equip it with machine guns, missiles or bombs, and go on a mission. Use the mouse cursor to control and attack.
title: Martian Zombie Survival

content: The brave Autobots entered into a deadly battle with the Decepticons. Choose one of 3 characters of this exciting game and try to win in all fights. Thanks to your help, the brave defenders of the Earth will definitely defeat their eternal enemies and save our planet from complete destruction.
title: Martians VS Robots

content: The heroes of Jigsaw puzzles for girls Masha and the Bear decided to create an album with frames from the animated series with their participation. A huge photo book was bought, and inseparable friends sat down at a large table to examine their photos and organize them in an album. Opening the box, Masha found that all the photos were cut into small pieces. Help the heroes of the puzzle about Masha and the Bear glue together the photos and arrange them in the album. Masha and Misha will be grateful for your help and will definitely invite you to drink tea with fragrant jam.
title: Masha And The Bear Jigsaw Puzzle

content: During the game about the American Civil War, you have to become an artilleryman of one of the fighting sides. Together with a partner, destroy the advancing enemy units by pouring cannonballs on them. Control your weapon with the arrow keys and try not to let the enemy close to your fortifications.
title: Masked Shooters Multiplayer Edition

content: A special task force was abandoned on a tropical island. According to intelligence information, it is here that a terrorist training base is organized. Together with two of your subordinates, comb the entire island and destroy the bandits you meet. Be careful and try to save your brothers in arms from death.
title: Masked Shooters Single Player

content: Checkers is a game loved by many. She has simple rules. Now you can play checkers with a virtual opponent or with a real one. Choose the desired mode of passage, and also indicate the level of difficulty. Next, a board divided into cells will be displayed on the screen. Move checkers and win!
title: Master Checkers

content: Play good old checkers according to simple, “home” rules. The blue ones go first, a simple checker moves only forward one cell. You can hit an opponent both forward and backward. If it is possible to remove more than one enemy piece, they beat the entire chain. The winner is the one who removed from the field or blocked all the opponent’s chips.
title: Master Checkers Multiplayer

content: The Chess for Two game was created specifically for beginners who are not yet very good at thinking through a game strategy. A friend or even a computer will help you learn. Start the game, study the possible moves and act. Perform each of them, find out what it can lead to and, perhaps, find a path that will lead to the defeat of your opponent.
title: Master Chess Multiplayer

content: The authors of the game Farms in a row invite you to try your hand at the role of the owner of a farm. Try to develop your possessions by buying pets for gold coins. You can earn them by completing mini-game levels in which you need to collect chains of three or more identical vegetables.
title: Match Arena

content: The exciting game Match Balls by Color invites you to have a great time. The screen will display a huge number of balloons that must be rotated in such a way as to eventually build combinations of four or more elements of the same color. At each level, you will be given tasks regarding how many and which balls you need to burst. Collect these balls and move on to another stage, where the rules become more complicated. Sometimes bonus items will appear on the field that will help you complete the task even faster. Most often they help to blow up a large number of balls. Try to achieve the goal in the least number of moves and get to the next stage of the game as quickly as possible!
title: Match balls by color game

content: In this exciting game you have to take care of the appearance of a pregnant girl. Choose the appropriate clothes in which the heroine of the game will look most impressive. You will also need to take care of shoes and accessories. Do not forget about a cute hairstyle, it is also an important element of the image.
title: Maternity Fashion game

content: The mindfulness game is dedicated to the adventures of Santa Claus. Your task is to help the New Year’s wizard deliver all the presents. Navigate through the labyrinth, collecting boxes of presents, then to get to the exit. You need to find absolutely all the gifts, otherwise you will not be able to get out of the trap!
title: Math Education For Kids

content: The game allows you to solve 26 tasks on 6 different maps. But to do this will not be easy at all, you will need knowledge of the basics of mathematics and the ability to think logically. The sum of the numbers appears on the screen, for example, 3+9. From the numbers scattered around the playing field, you must choose the one that corresponds to the final amount by clicking on the squares with the desired values ​​one by one.
title: Math Matador

content: Even if you are a driver of a powerful heavy truck, this does not mean that you are allowed to park any way and anywhere. You, too, can have your tires slashed and water tanked for bad parking. So you will train to drive through the whole city, hitch a trailer, carry loads, and then properly park your car neatly and like a normal person.
title: Math Parking Multiplication

content: A fun educational game for kids who have just started learning arithmetic. Remember everything that you were taught at school, pick up the mouse and solve the proposed examples by clicking on the number that is the correct answer. Take your time and think carefully, many of the puzzles in this game are tricky and not as easy as they seem at first glance.
title: Math Test Challenge

content: Educational math games for grade 1 offer you to practice your counting skills. The screen displays two rows of cards. At the top of the screen are images of objects, and at the bottom - numbers. You need to count the items and match each card with the correct number. Correct pairs will immediately disappear from the screen. An educational game for the first grade takes place in several stages, and the task gradually becomes more difficult. If you match the cards incorrectly, nothing will happen.
title: Math Test Challenge 1

content: Max Steel is an exciting shooting game for boys based on the popular animated series. The protagonist is half alien, half teenager with a special turbo energy. This guy is incredibly fast, brave, strong. And he also has a special suit that protects the hero during battles with aliens. And Max has to deal with them very often. For example, it was today that the evil Dred sent his troops to attack the N-TEK base. Your task is to help the guy destroy all his minions. The passage of the game with Max Steel is quite difficult, because the main character’s enemies are powerful robots with the latest weapons. Move across the secret base, destroy enemies, collect bonuses. They will give Max even more strength. The key to your success in the game Maxsteal will be a good reaction, because the enemies will pop up from everywhere like mushrooms after the rain. Explore all the nooks and crannies of the building and watch the shield indicator, try not to let it drop to zero, otherwise Max Steel will become vulnerable to the shots of enemy soldiers.
title: Max Steel game

content: Max Steel is sent on another mission. You need to destroy the enemy detachment of robots that captured a peaceful spaceship. Before the start of the mission, you can choose the color of armor and ammunition for the guy. Max will have a powerful laser gun in his arsenal, with which he will fight enemies, overcoming dangerous traps.
title: Max Steel game - N-tech invasion

content: The aliens have reached Max Steel’s secret base. It’s quite difficult for a guy to keep the defense, because the onslaught of the enemy is very serious. Move from cover to cover and shoot at the enemy at the same time. At each level, you need to eliminate a certain number of enemies in order to proceed to the next stage of the operation. Try to do it quickly, not missing the opportunity to earn a bonus for speed.
title: Max Steel game - steel defense

content: In this game you will have to try to get out of an old castle full of zombies. Your enemies are unusual: they consist of many squares, which crumble when hit by bullets. But, if parts of the corpse are highlighted in green, this means that it is self-healing, so keep shooting until it stops.
title: Mazecraft

content: The process of playing for three Tanks in the labyrinth 9 is able to capture the attention of fans of combat battles for a long time. Choose the difficulty level and start your journey. At first, the location is covered in darkness, but as you move, it will open. Shoot at the tanks that you come across along the way, but beware of their retaliatory projectiles.
title: MechWar io

content: Everything is simple here: there are two locks. One belongs to the enemy, and the other belongs to you. The task is to protect your castle from destruction and wipe out the enemy. Before the start of the battles, you can choose the level of difficulty, the option of passing the game, as well as see the instructions (which will help you quickly understand the controls). The graphics do not shine, but they tried to compensate for this shortcoming with dynamism.
title: Medieval Defense Z

content: According to the plot of this exciting toy, you are going to a distant fairy-tale kingdom attacked by an army of evil monsters. As the most experienced of the local warlords, try to organize the defense of the royal castles. Arrange your warriors so that they can inflict maximum damage on enemy soldiers.
title: Medieval game - knights crusaders

content: During the Forest Animals game, the inhabitants of the forest decided to play hide and seek and invite you to take part in this exciting game. In a limited time, try to find all the animals hiding on the playing field. Hover over the found animal with the mouse, and it will look out of its hiding place. You can play this game on your own or with your friends.
title: Memory Mach Jungle Animals

content: The next version of Minecraft awaits gamers after downloading. View, as always, from the first person. The character appears in the world already with a certain set of items. Management is standard. It is better to immediately switch to full screen mode (right mouse button and click on full screen). You can’t get killed here. You need to complete the tasks that the game itself throws up.
title: Merge Jewels

content: Little girls also want to look attractive and dress up in beautiful dresses. And if we are talking about a princess, then a lot depends on the outfits! You have to create a chic image for the baby using a virtual wardrobe for this. There you will find dresses, and crowns, and shoes, and much more.
title: Mermaid Baby Bath

content: Game Cafe - an exciting economic strategy. The main goal is to build your own business so that it is guaranteed to bring income. Today you have the opportunity to become a fast food tycoon. To do this, you need to perform simple tasks and carefully calculate all your actions. It is necessary to build a network of shops, cafes and eateries, and lure as many people as possible into them. Create a thriving shopping area and try to satisfy all the needs of your customers. You need to clearly think about how to properly and quickly serve the buyer. After all, the influx of visitors depends on whether a person leaves satisfied or not with your work. And this, in turn, income and reputation. There are several levels of difficulty in the cafe game, you need to develop your business, improve buildings, increase the level of service.
title: Mermaid Coffee Shop

content: Cute little mermaid Ariel, like any other girl, tries to take care of her appearance. You need to help this fabulous heroine. At your disposal is a huge variety of cosmetics, and you can use any of them. Follow the hints of the game and make Ariel a real beauty.
title: Mermaid Halloween Parties

content: Mermaid Dress Up game invites you to join Ariel and her friends for a photo session. The company decided to take some funny photos for memory and invites you to help them in choosing funny images. Choose original costumes for each of the characters, and when you’re done, take pictures of your friends.
title: Mermaid Mix N Match

content: The famous little mermaid fell in love with an earthly prince and now dreams of going to land for her chosen one. She turned to the old witch for help, and the witch agreed to help her. Together with an insidious sorceress, create a unique potion that will turn a mermaid’s tail into beautiful female legs.
title: Mermaid Princess Hospital Recovery

content: Launching the Kiss game will take you to a music concert. Here you will see several musicians. The soloists of the group are not too willing to perform songs, they want to devote time to kissing. But you can do this pleasant thing only when no one is looking at the stars in love. Otherwise, you will lose your gaming life!
title: Mermaid Princess Mistletoe Kiss

content: Create a great wedding manicure for the princess. The game consists of two stages. To begin with, it is proposed to use different tools to put your nails in order. Once this is done, the second stage will open. There you will need to choose the shape of the nails, the color of the varnish, cute tattoos, stylish rings.
title: Mermaid Princess Nails Spa

content: Make up for girls
title: Mermaid Princess New Makeup

content: Go to the underwater depths to work on the appearance of the little mermaid. Choose her hairstyle, outfit, tail. Decide also on the decorations that are presented on the screen in large quantities. Try to achieve the most harmonious combination of elements of appearance, which will allow the mermaid to look perfect.
title: Mermaid Princess Real Haircuts

content: Mermaid Ariel is having a great time with her beloved prince. They want to kiss a lot, but there is some problem - no one should see this. Therefore, if an exclamation mark appears on the screen, it means that an unexpected guest will soon appear. In such cases, quickly stop the kiss or you will lose.
title: Mermaid Sauna Flirting

content: Even underwater inhabitants follow fashion and want to be real beauties. Your task is to come up with a new cute look for the little mermaid. Decide on the appearance of the bodice and tail, choose a color and ornament for them. The final step will be the choice of hairstyles, jewelry and mermaid drawings on the face and body.
title: Mermaid Show

content: Metro 2033 2 game invites you to dive into exciting adventures. Here you will need to arm yourself with firearms and fight with opponents. Navigate underground locations and attack enemies on your way. Try not to let your character get hit. The scale of his health is located at the top.
title: Metro 2033 game - Part 2

content: Do you want to participate in real nigerian showdowns? This game is for you! Two clans clashed in the streets for the right to sell dope. Kill the required number of enemies on each level - and you will be happy! For Mochilov, you have several different barrels at your disposal, among which there is even a machine gun and a sniper rifle. First-aid kits and cartridges are selected by shots at them.
title: Miami Crime Simulator 3D

content: Mickey Mouse and his girlfriend Mini went for a walk in the woods. It is their portrait on a walk that you need to collect from separate fragments. At the bottom of the screen you can see a red button. Click on it to show one of the parts of the image. Use your mouse to place it where you want it. It will not be difficult to do this, since you will always have a translucent original image in front of you.
title: Mickey & Minnie - Parisian Park Puzzler

content: During the game Mickey Mouse Adventure you have to go along with the hero of the Disney cartoon on an exciting journey. He needs to save his friends kidnapped by an evil witch. Be extremely careful and as attentive as possible, because there will be various dangers on the way. Use arrow keys to control.
title: Mickey Mouse Bump In The Night

content: A simple but very interesting game in which you’ll have to help Mickey Mouse build a football team and try to win the championship. Use the mouse to control the players. Move the cursor over the character, hold down the left key and draw a path for him to move along. Crazy Games as many goals as possible for the opposing team and become the champion.
title: Mickey Mouse Football Game

content: The famous Mickey Mouse and his girlfriend Minnie went on a trip on a small plane. Help the brave pilot avoid obstacles and get to the end point of the journey without crashing the plane and collecting the maximum number of reward points. You can destroy some obstacles with the help of a special pie thrower.
title: Mickeys Spin and Stack

content: After starting the game Militon pony, you will see horses that have lost their decorations. All their talismans fell apart, and you need to restore them. You will control Twilight Sparkle, who is ready to help her friends. Explore the location, looking for hidden places where there may be decorations. Other myliton ponies will also join in the search, running at the right moment. Applejack, for example, is able to hit a tree, after which the desired detail will be found on it. Collect stars for reward points.
title: Militon pony game

content: An updated version of Minecraft 0 is waiting for you with new maps, weapons, and a more stable server. Prove that you are the best shooter in the world. Pick up a crowbar, pistol, shotgun, sniper rifle or machine gun and destroy as many enemies as possible. Fight in Minecraft style team battles and destroy the entire enemy squad. There are a lot of firearms of various types in your arsenal, however, the number of cartridges for them is limited. To win this war, you must be careful and act tactically competently.
title: Mine Clone
