Moreover, it is proposed to shackle the animal in uncomfortable clothes, which can cause overheating and suffocation in the unfortunate.
title: My dog ​​game

content: An interesting game invites you to try your hand at dolphin training. These smartest animals are able to show many interesting tricks, and spectators constantly come to see them. You need to control the dolphin in such a way that it demonstrates the given actions. Two modes are available: normal and night show.
title: My Dolphin Show 7

content: The game Hospital will turn you into a real doctor who knows a lot about complex operations. And the patient will be the boy Egor, who was born with a weak heart. Because of this, he cannot live a full life and often gets tired. Therefore, it is necessary to carry out an operation that will help the little boy cope with the problem. The hospital will provide you with all the necessary tools to use during the treatment process. Look at the hints that appear on the screen and act in accordance with them. If you suddenly make a mistake in something, then the red color of the screen and a warning inscription will signal this.
title: My Dream Hospital

content: Everyone loves the holidays, and magical ponies in particular. In this game, you have a chance to throw a party for them. Approach the task seriously and then everything will work out. You choose the music (images of records at the bottom of the screen), the venue for the celebration (drag and drop the desired pictures from above into the cells) and special effects: balloons, confetti, fireworks, and more. When you’re done, you can admire the finished result.
title: My Little Pony Pop

content: In this exciting game you have to dress up Bon Bon. Here the pony is presented in the form of a charming girl who loves to dress up in stylish things. Your task is to create a nice image. Use for this any of the proposed elements of the virtual wardrobe.
title: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 1

content: Twilight Sparkle was instructed to complete an important mission and you need to help the horse cope with the task. She is attacked by winged enemies that need to be shot at. Your task is to get rid of all enemies on the level. Try not to let enemies close to you, otherwise they can take away health points.
title: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 2

content: Horses are very hungry, so you need to feed them urgently. The screen displays four animal pens, and horses will walk through them. You need to fill the bowls with food in time and throw them to the horses. At the top of the screen, the number of pets that need to be fed is displayed.
title: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 3

content: The girl is preparing for Valentine’s Day and she needs a good manicure. The task is to treat the heroine’s nails with high quality. There are many different varnishes at your disposal. You can make plain nails or use drawings. You can also add stickers. Don’t forget the pretty ring.
title: My Nail Art Salon

content: Funny dinosaur Gizmo decided to do a bike trial. What came out of it, the Race for Kids game will show you. It is necessary to help this cheerful character to pass a difficult track on his bike. Along the way, you need to overcome all sorts of obstacles and try to collect all the stars and various bonuses. The game is against the clock, so don’t relax.
title: My Pony My Little Race

content: After starting Stardoll Dress Up game you will see Snow White who lives in the forest. You need to come up with a new outfit for her, complementing it with stylish accessories. Do not forget about the hairstyle, because even living in a dense forest, you want to look as impressive as possible. Especially when it comes to the princess!
title: My Pretty Doll Dress Up

content: Work on the appearance of a pretty girl who wants to become even more beautiful. To do this, at your disposal is a large number of various cosmetics and chic outfits. You can also change the hairstyle, which allows you to create the most harmonious options. Experiment more boldly!
title: My Zodiac Makeup

content: After launching the Nail Salon game for girls, you have to work on the nails of cute girls. To get started, choose one of the three charms, which you will do a manicure. Then it remains only to process the nails, having carried out various useful procedures, removing the old varnish and giving the nails a shape. The final stage is the application of a new coating. At the same time, you can choose a monophonic option or stop at a nice pattern. And you can also add cute decorative elements to the nails of the heroine girl.
title: Nails Makeover

content: Naruto game for two is a fighting game in which you will have to fight against many different characters of the universe. First you need to choose who you will manage, then decide on the battle arena and, finally, start the battle. There are control instructions in the game, so it’s worth just talking a little about its mechanics. The battle itself in the game about Naruto for two is quite difficult, therefore it is very important to quickly memorize keyboard shortcuts that will allow you to deliver crushing blows to the enemy.
title: Naruto game for two

content: You are a car designer who urgently needs to present a new modern car for the Motor Show. For these purposes, you have been given a model of a Ford supercar. Try to apply all your design talents and tune the car so that it wins first place at the exhibition.
title: Nascar Racing

content: While playing Barbie Manicure you have to take care of the nails of a cute girl. To begin with, they must be put in order using special manicure tools. Next, you can proceed to the application of varnish. Choose the most suitable shade and paint your nails to make them look chic.
title: Natalie Nails Spa

content: Become a real hairdresser after launching this exciting game! There are two modes of passage: free and with tasks. In free mode, you can use your imagination and create any hairstyle you want. If you choose the second mode, then there you need to act according to the model, which is shown for a limited time.
title: Natalies Boho Real Haircuts

content: While playing Barbie Cafe you will help a pretty girl cope with the influx of customers and prepare a huge amount of delicious ice cream. This delicacy is made from many ingredients, so listen to the wishes of the client and prepare a special dessert for him. But keep in mind, the time of the game is limited, so you should hurry up.
title: Natalies Winter Treats

content: In this game, you will have to fight with enemies in the water, driving a speedboat.
title: Naval Wars game

content: Need for Speed ​​2014 is one of the racing variants of the famous car series. Gorgeous 3D graphics will make you feel like driving a real car and feel the drive of the competition. You have to compete with thousands of real players, which will be your friends or randomly selected racers. Racing in Need for Speed ​​2014 takes place in an amazing virtual world that is constantly changing. The variety of tracks and tasks Need For Speed ​​is simply amazing. There are more than 70 cars to choose from in the game, with the possibility of tuning them, buying and improving spare parts, detailed car settings. Up to 8 people can participate in NFS 2014 at the same time. There are also one-on-one competitions. There are races with the departure of the police (you can be in the place of the police). In addition, the Nedforspeed 2014 game impresses with a variety of possible races: ring, drift, sprint, checkpoints, elimination, trial, etc. Opponents are selected depending on the game rating, the level of training of the player and the class of the car.
title: Need for speed 2014 game

content: Games Tanks 6 will show you one of the rules of warfare. Never stand still when the battle is on. Stopped - consider hit. And in this game you should stick to just such a manner of conducting a shootout. There are many enemies, they have fast cars and they constantly attack. Control the tank with the arrow keys and constantly shoot at the enemy.
title: Neon Battle Tank

content: Shooting games for 4 years old are not provided, so they are not fully understood in this game. But there are funny cat characters that you need to control. There is a whole team in front of you, and it must be brought to the finish line in full force. Management is simple and is carried out only with the mouse. The stages are relatively short, but very varied. The game is distributed free of charge.
title: Neon Battleground

content: An exciting tank battle in which the winner is the one who has a more accurate eye and a good reaction. You have to develop your own battle strategy, which will take the enemy by surprise. Use the mouse to choose the trajectory of the projectile and open fire on the enemy. When shooting, do not forget to take into account the strength and direction of the wind.
title: Neon Tank Arena

content: The main feature of the game can be considered, perhaps, the mode for two players at the same time. In this case, someone will control Mario himself, and someone - his girlfriend. The task is simple, as in all Mario games - you need to reach the end of the level, collecting as many bonuses as possible and not sticking flippers together.
title: New Platform

content: In New Shooter you will control a space marine whose task is to infiltrate a Martian research facility. According to the command, a new biological weapon is being developed there. You have to destroy the secret laboratory. But for this you will have to fight with a lot of guards and defeat them.
title: New shooter game

content: In this game you are invited to protect your possessions. Choose one of the four kingdoms and start defending it. Your task is to set up defensive towers so that they turn into an effective barrier to advancing enemies. But this requires money. At the beginning of the game you will already have a small amount, and then you can replenish it with a reward for the destroyed enemies.
title: Nick Kingdoms

content: SpongeBob decided to learn how to surf and turned to the great surfer Jack Kahuna for help. But first, the yellow baby needs to harmonize his mind and the spirit of the sea. Help Bob learn the intricacies of the science of surfing and then demonstrate his skills in conquering the waves.
title: Nick Surfs Up

content: Imagine that SpongeBob got a job at a pizzeria. He is there all alone, and the clients are just like that. You need to help him serve everyone efficiently and on time. Carefully look at the order that the client makes. Then, very quickly, collect the necessary ingredients and click on the spatula - the pizza will go into the oven. If you make a mistake, throw the pizza in the trash.
title: Nickelodeon Cooking Contest

content: Before starting the game, you should watch a colorful introductory video. From it you will learn many funny legends associated with its main characters. This will be followed by a visual instruction (in Russian, by the way, language) and, finally, the game itself. As a matter of fact, this is far from a walker, but a real race with a bucket of sauce, which must be saved.
title: Nickelodeon Omg Zombies!

content: It’s safe to say that you’ve never seen anything scarier than mutant hamsters. They filled the city with themselves, and now your task is to kill every single creature. First-person view. All you see is the barrel of your gun. It’s simple: met a mutant - turn it into a puddle of green slime. But be careful - they shoot back.
title: Night Watchmen Stories Zombie Hospital

content: House of Nightmares is a game that can tickle your nerves, but at the same time, captivate for a very long time. The atmosphere in it is simply creepy, in the best traditions of horror: you light the way with only a lantern, the wind howls and there is no one in the strange building except … However, you will still meet her. Try not to die and get out. First-person view. Pay attention to the name of the TV. It’s a rare “Electron”!
title: Nightmare house game

content: The game “Nightpoint io” is a gambling shooter with a multiplayer mode and a top-down view. He offers you to control a soldier who is unlucky. The hero ended up in a world where a zombie apocalypse had just happened. After the uprising of the dead in the city, it is impossible to meet normal residents. They all turned into zombies, vile and bloodthirsty. Your task is to arm yourself with a firearm and run away from all this horror. Move around the game locations and destroy zombies that come across. As you progress through the game, you will be able to upgrade your character’s combat skills, making him stronger and more powerful. After each upgrade, he will be able to deal with crowds of enemies even faster. Before you rush into battle, in Nightpoint io you need to choose a skin for the hero, come up with a nickname for him and decide on the server.
title: Nightpoint io

content: Very dynamic and well drawn game. You can’t skip the intro video, but it’s short. Side view. The main character runs away from the pursuit of enemies. It is necessary to press a certain button in time (at the very beginning, the game itself will suggest which one) so that it jumps or slides. You need to reach the end of the level.
title: Ninja Hero Runner

content: During this game, unforgettable adventures await you, and in order to participate in them, you do not need anything but a mouse. You will turn into a fast and elusive ninja who must destroy enemies coming from all sides. Try not to hesitate so as not to miss any of the rivals, otherwise there is a risk of losing.
title: Ninja Mouse Game

content: After starting the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle Racing game, you will understand that mutant superheroes are not only perfect in martial arts, but also skateboard very well. Choose the character you will play as. It can be any of the turtles: Michelangelo, Raphael, Donatello, Leonardo. Control the hero moving along the race track and hitting jumps on the way. This will allow you to do some cool tricks, but you will need to quickly press exactly the buttons that appear on the screen.
title: Ninja Turtle Racing Game

content: This game imitates the ancient console known as “Nintendo”. In order to start the process, it is recommended to study the control buttons. They kind of mimic a gamepad. You can do this by clicking on the wrench icon in the pop-up panel. Well, as for the passage, the gamer is waiting for a quest walker.
title: nintendo rabid bunnies game

content: Only professionals can participate in arctic races. Surf the snowy expanses on a motorcycle or ATV in this exciting game. Climb and descend the snowy hills without falling or flipping over. Do not forget to collect bonuses that will provide you with additional benefits.
title: Nitro motocross game

content: Gemma Atkinson needs medical attention. The fact is that her teeth hurt a lot, and only you can act as a dentist. The task is to use the proposed tools for their intended purpose. Tips on the screen will definitely help you in this exciting process.
title: Noelle Real Dentist

content: After starting this game, you have to work in a hairdresser. Clients come here all the time to change their hairstyle. Your task is to give the girls exactly what they want. Try to act as quickly as possible, otherwise clients may get angry because of the long wait and leave.
title: Noelles Real Haircuts

content: Paint game will give you the opportunity to turn a black and white drawing into a color image. Today you will color a cute kitten. It is necessary to combine the colors chosen for coloring in such a way that they look natural. To do this, you have at your disposal an amazing palette of colors and a variety of brushes. The game is controlled with the mouse. When you’re done, don’t be surprised. A miracle will happen, the kitten will come to life, and you will be able to play with him on the green lawn, running after the ball or jumping over obstacles.
title: Oceania Princess Moana Face Art

content: In this exciting game, you become a student of truck driving courses. Carefully follow the prompts that appear on the game screen and follow them unquestioningly. Try to put the truck in the parking space within the limited time in each of the stages of the game.
title: Off Road Cargo Drive Simulator

content: This game is designed specifically for boys. You have a choice of 16 pictures with cars of different brands. You can color them in any order. Pick up a brush, or rather, a mouse, and get to work. In order to paint a certain part of the car in the selected color, just click on it with the left mouse button.
title: Off-Road Coloring Book

content: The events that take place during the game Horror 2015 take place in an abandoned old house. You have to get into the building late at night, find twenty bags of money and escape. But problems, as always, arise suddenly, as the house may not have guards or surveillance cameras, but it is full of ghosts that kill everyone indiscriminately. The idea of ​​Horror 2015 is to explore every corner of the building, collecting finds while trying to avoid strange situations. If you notice that the furniture begins to shake or strange sounds are heard, it’s time to run.
title: Office Horror Story

content: Once Ben-10 decided to conquer the off-road in his huge jeep. He chose difficult routes, with many steep climbs and dangerous descents. In some areas, you will have to use a useful feature of any good SUV - downshifting. In the case of a difficult ascent to the slope, you should press the spacebar, and the jeep will be able to climb to the very top.
title: Offroad Dirt Racing 3D

content: The Monster Truck game will give you the opportunity to drive a powerful jeep with huge wheels and destroy everything that is possible on your way. Run it soon and start earning points. To do this, you will have to destroy obstacles and blow up other people’s cars. To jump on hydraulics, use the “space” key on your keyboard.
title: OffRoad Extreme Car Racing

content: monster truck
title: Offroad Monster Trucks

content: Racing in the countryside is gaining popularity, and today you decided to try for yourself what it really is. Now you have to drive along a dirt road, overcoming the required number of laps and trying not to let your rivals overtake you. To do this, you need to ideally take turns, without flying off the track.
title: Offroad Racer

content: This wonderful game is dedicated to the cartoon “Cars”. In it you can perfectly train your memory. Several rows of cards are displayed on the screen, and you need to turn them over to find the same pictures of cars. The goal of the game is to find all pairs of cartoon characters.
title: Offroad Trucks Memory

content: A young girl is getting ready for school and she needs a cute hairstyle. Help the heroine of the game transform using a variety of means and tools. Game tips will help you understand the hairdressing process. Follow them, and then you will definitely get the intended result.
title: Olivia Real Haircuts

content: After starting the game, the Witch is preparing a potion, you will see Gulia, a student of the school of monsters. She decided to make a cocktail according to a secret recipe. And you are invited to know this very recipe. Throw the ball into the proposed design so that it collects as many fruits and other ingredients as possible during the flight.
title: Olivias Magic Potion Shop

content: Your character is an alien sheriff, very similar to Western characters. The action takes place on his home planet. You need to kill monsters, and at the same time stay alive. With the collected money, you will be able to purchase more powerful weapons over time. If you are wondering why all the cheese is boron, see the introduction and read the text under the pictures.
title: One Hand Cowboy

content: You have to, driving a small plane, break through to your base, which will not be so easy, because hundreds of enemy planes are moving towards you. Destroy the enemy and collect the coins that have fallen out of him. With this money you can buy extra lives, new weapons and equipment for the aircraft. During the battle, make sure that the gun does not overheat, otherwise problems cannot be avoided.
title: One Man Invasion

content: In this game, you can take a break from completing abstruse quests, leveling up the magical skills of characters and sharpening swords. Instead, you are invited to ride a car and destroy everything around. At the end of the race, you can even detonate a bomb to achieve maximum destruction. The goal is to Crazy Games as many points as possible before the time runs out.
title: Open world driving game

content: It cannot be said that you have a real open-world game in front of you, because it does have certain boundaries. But, nevertheless, a pleasant pastime is guaranteed. At your disposal will be a character armed initially with a sword. Then it will be possible to pick up another weapon (by the way, it affects objects differently). Walk, fight monsters, collect treasures.
title: Open world game

content: After starting this game, you will transform into a doctor-surgeon who knows a lot about the most complex operations. You were approached by a guy who injured his shoulder. It is necessary to urgently examine the patient, and then carry out an operation that will help to correct the situation and eliminate damage as soon as possible.
title: Operate Now Shoulder Surgery

content: In this game, you become a famous plastic surgeon who is going to have a very difficult operation. An overweight girl came to your clinic, dreaming of correcting her figure with the help of surgery. Carefully examine the patient, conduct all the necessary tests, and then proceed to the operation.
title: Ordinary Girls Cosmetic Surgery

content: This game will please you not only with graphics and sound, but also with original modes in which you have to compete with a lot of opponents. Management is not original, but exciting tasks at each level will make you linger for a long time at the computer monitor and bring great pleasure.
title: Overload game

content: While playing Shooting 4D, you meet a boy who loves to collect candy for Halloween. Unfortunately, his younger brother ruined his costume, and the hero of the game had to go hunting for his favorite treat with a single water gun. Walking through the streets, he accidentally wandered into the farthest part of the city, where there was an abandoned house. Going inside, the character of the game fell into another dimension. Help the boy escape from this nightmare.
title: Paintball Gun Pixel 3D

content: In the course of the game for boys Airplanes you have to become a pilot of an ultra-modern fighter. These machines are the first to defend the air spaces at the slightest danger to the state. In modern warfare, a high-speed and well-armed aircraft plays a big role. Pilots are the first to take on enemy attacks and become a shield for the enemy army. In this game for kids, your task is not to let the invader into your territory. In this case, you need to destroy enemy ships that are moving towards your shores. Use the arrow keys to control your fighter jet to shoot down enemy warships. But be careful, the aggressor can defend himself. If you survive the first level of this cool game for boys, you will get new weapons.
title: Panda Commander

content: Airplanes game is a very realistic and exciting shooter. You have to control a military fighter, and your task is to destroy enemy military equipment. First you need to choose a pilot, then decide on a suitable aircraft model, equip it with the necessary weapons and ammunition. After that, you can start the mission. If you have already raised your winged machine into the sky, then get down to business - destroy enemy objects, adjust artillery fire, intercept enemy bombers and engage in heated battles with enemy pilots. And here the skill of the pilot of the aircraft comes to the fore. Use arrow keys to control. Button H - open fire. After finishing the level, you will have the opportunity to upgrade your fighter.
title: Panda Commander Air Combat

content: The departments of the supermarket are a terrible mess, and the store should not be left in this state. Start a thorough cleaning to restore the normal state of things. Throw out the trash, put all the goods in their places, remove the dirt. The task is given a limited time, you can follow it on the scale at the bottom of the screen.
title: Panda Manager

content: The game “Papar io” is simple in essence and in execution, but very difficult to pass. The goal is to capture territory and expand their possessions. At the very beginning, the user has only a small base - Papar. This is a square of a certain color. A dot begins to move from it, leaving a trail behind it. By controlling it using the keyboard, the gamer must return the tip of the “tail” to the base. When the line closes, everything that is inside it will turn into “your” color and become part of your territory. But if one of the participants of “Papar io” crashes into the track before you close it at the base, the game will end.
title: Papar.io game

content: In this game, you turn into a funny paper man created on a piece of paper by an artist from a small publishing house. Try to get out of the building, destroying all your aggressive tribesmen on the way with a pistol. Be careful, your opponents are also armed with paper weapons and are very dangerous.
title: Paper Battle

content: Our character found himself in a large cave, which can be explored for a very long time. After passing the first level of the Paper Minecraft game, it will become known that you are not alone in this dungeon. To survive, you need to learn how to use a basic set of tools and be able to create not only weapons, but also protective armor. When you start playing, use the WASD keys to move the hero and the left mouse button to build in Minecraft. To select the desired item, press the buttons with the numbers 1 and 2. The M key will open the map, and Q will open the inventory.
title: Paper Minecraft

content: Thousands of gamers from all over the world can play the multiplayer online game “Paper io” for free and at the same time. The more participants, the more difficult and interesting. You will have to compete with both beginners and those who already know how to successfully copy someone else’s territory.
title: Paper.io games

content: During the GTA Taxi game, you will have to drive around one of the largest cities in the world. You need to pick up passengers and take them to the specified destinations. The amount of money you earn depends on the time of the trip. The faster you deliver customers, the more tips you get. For more convenient orientation in the city, you need to follow the red arrow. During trips, fuel may run out, which will be notified by a special sensor, or the car may break down. In this case, the GTA Taxi game gives you the opportunity to look at a gas station or service station.
title: Park The Taxi

content: Once again, gamers are encouraged to practice putting toy cars in the parking lot. View in the game from above, control is standard. For something, a steering wheel is drawn in the lower right corner. There are two serious limitations in the game: a timer in the form of a bar in the upper right and the number of collisions. You can only collide once: the first and the last.
title: Park Your Car

content: During the game Parking cars with a steering wheel and pedals, it will not be possible to get rid of the usual four buttons with arrows. Here you will come across an imitation of driving a car. You can switch the view: from the third person and from the first, that is, from the cockpit. Many levels are waiting for you. The task for each of them is the same - to drive the car into the parking space. By the way, the ride will not be around the city, but on the training ground. The execution conditions gradually become more complicated: first you need to drive in a straight line, but then the cars are parked from different initial positions. Maneuver time is limited.
title: Parking

content: In this game you are waiting for logic puzzles. It is necessary to put the fire engine in its parking space, but this is prevented by a large number of cars. Move these cars in such a way as to make room for the fire engine to move. If something doesn’t work, you can always start over.
title: Parking fire truck game

content: It is unlikely that the game Car Parking will teach you how to properly park your car in the parking lot. You can learn this only in a driving school, or on your own, but in any case through a long and hard training. And in this case, parking cars is just fun. So, you need to put the car in the specified place. In this case, you need to park correctly, that is, according to the inscriptions “back” and “front”. After one more or less successful parking, another will immediately follow. Heavy traffic adds to the challenge.
title: Parking Fury

content: So, in this game you will learn how to work as a parking attendant again (and what if you don’t want to learn anything else?). The task is as follows: in the allotted time, it is necessary to overtake the cars parked at the curb to the parking lot. First you have to get into one of the cars, and then start driving it. Do it carefully, because after three collisions comes a game over.
title: Parking Fury 3

content: The game Car Driving Simulator 3D Instructor was developed by leading specialists of the famous training center in Moscow. Thanks to it, you will be able to quickly navigate the implementation of the “Check in Boxing” exercise on the training ground.
title: Parking Fury 3D

content: The splash screen in the game is promising. True, it does not really reflect the gaming reality. And it is such that for a start you can choose a police car (only elite options here). Next, you have to put the car in place in the shortest time and not break it at the same time. If you are not satisfied with the results of the completed stage, you can restart it.
title: Parking Fury 3D Bounty Hunter

content: The developers of the game offer you to try to park vintage cars. The game has enough levels to kill your free time and see plenty of vintage cars from above. As you progress in the game, the levels will become more difficult. In addition, there is a timer and you need to invest in a certain time.
title: Parking Fury 3D Night Thief

content: The process of the game for girls Car Parking, if it differs from the boyish options, is only cartoonish. The game can’t be called easy. In addition to the difficult driving, there is also a timer. That is, the task must be completed within the allotted time. The task itself is to overtake the Scooby Doo minibus from point A to point B and park. At the same time, even a slight collision with the curb leads to damage to the machine. Two or three hits - and the bus will turn into trash, and the task will fail. Such games for girls will be useful because they develop spatial thinking.
title: Parking Panic

content: Get ready to try your luck in super dangerous parkour. You will find a distance of many segments with different decorations and tasks. Before each new test, you can save your progress by touching the flag. If you want to win, you have to be careful. Despite the fact that at any second your character may die, the ultimate goal of the game is not to survive, but to collect five gold stars. You can get them only by completing tasks at additional game locations. The entrance there is through the portals of the starting room.
title: Parkour 30 levels

content: While playing War Shooters 1941 1945 you get to know one of the experienced scouts who is ordered to get into the enemy’s secret base. Go on a mission together with a brave warrior. Try to go through all the stages of this exciting shooting game 1943 war against the Germans, destroy the maximum number of enemy soldiers and destroy the ammunition depots. Be careful and hide from the eyes of vigilant guards until the last moment. Carefully inspect the locations you enter, find ways to get close to the enemy and destroy him. Thanks to your heroic actions, the most difficult task will be completed, and the hero will receive another promotion in rank and a well-deserved reward. You can play this game on your own or with friends.
tags: About the war with the Germans
title: Partisans

content: Any representative of the fair sex always wants to look attractive and fashionable. Game for girls Dress Up invites you to work a little as a stylist and create new spectacular images for the heroine. You have a huge variety of clothes at your disposal, and you can combine any elements of the wardrobe as you wish. The result will be incredibly spectacular! And do not forget to pay attention to the compatibility of the selected parts of the image.
title: Party Time Ocean Princesses

content: Thanks to the patterns on the surface of the chips (they depict different sweets), this mahjong variant is suitable for children. Otherwise, everything is the same as in the classic game. To get started, choose one of the layout options and get started. Time to pass is unlimited, so you can think as much as you like. You can also use the hint button.
title: PartyJong

content: All drawing lovers will enjoy the process of the game for children Coloring for 6 years. In it, you need to work on the image of a strongman lifting a barbell. All available colors are displayed at the bottom of the screen, and you can select any of them, and then click on the piece of the picture you want to color.
title: Paw Patrol Coloring Book

content: While playing Paw Patrol, you have to control a superhero dog. He needs to free his people from the cats who seized power by deceit. Move around the locations trying to collect as much dog food as possible. A certain number of packages of the specified color will give you superpowers.
title: Paw Patrol Smash

content: Game Football 2015 will give you the opportunity to become the central figure of the world championship. True, you won’t have to participate in all the matches of the championship, it’s enough just to spend a number of dangerous moments. You have to catch the pass, handle the ball and try to finish the combination successfully by scoring a goal. Be careful and attentive, your football rivals 2015 have a very professional goalkeeper and sometimes even a defender manages to get to the goal, who, of course, will try to stop you. Try to beat nine professional teams and take the top step of the podium, rubbing your nose against the rest.
title: Penalty Shoot-Out

content: The Flying Penguin game invites you to be smart, using the help of your feathered brothers. The task is to lift the penguin into the air. At the first level, this is easy to do - you just need to click on the bird and it will fly. But further her flight will be hindered by obstacles in the form of wooden bars and sharp needles.
title: Penguin Adventure

content: The penguins lived peacefully at their South Pole and enjoyed every day. But the unexpected happened: they were attacked by polar bears. Two brave penguin friends came to the defense of the whole flock. Help them defeat enemies and reclaim their native lands. Use the A and D keys to control. W button - jump. Button S - pick up props.
title: Penguin Fish Run

content: The game Penguins will tell you about birds that cannot fly, but feel like fish underwater. This innate ability helps penguins get their own food. After all, they feed mainly on small fish. Our penguin game has one interesting feature. This is an inversion. To turn left, you must press the right arrow key, and vice versa. Acting in this way, you have to help the little penguin catch as many fish as possible. But be careful, do not forget to dodge predatory jellyfish and other dangerous inhabitants of the sea.
title: Penguins Jigsaw

content: The game Peppa Pig Basketball will allow you to take part in a dynamic competition along with the pigs. Use your mouse to choose the direction and strength of the ball. The more of them in the basket, the better the result will be. Try not to make mistakes and aim accurately, trying to Crazy Games a goal and win the attention of the public.
title: Peppa Pig basketball game

content: Educational game will turn you into a real artist who knows a lot about a variety of colors. Several painted Easter eggs are displayed on the screen. Half of each is painted, while the other half is still in black and white. You need to arm yourself with a brush, dip in a suitable paint, and then apply it to the correct area. Very fun and educational activity! Color all the halves of the eggs, and then click on the “Check” button. After that, you will know if your actions were correct or if a mistake was made somewhere.
title: Peppa Pig Pop And Spell

content: Make a great cake for the holidays! To do this, you have all the necessary ingredients at your disposal. Handle them as indicated in the prompts that appear on the screen. As a result, you will definitely get an excellent dessert, which will not be difficult to prepare in real life. Shall we try?
title: Perfect Cake Master

content: And again the theme of prom dresses. This time you need to dress up the girl so that she will definitely receive the audience award and become the queen of the prom. If you find it difficult to harmoniously select the details of the costume, look at the ready-made options by clicking on the question mark image.
title: Perfect Prom Dressup

content: Favorite reindeer of Princess Elsa - the famous heroine of the cartoon “Frozen”, fell through the ice. The brave girl managed to pull it out, but the unfortunate animal is in a terrible state. Carefully inspect the deer, determine what medical procedures he needs to do and start treatment as soon as possible.
title: Pet Run

content: Like all other Tamagotchi games, this one involves taking care of pets. First, the user needs to choose a cat. The whole process of passing comes down to meeting the needs of the fluffy. Pay attention to the top of the screen: three sets of symbols with stripes. Try to make sure that the stripes do not decrease to zero.
title: Pet Salon Kitty Care

content: If you like good music, then this game will give you a chance to try yourself as a musician or even a composer. By pressing the piano keys, you can repeat a simple melody or play something of your own. The game will also help develop hearing and show musical abilities at any age. The only drawback is the ability to press the keys only one at a time.
title: Piano Helix Jump

content: After starting the game Music on the piano, you will see Disney princesses. They invite you to come up with your own melodies. Click on the microphone button and start recording. Just play the already familiar compositions on the virtual piano or try to compose your own. When you finish this process, the finished music can be listened to. A total of three slots are available for recording melodies. Of course, if you suddenly don’t like an option, you can always delete it. Become a great pianist!
title: Piano Online

content: In this game you have to make ice cream, but not in the usual way. Control a girl holding a waffle cup in her hand to catch falling ice cream balls and ice cream decorations. Try to move in such a way that nothing falls on the floor. For successful actions you will receive points.
title: Pie Realife Cooking

content: In the game for kids 5 years old for girls you will need to help Belle return the prince to his normal appearance. To do this, you have to resort to magic. The problem is that no one knows the exact composition of the monster transformation potion. Therefore, in the children’s game, you will have to act experimentally. Mix any four of the proposed components to end up with a bubbling drink. The monster will drink the potion, but it is far from certain that he will immediately be able to turn into a handsome prince.
title: Pig Family Dress Up

content: Bright and cheerful game “Piranh io” is an example of a project that helps to relax after work or study. As the name implies, the main characters in it are toothy bloodthirsty piranhas. View from above. Management - with the mouse and the spacebar, which activates various temporary abilities. For example, a laser beam. Such skills can be obtained randomly by eating a gift. The goal is to grow your fish, gain points and levels. Of course, there will be many competitors at the location, because the project is multi-user. In the best traditions of io.
title: Piranh io

content: Did you know that among the famous pirates of past centuries there were women? Probably, one of them served as a prototype for the heroine of this game. You need to dress up a pirate girl for sea voyages and battles. To do this, on the mast on the left side of the screen there are icons of different departments of the wardrobe. Pick up the details of the pirate costume so that they fit together in the best way.
title: Pirate Princess Halloween Dress Up

content: While playing Horror 2, you have to fight with square-headed zombies that have filled all the surroundings. They attack in crowds, so do not stand still, but constantly move, choosing a convenient position for shooting. Try to hit the red barrels - they explode and destroy all the dead that are nearby.
title: Pirates vs Zombies

content: In front of you is a multifunctional shooting range with a variety of targets. You can choose your location for training - be it a gym or an open area. As you decide, you will get access to several types of pistols. But do not rush to spend all the ammo. First aim well and fire a couple of shots to get used to the weapon.
title: Pistol training game

content: Zd
title: Pixel Apocalypse Infection Bio

content: After the appearance of an unknown virus, the cities of Japan were filled with bloodthirsty monsters. The army cannot cope with the hordes of the dead, the country’s leadership turned to you with a request for help. Go to the most dangerous areas of the metropolis, destroy monsters and destroy their nests. In this game you can play together with your friend, erasing twice as many zombies from the face of the earth and covering each other from enemy attacks.
title: Pixel Apocalypse: New Adventure

content: Fights in the sky are getting fiercer, the only way to get the upper hand in air combat is to use the latest fighters. Thanks to improved engines and weapons, your aircraft is capable of single-handedly fighting an entire enemy army. Use arrow keys to control. Space button - shot.
title: Pixel Battle Royale Multiplayer

content: The game Infinity War 2 tells about the confrontation of the ancient dynasties. You have to choose one of the commanders and try to expand your own land. Starting from a small province, gradually capture one surrounding settlement after another, creating a new, rich and powerful country. The main task of each battle is to destroy the enemy leader.
title: Pixel Gun Apocalypse 5

content: In this game, you become a recruit for a special forces unit and go to the training ground in order to prepare for combat missions. Follow the instructor’s recommendations, try out your new weapons in training battles and learn how to throw grenades correctly. Complete all the tasks offered to you by the leadership, and prepare for action in combat conditions.
title: Pixel Gun Apocalypse 6

content: In this game you will go in search of an ancient Minecraft artifact that is hidden in the depths of a huge labyrinth. Load your gun and explore the huge rooms of the ancient temple, where nightmarish monsters lurk. Try to destroy all the monsters and find the greatest treasure of the pixel world.
title: Pixel Gun Apocalypse 7

content: At the very beginning of this shooting game for boys aged 9, you can choose one of three characters. Each of them has its own specialization (medic, commando, attack aircraft) and, accordingly, characteristics and weapons. Next, you can choose the mode of passage: campaign or quick match. But the essence will still be the same: kill everyone, collect cartridges and first-aid kits.
title: Pixel Gun: Apocalypse

content: Many drivers are capable of driving at full speed on the highway, but only the best of them know how to drift. The Car Racing Minecraft game has a limited time to complete each level, and you need to try to go through many tight turns using the handbrake at speeds of over 100 miles per hour, leaving your opponent far behind. Get behind the wheel of a sports car and go for fame and money.
title: Pixel Rally 3D

content: Mindfulness game. In front of you are five multi-colored light bulbs that light up alternately. You have to remember where the flashes were and repeat them one after the other in the correct sequence. There are no time limits in the game, so you have a lot of chances to win. But keep in mind, with each new level the game becomes more difficult.
title: Pixel Soldier Memory

content: In this exciting game, you will find puzzles on the theme of the Lego constructor so beloved by many. Choose any of the proposed pictures and start the puzzle. Arrange the pieces in the correct order to get the selected image. Parts can be turned over if necessary, if it is not possible to install them in the picture in their original position.
title: Pixel Soldiers Jigsaw

content: In the peculiar world of the Minecraft GTA 5 game, you play the role of a thief who was able to rob a bank. Now he is waiting for a dynamic action that requires the manifestation of ingenuity and dexterity. You’ve done half the work, the money’s in your car. Now the main thing is to safely get away from the police chase. Try to escape from pursuit as quickly as possible without crashing into obstacles on the way. To control the world of GTA 5, only two arrow keys “left” and “right” are used. Collect bonuses that will help you finish the level.
title: Pixel Stories 1: Young Blood

content: In this game you have to try to escape from the police after a successful bank robbery. Your car is controlled by just two keys - “left” and “right”. Survive the mini chase as long as you can, you might even be able to set a time record. The main thing is not to crash into anything in the excitement.
title: Pixel Stories 2: Night of Payoff

content: According to the plot of the Minecraft 15 game, you need to help a funny creature get out of the underground labyrinths. Dangerous adventures, clever traps and terrible monsters await you on your way to freedom. Destroy the monsters with the weapons provided in the game and do not forget to collect the treasures located in the depths of the labyrinths.
title: Pixel Survival

content: The game takes you to a terrible dimension that has been taken over by zombies. In order to escape from this nightmare, you need to get to the science center. The quarter created in it is able to bring you back. Along the way, you need to destroy entire hordes of bloodthirsty dead, who dream of feasting on your flesh.
title: Pixel SWAT Zombie Survival

content: The game Infinity War 7 will take you to the battlefield where you need to destroy all enemy forces with minimal damage to yourself. But for starters, it does not hurt to collect the maximum number of lives and stock up on ammunition. For intermediate victories in the endless war, you will receive promotions and unlock new opportunities for your character.
title: Pixel Toonfare 3D

content: You play on behalf of a special agent of the ninja task force, whose task is to carry out a secret intelligence operation. There is information that a large-scale creation of nuclear weapons has begun in North Korea in order to prepare for a long-planned war. Use your skills to destroy all blueprints and documents of the secret laboratory.
title: Pixel Warfare 4 WebGL

content: War 2
title: Pixel Warfare 5

content: The essence of the game for two Shooters against zombies is that you just need to stop the horde of the dead heading into the city. This exciting flash toy allows you to create warriors and send them along the selected paths towards the enemy. Use the money you earn from battles to buy new troops and equip them with more powerful weapons.
title: Pixel Warrior

content: The game Infinity War 5 will give you the opportunity to control a war elephant. In the Middle Ages, more powerful weapons did not exist. With the help of this animal, you can crush any kind of enemy troops. Archers, sitting on a special platform on the back of an elephant, release clouds of arrows. Your job is to give them a target.
title: Pixel Wars Of Hero

content: War & Peace 2 is a fast-paced shooter set in the distant future. You have to defend your base, sitting in a trench and repelling numerous enemy attacks. It’s good that you have an ultra-modern plasma rifle at your disposal. It is also possible to improve weapons, upgrade armor and upgrade skills.
title: Pixelar Vehicle Wars

content: Today you have to take care of princesses Rapunzel and Elsa. They are both going to be mothers. First you need to choose one girl and play mini-games with her. Find your mom-to-be’s favorite food, sing a lullaby for your baby, make a vitamin cocktail. At the next level, you will play the role of a doctor performing a medical examination.
title: Pixie Pregnant Check Up

content: Freddy’s Pizzeria game invites you to help the chef feed his many customers with delicious pizza. After receiving an order from a client, look in the recipe book how this dish is prepared. Use all the ingredients and sauces exactly according to the recipe, put them on the base and send the pizza to the microwave. But be careful and try not to confuse the components. After the pizza is ready, pack it in a box and give it to the customer. And try to serve as many customers as possible at Freddy’s Pizzeria.
title: Pizza Bar

content: Today you will have to work in the hottest spot in the city - a popular pizzeria. A lot of people dream of enjoying delicious local pizza. And behind the counter today you work alone. Carefully monitor what order the buyer makes, quickly prepare pizza, pack it and give it to the client.
title: Pizza Cafe

content: Would you like to make pizza according to your own recipe? Then get down to business. First, arrange your workplace: choose the color of the tablecloth and plate. Then we proceed to the most interesting - the filling. It can be meat or sweet pizza. When everything is ready, decorate the dish with the additional ingredients located on the right.
title: Pizza Challenge

content: Papas Pizzeria is a great simulation game that will teach you how to cook delicious pizza. There are many recipes for preparing this dish, all of which have been changed more than once and supplemented with new ingredients, but the base has always remained the same - dough, ketchup and grated cheese.
title: Pizza Mania

content: During the game Dad’s Pizza Restaurant you have to visit a small establishment where they cook an amazing Italian dish. That is why there is simply no end to customers here. You can even try making pizza yourself. On the right is a sample. Try to repeat it exactly using the dough and products on the left.
title: Pizza Ninja

content: After starting the game, you will transform into a real chef who knows a lot about Italian delicacies. Now you will be asked to cook a delicious 4 cheese pizza. For this, the kitchen already has everything you need. You just have to follow the steps in the recipe. Hints will help!
title: Pizza Party

content: You have to help the chef by preparing super delicious pizza and delighting customers. You need to act quickly before the buyer’s patience runs out and he leaves without lunch. At your disposal there is a detailed book of recipes and a complete set of necessary products and spices. If anything from the list runs out, you can immediately order and buy it.
title: Pizza Realife Cooking

content: You have to become a pilot of a small sports plane and demonstrate various tricks in the air. When performing aerobatics, the pilot experiences huge overloads. Therefore, it is very important not to lose control of the aircraft. Otherwise something bad will happen. Follow the arrows, they will indicate the route of movement.
title: Plane Go

content: While playing Airplanes for Kids you will have to take a keyboard training course. You become the pilot of a small plane that goes on an air journey. Your flight is divided into many separate stages, each of which will have to make your way through armies of enemy airships and balloons. In order to destroy the enemy, you need to type on the keyboard the letters indicated on the balloon. It is thanks to children’s games about airplanes that you can learn how to type quickly and correctly in English.
title: Planes Coloring Book

content: The Earth has been taken over by strange creatures and only you can deal with them. Control a powerful fighter plane, launch projectiles in such a way as to hit enemies and destroy them. Try to act as quickly as possible - no opponent should leave the battlefield on their own. In response, you will also be attacked, so be careful.
title: Planes vs. Invaders game for two

content: Help the funny ball go through all the dangerous levels and save your little brothers! Control the round character without falling into traps or touching enemies. If this suddenly happens, then one game life will be lost. But their supply can be replenished by picking up a heart. Keys open the door to the next level.
title: Plasticine Bubbles

content: The tank division was surrounded, only your car was lucky to remain unharmed. Drive through the minefield, trying to avoid explosive charges. To do this, you will need to solve a math example and guide the tank along a safe road. Click on the box with the correct answer - and this area will be cleared.
title: Plated Glory

content: Dressing up a superhero from some famous movie or TV series has already happened. But to come up with your own superman - such an opportunity in games is extremely rare. But you’re in luck. Create your character, dress him up in a super suit, come up with a name, then save or print the picture. And then invite your friends to make the hero cooler than yours.
title: Pocket Anime Maker

content: The Police Car Parking game sends you to the police academy where you have to take a course to drive police supercars. Choose one of the cars and go to the training ground. Try to pass all the tests of this course and prove that you are one of the best police drivers in your area.
title: police car parking game

content: An ordinary toy in which you have to put the car in the parking lot and keep within thirty seconds. The main feature is that retro cars will have to be parked. Although, given the view from above, you will not see anything special. Another curious feature: while you are parking, some bastard is trying to take your place.
title: Police Parking

content: Sitting behind the wheel of your car, you need to make every effort to get away from the police. The game consists of several levels with different race conditions. But in each of them, you must definitely pass through several checkpoints and not be caught. But remember, if you hesitate for a second, the cop cars will immediately block you.
title: Police Stunt Cars

content: You have to overcome the circles of the race track for a while. The track is considered passed if it is possible to break the set record. But the competition takes place in different conditions: wet asphalt, gravel, snow and ice, and sometimes all together in one race. Only a true professional can win them.
title: Police Traffic

content: Roger is a master of his craft. He is able to change any car beyond recognition. No wonder he has a lot of clients.
title: Police vs Thief: Hot Pursuit

content: After starting this game, you will find yourself in a hairdressing salon, where all the necessary tools have already been prepared. Your client will be a charming girl with long hair who wants to get an original hairstyle. Follow the hints of the game and use all the indicated items to achieve the perfect result.
title: Polynesian Princess Real Haircuts

content: Very tasty game. It is not recommended to use it on an empty stomach. After all, you will have to cook not some kind of salad, but a sweet, fragrant, most delicate cake. Doing this is relatively easy. It is enough to move the cursor and click the mouse where the hint finger points. When you’re done playing, try to surprise your mom with a new dish.
title: Pony Cooking Rainbow Cake

content: In this game you have to take care of a cute horse. The process consists of several stages. First you need to wash the pony using shampoo and other auxiliaries. Next, the horse has to be dried and combed. The final step will be the choice of a mane, tail, saddle, pattern on the body.
title: Pony Dress Up

content: Pinkie Pie and Fluttershy are in trouble, they are put in a cage by a villain. While playing Mighty Ponies, you will need to control horses that have taken the form of superheroes and save their comrades. There are many exciting levels ahead, in each of which you need to find several comics while avoiding attacks by enemy ponies. In order to stop powerful opponents, try to shoot them with a magic charge. Often useful items will also come across, for example, an extra life or increased time.
title: Pony Fly In A Fantasy World

content: According to the plot of the Pony game to collect the elements of harmony, the sorceress Gloomy Sparkle read, in the presence of her girlfriends, an ancient spell that broke the precious stones of the fragile world harmony. Now the little sorceress has to find all the pieces and restore the stones. The game Friendship is a miracle elements of harmony invites you to help her in her search. On your journey you will visit five locations, in each of which you will need to demonstrate dexterity and good reaction. On each level, pony friends will help you in your search. Overcome all the obstacles and connect the disparate pieces of the elements of harmony as quickly as possible, because without them the kingdom of fairy-tale ponies turned out to be deprived of any protection. Once the issue is resolved, Twilight Sparkle will apologize to her friends and promise to never test unknown spells in their presence again.
title: Pony game to collect the elements of harmony

content: A sweet girl decided to radically change her hairstyle. Choose one of the options that you like the most and get to work. The task is to finally get the intended result, that is, the hairstyle that is shown in the sample picture. You’ve got all the tools you need!
title: Pony Girl Hair Salon

content: After starting the game, you will meet a charming girl named Sofia. She invites you to make great ice cream together. Choose any kind of dessert, add toppings, sprinkles, berries, and other decorative elements. If you create three ice creams according to the proposed sample, then a secret bonus awaits you.
title: Pony Ice Cream Cone

content: After starting the game Dress Up My Little Equestria Girl Pony, you will see Sapphire Shores, a minor character in the animated series. She took on a human form and really wants to get a fashionable outfit, like a real girl. Help Sapphire change and choose the right hairstyle for her. You can change your hair color!
title: Pony Pet Salon

content: Pregnant women need special attention, and this time you will have to work with the future mom. The task is to examine the patient, carry out all the necessary procedures for diagnosis and prescribe the correct treatment. For this, the necessary items are already prepared on the screen.
title: Pony Rarity Baby Birth

content: Little ponies lost their jewelry, and not only did they disappear, but fell apart into several pieces. During the Pony School Adventure game for girls, you need to carefully explore the location in order to find the lost items and collect decorations. The school adventure consists of several levels, and on each of them you have to help one of the ponies. Moreover, the horse itself will help you in especially difficult situations. For example, Applejack can shake apples off the trees, and Fluttershy is good at negotiating with animals.
title: Pony school adventure game for girls

content: During the game Pony Song you will see all the heroines of your favorite animated series who are going to celebrate the victory over evil. On this occasion, they are going to have a dance party! Help the pony learn all the necessary moves by clicking on the objects at the moment when they merge with the template. The game has two scales: one of them displays the duration of the song, and the second displays your successful attempts and mistakes. If you make mistakes too often, then the songs and dances of the pony will be interrupted, and the attempt will have to be repeated.
title: Pony song game

content: In this game you find yourself in ancient dungeons created by the Mayan people. In order to get out of here, you need to solve a logical puzzle. Try to destroy the colored balls blocking the entrance to the next levels of this exciting toy. To do this, you need to collect chains of the same color balls.
title: Pop Stone 2

content: Another game that will not only entertain girls, but also help them to show all their creative abilities to the fullest. And, in addition, in the process of passing it will be possible to master the main stages of tailoring dresses. So, from the very beginning, it is possible to model an outfit on a mannequin, and then bring the idea to life using multi-colored fabrics.
title: Popstar Sneaker Designer

content: The process of the game for girls Barber Sony 2 will turn you into a beauty salon worker for free. Keep track of what your visitors want and provide them with the services they need. To pass each level, you need to earn the specified amount. Start playing right now!
title: Popular Cheer Hairstyles

content: If you hope that parking your car will be easier in the future, then this game will shatter all your dreams. That’s what she likes, so it’s graphics. As for the process itself, it is not bad either. The goal is to park the car. The physics here is almost the same as in reality. That is, you will have to taxi carefully, taking into account inertia and other factors.
title: Port Car Parking

content: Enemies are chasing SpongeBob and you need to help him get away from them. Drive a funny hamburger car and try not to let the enemy agents grab Bob. Your main task is to drive as far as possible. The distance traveled is displayed at the top of the screen.
title: Portal Chase

content: Have you ever had scary dreams? Another nightmarish night is coming soon, but not for you. Residents of a large house will be its victims, and you will get the role of a monster that frightens them. You will need to manage monsters and ghosts, create a real poltergeist and move things. The goal is to make the residents of this house scared to death.
title: Portal of Doom: Undead Rising

content: Regular Chinese mahjong often causes difficulties for beginners, and especially for the youngest users. The reason is simple: small drawings and hieroglyphs similar to each other. It also offers a somewhat simplified puzzle with clear for everyone, large pictures. By the way, it was also developed by the Chinese.
title: Power Mahjong The Tower

content: Pregnant Mommy Dress Up introduces you to a wonderful mom-to-be who needs help. She is just going to visit and can not choose the right clothes. During the free game for girls, you have to choose a beautiful outfit for the pregnant beauty. Do not forget to give her a stylish hairstyle and original makeup that will emphasize the natural heroine. The beauty will be grateful for the service rendered and, for sure, will turn to you more than once.
title: Pregnant Anne Dressing Room

content: The heroine of the game Giving birth to children in the hospital is going to become a mother any minute. Her child is already ready to be born, and you need to help him with this by performing an operation. On the screen you will see all the necessary tools that will be useful to you for medical intervention. Take the item that the arrow points to and perform the necessary actions, focusing on the prompts. There is nothing complicated in the game, and for a while you can feel like an obstetrician who knows exactly how to act when someone starts having children.
title: Pregnant Kitty Spa

content: Immediately after loading, a fitting room appears on the screen with the main character in the center. The girl is already dressed up in a wedding dress, but you can make your own adjustments: add a touch or two and even completely change clothes, shoes and accessories. By the way, there is a hint button, when you click on it, you will see three ready-made options.
title: Pregnant Princesses Fashion Dressing Roo

content: Children’s games Jigsaw puzzles for girls will definitely appeal to all lovers of princesses. Choose from a wide range of pictures the one you like the most. Then it remains only to arrange the pieces in the correct order. To do this, grab any element and drag it to where it should be.
title: Pretty Princesses Jigsaw

content: A farm worker has fallen in love with his owner’s daughter, and she loves him back. You need to make sure that no one interferes with the couple kissing. If someone notices them, then you will lose one game life. An exclamation mark will serve as a hint, watch for its appearance on the screen.
title: Prince Princess Kiss Quest

content: While playing Dress Up for Boys you have to come up with a cool look for a guy. Here you can change his appearance, choose the shape and color of his eyes, lips, skin tone and other elements. Then you can start choosing stylish clothes. A distinctive feature of the game is that it has the ability to independently choose the color of things and even decorate them with original ornaments. Do not forget about all kinds of accessories that perfectly complement the look of the boys, making them even more attractive.
title: Prince Romper Squad

content: In this game you meet a pretty girl named Brittany. She is a professional dancer. From overloads at rehearsals and concerts, the beauty’s legs are covered with a mesh of veins and hurt terribly. The girl is terribly worried about her health and asks you for help. Carry out the necessary medical manipulations and make Britani’s legs perfect.
title: Princess Anna Arm Surgery

content: In this game you are invited to make delicious homemade ice cream. First you need to find all those items that will be required during the culinary process. Carefully examine the refrigerator and cabinets in the kitchen to get the indicated ingredients and tools from there. And then feel free to start creating dessert!
title: Princess Anna Cooking Cake

content: A young couple is going on a honeymoon trip, and the guy is already fully prepared, but the girl still needs to get dressed. You will have to help the heroine of the game by choosing comfortable and cute clothes for her. Don’t forget about accessories that will perfectly complement your holiday outfit. The finished result can be saved for memory or even printed.
title: Princess Annie Summer Wedding

content: Spectra - one of the students of the school of monsters, decided to change the image. It is proposed to start with a hairstyle. Imagine yourself as a hairdresser and give Spectra a great hairstyle that will make her look even more attractive. To do this, you have at your disposal a variety of tools and means.
title: Princess April Fools Hair Salon

content: In this game, you have to manage a wife who has to take care of her husband. The action takes place in a huge house, which has everything you need for a comfortable life. Move around the apartment, use different objects in order to create good conditions for your husband. The hints will help you.
title: Princess Ariel Breakfast Cooking 1

content: During the game Hospital Operation for Girls you will play the role of a surgeon. A patient was brought to your clinic with certain brain problems. The task is to carry out all the necessary procedures and help the girl cope with such a serious problem. The hospital has already prepared the tools that will be useful for the operation, and it remains only to use them correctly. This will help detailed tips from the head nurse, who will accompany you throughout the process. Try not to make mistakes and choose the right items to heal the girl.
title: Princess Ava Real Dentist

content: This wonderful game invites you to try yourself as a jeweler. You will work in a store that sells a variety of jewelry. Girls who want to get a stylish accessory come here all the time. You need to listen to their wishes and create chic jewelry for clients.
title: Princess Avas Flower Shop

content: The game starts with makeup. On the left you have a choice of subsections: eye color, shadows, eyebrows and so on. After that, you go to the section for choosing clothes and modeling hairstyles. It should be noted that the makeup and clothes in the game look quite realistic. When you’re done, try submitting your model to an online competition (there’s a button at the bottom of the screen).
title: Princess Back School Lockers

content: In this exciting game you have to create entries for a fashion blog. To begin with, it is proposed to come up with a nice set for an autumn walk. title: Princess Christmas Shopping

To find useful bonuses, you should look into all the nooks and crannies.

content: The developer company “Armor Games” again pleases us with its creation. The gameplay is preceded by a story. It can be skipped. content: This game invites you to the distant future. Our planet is attacked by a huge fleet of space pirates. Their main task is to enslave mankind and pump out all the resources of the Earth. Try to fight off the attacks of the galactic invaders while your brothers in arms gather an army that can stop the hordes of aliens.

content: A rather simple game in which you have to quickly destroy your opponent. At the beginning of the battle, you have a certain amount of money to purchase weapons. content: Do you want to pass the time near the computer together with a friend? Then, perhaps, the variant of the game For two cars will suit you. Football is to be played. Two cars, two goals and one ball. Everything is extremely simple. The screen is divided into two halves horizontally. Control is possible both from the keyboard and from joysticks, which is not often found in such entertainment. In the case of a game with a keyboard for two, the cars will be controlled by different keys. To Crazy Games a goal against an opponent, you will have to arrange natural races on cars and show the highest class of driving them. After all, you need to not only drive, but also bring the ball to the goal. By the way, in the process of playing on machines, a larger number of players can also take part, connecting in turn on the principle of “take-off”, when the loser gives way to the next one.

content: Help the funny mouse complete all the levels of this exciting game! At any location you will find a room with obstacles and mice enclosed in mousetraps. Sometimes there are especially strong freaks that you have to tinker with.

The captured building automatically becomes a barracks.

content: In this game you have to control a funny bunny who needs to destroy enemies. It provides a large number of levels, each of them presents the original location. Move along it and attack opponents, making sure that they do not touch you. You can also play together.

content: The most incredible adventure begins! You find yourself in a city, on the streets of which you can do a lot. The Survival Race game provides you with a powerful car equipped with a couple of “trunks”. With their help, you can destroy other cars and other objects. You will be given missions to complete while moving through the city streets. For example, the first task will be related to the destruction of taxi cars. The map displayed at the top of the screen will help you complete the mission. Items that need to be destroyed are marked with red icons. Therefore, you can easily reach them and complete your task. When you play, pay attention to money. You will get them for completing each survival race mission, for destruction, for collecting coins. Also, don’t miss the bonus items!

content: During the game Shop supermarket cashier you will be asked to sell perfumes. There will always be people coming to your department who want a perfume that suits them perfectly. The challenge is to properly serve each customer by offering them exactly the product they crave. Store visitors, receiving the desired perfume, will pay the seller in the supermarket for their cost. The game consists of a large number of levels, and in each level you need to sell as many goods in order to earn a specified amount of money. From stage to stage, its size increases, but at the same time the number of visitors grows, so you have to act faster and faster. Periodically, you have to buy new goods, expanding the assortment of the store. All money earned is spent on this.

content: An excellent Car racing game invites you to go on a race along a dangerous track. In it you have the opportunity to choose a car, but at the very beginning only one option is open. You can unlock the rest of the cars as you progress, collecting a certain number of colorful cubes that will often be found along the way. Also during the race you will come across gold coins, they are also worth collecting. When you start playing speed car racing, you will immediately see that there are no rivals here. You just need to pass the given track as fast as possible. At the same time, it is important to be careful and not fly off the road, because this will certainly lead to a loss, because you cannot move outside the track. There the car just flies down. After that, you will have to go through the level again from start to finish.

content: In this game, you have to become the leading designer of a car tuning studio. This time you need to repaint the huge SUV of the German company Audi. Using a virtual brush, apply original paints to the car that can turn it into a real work of art.

content: Racing games 1234567890 invite you to take part in the races of high-speed cars. At your service is a huge selection of supercars, stunning in their beauty and power. Choose one and go to the starting field. In this game, you are given the opportunity to independently determine not only the coolest car, but also the track, as well as the number of competitors. Before the first run of the race, specify the desired parameters and join the fight. Show all your abilities and become the winner of this exciting supercar competition.

content: In this game, interesting and exciting races on inertial cars await you. First, you accelerate it, and then you begin to deftly maneuver, avoiding collisions with barriers that greatly reduce speed. But you can dial it again if you run into the green arrows. Collect coins along the way and, of course, do not let yourself be overtaken by other participants.

But there are a lot of zombies around, and you won’t be able to slip through unnoticed. Luckily, he found a fire truck in an abandoned garage and hit the road. Help him break through the crowds of monsters.

content: The conditions of the game Racing on the track 3d are quite difficult. You have to drive a powerful jeep with huge wheels. To win, you must overtake all opponents and be the first to reach the finish line after a certain number of laps.

content: In this game you can fight in the final boxing match with the computer or the second player. Use the arrow keys to control the fighter. The game has several locations and a wide variety of boxing techniques. To defeat an opponent, you need to accurately strike and be able to quickly restore strength.

content: Rainbow Dash came to your hair salon to get a new haircut. You need to show all your skills to style her mane and achieve a cool result. You can use any tools: scissors, comb, hair dryer, curling iron. A huge number of hair dyes are also available.

The color of any part can be changed, choosing the most suitable one.

And only with your help will the young warriors be able to destroy the sinister plans of the enemies, having gone through incredibly difficult trials. The key to success is the unification of efforts and teamwork. But even alone, each such warrior poses a considerable threat. The villains change one after another, and the samurai rangers remain on the screen, training endlessly. But during the game, only one hero will take part in the current campaign, challenging a terrible demon. If you want to win the battle, take your rangers seriously. Each of them uses a certain type of weapon, which means that the passage of the mission and the fighting style itself will be radically different from all the others. At the beginning of the game, you can choose the place where the powerful samurai rangers will start the battle. But, most likely, it will be a long labyrinth where you need to destroy the boss, having previously destroyed all his servants who risked interfering with you.

content: From the name it is clear that young gamers will have to work on the appearance of the princess, but not the usual one, but the oriental one. Therefore, her outfit will be appropriate. First you need to try on the individual parts of the costume on a mannequin. The next step is fabric selection, cutting and sewing. At the end of the game, do not forget about the hairstyle, and then print the finished picture or save it in the computer’s memory.

content: After launching the game for girls My Dream Wedding, you will turn into a real wedding ceremonies expert. You need to decorate the venue for the next holiday. content: During the restaurant game for girls you meet a cute girl who works as a waitress. Thanks to your efforts, the institution will become one of the most popular in the city.

content: Driving Simulator 3 turns you into a professional racer who takes part in street racing competitions. In any case, you will have a great time at the computer screen with this excellent simulator, driving a unique racing car specially prepared for competitions.

content: In this game, you have to clean up the city cemetery, which has a huge number of zombies. On each of the locations you have to destroy all the monsters using a limited amount of ammo. Calculate the flight path of each of the bullets so that it causes maximum damage to the monsters.

content: The Space Ghost team is on their next mission and invites you to join them. Controlling the movements of the space wanderer, try to break through the armada of the Dark Lord’s space cruisers and destroy the huge planet of death that his engineers began to build.

content: The hero of dress up game for boys and girls is going to a cool Halloween party. The only thing left is to come up with a suitable costume. You just have to do it. The guy will definitely be the star of the party, and his costume will become the standard for all her guests - both for boys and girls!
