content: The room is a terrible mess, and it’s time to start cleaning. Your task in this game is to restore order as quickly and efficiently as possible. Look at what things do not lie in their places, put them on the shelves, throw out all the garbage, vacuum, wipe the dust. Make sure that this room is clean, comfortable and beautiful.

content: Not everyone knows, but tyrannosaurs could easily reach speeds of up to 70 km / h. I can’t even believe that an animal with a mass of several tons is capable of such agility. content: This is not just a street racing game. This is an amazing mixture of graphics, music and drive! At the very beginning, you can choose one of several modes, including a game for two participants. After choosing a track and a reward for the race (there is also such an option), try to become the king of the roads. Each successfully completed stage opens the way to a new race. Management is standard.

content: In the future, when the usual fights in the ring will be boring for everyone, and technological progress will make almost any dream come true, people will create a new kind of entertainment for themselves. These are robot battles where you can put your bot in the arena and he will have to fight with many other enemies to win the tournament.

content: In the Roblox universe, superheroes are also popular. Especially such as Thor, Captain America or Tycoon. Unfortunately, the gamer will not be able to choose who to play with. At his disposal, they will be the whole composition - a single team that will have to fight the invasion of alien robots. Each hero has his own superpower, which can be used at the right time. To do this, simply switch between characters, changing one for another right during the battle. Other members of the superhero factory will operate on their own. At the same time, the developers have provided common commands assigned to the numeric keys. To replenish the strength of your warriors, collect energy blocks. The game “Roblox” is designed for one person, but you can play with friends in turn, competing in scoring.

However, among the debris that remains from the enemies, you can find additional weapons and insert them into free slots. Instead of weapons, money drops out more often. They can be spent in the store (there was one in the very first room) and your killer robot will become even more perfect.

content: Playing Autobots will require precise calculation and patience from you in order to win all the battles. Gunfights between your character and Decepticon soldiers take place over long distances and in limited visibility. Projectiles fly along a hinged trajectory, so you have to calculate the angle of fire and the launch force of the projectile. Enemies have weaker weapons, but Decepticons can fire bursts and, moreover, there are initially more of them. At the first level, there are two enemies for one of your robots. From there, the Autobot game will become more fun, although you will also get reinforcements.

content: No, the Autobots were not captured or arrested on charges of stealing engine oil. It’s just that two robot friends were alone on a planet destroyed by a nuclear war and are trying to get out of there. You can help them. But the game will require you to be smart, as well as the ability to work in a team, because robots can overcome most of the obstacles only by merging into a single whole.

content: The famous supercar racing world champion asks you to prepare his new car for the next Grand Prix. Use the electronic brush to apply war paint to the sports car, which will bring good luck to the driver and allow him to become the most recognizable participant in the competition.

content: Hey, enough to destroy and shoot everything around. Time to spread your brains and train your attention. When you collect one picture, you get another. Pump your brain!

Fight with the enemy army, destroy the enemy and earn points that can be spent on improving your army. Be careful, the number of the enemy is many times greater than the strength of your army. But, as you know, war against each other is, first of all, a strategy. And the future fate of the entire kingdom directly depends on the correct choice of warriors that you will use at different moments of the battle.

content: A small town on the edge of the desert has become a battlefield between the Autobots and the Decepticons. You have the honor of controlling Optimus Prime himself. content: Create your own funny pet and play with it. First, choose the appearance of the character, and then decide on its color and come up with a name. Next, you will need to dress up the ward. Finally, you can start the process of caring for a cute little animal! Feed him, play with him, put him to bed.

content: A galactic army of robotic invaders from a distant Iron Planet has attacked Earth’s cities. As one of the elite pilots-transformers you go to protect your home planet. Such interesting entertainment for children in the company of your favorite character will allow you to have a great time and cheer you up.

Each stage is more difficult than the previous one. You will need patience and luck.

Your talents and skills will be highly appreciated by the Skipper, and he will definitely offer you the position of his deputy.

From the control you only have the arrows to the right and left. Get them at the start. Tanks are dropped with a space.

Money will often come across along the way, try to collect as many bills as possible, so that later you can go to the store and purchase upgrades.

content: Puzzles train the brain in an easy, fun and relaxed way, which is extremely important. Your goal in this game is to complete as many different tasks as possible. For example: put the correct time on the clock, write down a combination of numbers from memory, win the game “Rock, paper, scissors”, etc. And all this in only two minutes.

content: While playing Arcade for Boys, you will need to fight enemies. The process consists of a large number of levels, on each of which you need to destroy the evil monster. As you progress, you will earn gold coins, which you can then spend on a variety of improvements.

The bandit settled in one of the districts of a small town. To complete the task, you need to identify the criminal from the available photo and make an accurate shot.

content: And again, the Japanese give you scope for the realization of any design fantasies, offering to dress up a Japanese schoolgirl. You need to move them in such a way that each of the four corners ends up with chips of the same color. You can only move them to an adjacent empty cell. The point of the game is to complete the task as quickly as possible, while making the minimum number of moves. Turn on the logic to the fullest and prove that you are the smartest.

In this game, you have no way to overtake your opponent on the track. This means that you will have to jump over it by pressing the spacebar in time. Accelerate your red stallion to maximum speed on the wide avenues of the largest metropolis in the world. Unique graphics and realistic sound will give you the opportunity to enjoy the control of this beautiful car to the maximum.

It is necessary to transport loaded wagons on roads, which most often pass through mountainous terrain. Be careful not to roll over while moving. content: Driving in Russian city
title: Russian UAZ 4x4 Driving Simulator

content: Game Test drive UAZ Patriot 2 invites you to test a domestic car. It is necessary to control the car so that it drives to the finish line as quickly as possible. In total, you need to conquer a distance of 7100 meters, but a variety of sections of the route await you ahead: urban road, rural, mountain, swamp and many more options. You need to try not to get stuck in a swamp and not get caught speeding. You can switch gears on the UAZ, as well as turn on the front axle - it will be very useful during an off-road test drive.

content: The famous chef Matthew deservedly won the championship of masters of culinary arts and received a gold medal. He invites you to be his assistant. Make it so that as many as possible of the restaurant where you work taste unique dishes from the recipes of the famous chef.

content: A unique and very interesting game that combines racing and logic quiz. When driving along the highway, you are offered questions, the answers to which can be found on the traffic signs located along the road. If you turn the right way, you earn points, and if you make a mistake, anything can happen.

content: Start the process of playing Sailor Moon dress up for girls and meet the heroine of the famous animated series. Your task is simple: you need to create a new image for her, using any of the proposed elements. Here you are provided with all kinds of blouses, skirts and cute dresses. You can also change the girl’s face by choosing the shape of the eyes, lips, skin color.

content: The game Dad’s Restaurant introduces you to a talented rocker who has lost all his instruments. In order to buy new ones, he got a job at a small diner. Help your buddy serve all the customers of the cafe, earn huge tips, buy instruments and hold your first solo concert.

content: The design of the “Samurai cat spinner” clicker makes it interesting not only for office workers, but also for children. The bottom line is to spin a virtual spinner and earn in-game currency. This is done using the mouse or arrow keys on the keyboard. Decide on a choice before starting. As soon as the gamer clicks on the fidget, it starts moving and the countdown starts. The goal is to make more revolutions in 10 seconds. The reward is given by a samurai cat from the top of the screen.
title: Samurai cat spinner game

content: Today you have to test your strength in capoeira - Brazilian martial art, vaguely reminiscent of dance. The confrontation involves two players, endowed with various options for strikes and acrobatic elements. Each lunge in the arena corresponds to a certain key combination, which are described in detail in the instructions.

content: Christmas is the best time of the year, because Santa comes to everyone with long-awaited gifts. And if you want to surprise the main wizard of the planet, prepare delicious cookies. But be very careful and attentive when choosing ingredients. Prepare a dessert and if Santa likes it, you will get the best present.

content: Mario grew up and became an uncle. Now he has a big beard. Today he wants to shave and trim his mustache to please Princess Peach. Help Mario to clean up. The task is very responsible and requires an appropriate attitude from you. After all, the appearance of a virtual character will depend on the work done.

content: Go to the virtual kitchen to make Halloween cupcakes. They will be not only tasty, but also attractive. Follow the hints of the game and process the ingredients correctly. There are several stages here, and you need to try to act as quickly as possible in order to get bonus points.

content: Bake a delicious pie with fruit! An experienced chef Sarah will help you with this. After starting the game, you will enter the kitchen, where the ingredients necessary for baking have already been collected. You just have to process them correctly, following the game prompts. Try to achieve a delicious result as quickly as possible.
title: Saras Cooking Class Upside Down Cake

content: Today you have to cope with the New Year’s task, namely, to decorate the Christmas tree. But for this you need toys and decorations. Here they will have to be found in this motley picture. Click the mouse button on the necessary things, and they will immediately be on the forest beauty. Everything you need will be marked on the bottom line of the screen.

content: During the game Hairstyles for medium hair you will turn into a hairdresser who has to help the girl. Your task is to work on the image of the heroine of the game. To begin with, use various products to wash your hair and restore its beauty. Do your hair and choose a cute outfit.
title: School Braided Hairstyles

content: The Alphabet game sends you to a fairy-tale kingdom, where you will have to demonstrate all your attentiveness. Carefully inspect one of the most beautiful corners of the magical land, try to find all the letters of the Russian alphabet placed on it. Use the mouse cursor to point to the found letters, and they will instantly disappear from the screen. In order not to make a mistake and not miss anything, at the bottom of the game screen there is a hint with a list of letters that you need to find. If you cannot find some of them, ask your parents for help, they will be very happy to help you in your search. Together you will have a great time together in search of the lost letters.

content: According to the plot of the game Baby Scooby Doo, famous hunters for paranormal phenomena are sent to another challenge. This time, Scooby is driving. Help the funny dog ​​get to his destination without falling into a trap and crashing his wonderful scooby car. Watch the road carefully and try to avoid obstacles on the road.

content: The online project “Geometry dash world” has enslaved the minds of millions of schoolchildren. Do you want to test your reaction and stress resistance for free? Start playing. In fact, “Geometry dash full version” is a typical platform game. Easy to perform, but very difficult to pass the first time. You have to control the cube, which slides from left to right. Your task during the game is to click the mouse in time and make the hero jump over obstacles and traps. Playing “Geometry dash” is very difficult. Full-passing will require extreme concentration and nerves of steel. Of course, a good mouse won’t hurt.
title: Scratch Geometry Dash

content: In this game you can enjoy a real naval battle of different types of ships. Everything happens almost the same as in a sea battle, which many people play on notebook sheets. First you place the ships on the sea surface, and then you enter the battle with your opponent. Only unlike a notebook, almost three-dimensional graphics await you on the screen.
title: Sea battle 3D game

content: The process of the game Love and Kisses is dedicated to Princess Mulan. She invited her chosen one to kiss her 80 times, but no one should notice this. Therefore, if you see that a stranger is going to turn towards the lovers, immediately stop the kiss, otherwise you will lose.
title: Secret Office Kissing

content: The heroine of the game flies to rest, and she needs a new hairstyle, as well as high-quality makeup. Help the charming girl deal with these questions. Choose the right hairstyle and apply your favorite decorative cosmetics. Don’t forget to try on the outfit and accessories to complete your stylish look.
title: Selena Gomez Hairstyles

content: If there are lego cars, then there should be lego parking for them. Is it logical? Absolutely! And this toy clearly demonstrates everything. You have to park a passenger car in accordance with the instructions, where should be the back and where should be the front. Do everything carefully, without too much haste. There are no time limits, but you will be shocked by how many traffic cops rush along the road!
title: Semi Driver 3d Trailer Parking

content: Informals always stand out from the crowd, striving to achieve originality with the help of bright and unusual outfits. The fascinating process of playing Dress Up for informals invites you to meet a girl who knows a lot about everything unusual. Now she wants to get a new outfit for herself, and you will definitely help her with this. Use the suggested t-shirts, skirts, jeans and other informal wardrobe items to get an attractive result. The finished image can even be printed.

content: Any girl dreams of a luxurious wedding, and the heroine of this game is no exception. You are invited to dress her up for the wedding ceremony, using all sorts of elements of a festive wardrobe. Try on a chic dress for the bride, add a veil, bouquet, jewelry. You can change the wedding dress as many times as you like.

content: War is always the same. Only the weapons change! Now you have rockets in your hands that can turn even the moon into radioactive ashes. By the way, your base is located there. And the enemies set out to destroy it, so that you could no longer sow reasonable, good, eternal. Shoot down their shells on the approach. Collect bonuses that descend on parachutes. Do an upgrade.

content: Sean, Shirley and Timmy - lambs from the animated series, were abducted by aliens. Now they need to get out of the spaceship and escape from the enemies. You need to help the sheep cope with the task. Move them around locations, overcome various obstacles and don’t forget to collect socks for extra points.

content: While playing Circle Puzzles, you need to collect images of funny creatures dressed as cartoon characters from the famous Walt Disney Studios. It is not so easy to complete the task, because all the images in it are round in shape. Try to correctly arrange all the pieces of the picture and guess which character’s costume the hero of the game will appear before you.

content: Start playing Demolition Simulator game and control powerful rockets that explode when they fall. You need to destroy the structure in which the people took refuge. To be more precise, the main goal at each level is precisely the destruction of little men. Control the rocket, lifting it into the air and directing it where you need it. Please note that the fuel supply is limited, so try to do everything quickly. The number of attempts is also limited. If you can’t complete the task, you will have to replay.

content: Maniac Slenderman is chasing you through the tangled corridors of an unknown building. And you need to escape from here as soon as possible in order to save your life. However, first you have to find documents, keys and other auxiliary items that will help restore health and find a way out.

content: Shooting games for 6 years old for boys are suitable and suitable for girls too. There is a good opportunity to verify this by running one of them right now. At first, gamers will find an interesting and colorful comic-intro. After that, no less exciting and interesting process of passing will begin. You will get acquainted with the character control buttons as you progress. The game provides for boys shooters, treasure hunts and the need to overcome obstacles. If you do not hurry, then you can never die in the abyss or from the clutches of enemies.

content: Zombies have infiltrated the city and are trying to infect the locals with a deadly virus. Destroy them, collecting cash bonuses, which will give you the opportunity to improve your combat arsenal. The character is controlled using the arrow keys, shooting - with the left mouse button. Kill all the monsters before they infect the population of the city.

content: The young emperor Kuzco received a letter from his beloved Malina. He went to the laboratory of the insidious Izma to meet the girl there. Unfortunately, the naive romantic fell into a trap and you must help him get out of the trap. Control the movements of the emperor’s cart and try to get away from the chase.

content: If you want to get a portion of positive, you should start playing Homeless Simulator. Here you will meet a funny homeless man who slept peacefully in the city dump. Until the cop kicked him out. And now the bum walks the streets and attacks everyone who meets him on the way. Your task in the angry homeless simulator game is to help the character cope with the opponents. For this, only two keys are used - A and S. Various combinations of them activate additional types of attacks. For example, you can spit on an enemy. But all these abilities open gradually. When they are unlocked, the screen displays the combination that will help you use the new type of attack. Use them all for the best effect!
title: Short Life

content: It’s no secret that an ogre named Shrek loves solitude. And when guests visit his swamp, he loses his temper and does everything possible to drive away the intrusive visitors. And now a whole army of ogres came to his swamp. Our hero has no choice but to go into battle, armed with the only available weapon - his friend Donkey. Take part in the epic ogre battle in Shrek.io! Your task is to eliminate as many opponents as possible. Dodge your opponents’ attacks, overtake them with the help of acceleration to deliver a control blow. As soon as the enemy is defeated, bonus cookies will fall from him - pick them up to replenish hit points and become stronger.

content: A strategy game in which you have to take over the world by sending zombie squads to attack. And you will have to fight with the same monsters that the computer or your friend will control if you invite him to play. Your goal is not to let the enemy into your territory and at the same time try to destroy the enemy’s forces and occupy his possessions.

content: In this exciting game you have to turn into a car driver. Complete tasks and achieve the desired result. Tips that are displayed on the screen will help you navigate the gameplay. Your car will definitely be the most beautiful, powerful and fastest in the whole city. It will be great!

content: While playing Sim Taxi 3D, you get a job as a taxi driver and go to a huge Sim city in your yellow car. Try to earn as much money as possible by transporting customers that you can find on the local streets. Carefully follow the indicators of the navigator located at the bottom of the screen. He will point you to new customers and the most optimal routes. To play Sim Taxi 3d you need to be careful not to get into an accident, because then you will have to return to the garage, spend money on repairing your car and refuse customers. The money that you will receive for the transportation of passengers, use to refuel the car and improve its performance. Thanks to your hard work and talent as a driver, you are sure to become one of the most successful Sim city taxi drivers.

content: Cakes for Boys game invites you to create creative desserts. Choose one of the three cakes you want to work on. Next, you need to cut the cake along the indicated lines and correctly position the pieces on the dish. After that, it remains only to take care of decorating a sweet treat.
title: Sisters Cakes Battle

content: Face makeup for girls
title: Sisters Fashionista Makeup

content: Best friend test for girls offers very simple questions, but thanks to them you can find out how good you are as a friend. All questions relate to your relationship with your girlfriend. Just choose from the three answer options the one that best suits your behavior. After you answer all the questions of the friendship test, the result will be displayed on the screen. You will see detailed information about how you behave in friendships. It is possible that this will allow us to draw very unexpected conclusions.

content: Skateboarding is one of the extreme sports. In this game you have to play on behalf of a dashing skater, demonstrating all sorts of tricks while passing the track. And do not be lazy to collect bonuses, they will give you the opportunity to purchase new equipment and wheels for the board. To perform tricks, use the Z, X and C buttons. Arrow keys - move.

content: The fascinating plot of the game Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles on a skateboard will appeal to all fans of these funny cartoon characters. In order to quickly deal with all the villains of the Nogi clan, they decided to race around the city on skateboards and punish the bandits. You should help the heroes to destroy the enemy, and during the chase, do not forget to perform tricks by pressing certain keys.

content: While playing Skateboard 3D, you become a participant in a competition among athletes who are fond of riding a skateboard. Skateboarding appeared in the 30s of the last century in California. The first athletes to get on the board were professional surfers. A few years later, fans of this extreme sport began to hold competitions, which attracted athletes from all over the world.

content: The name of the game suggests certain difficulties with the passage. And they start from the second stage. At each level, the tasks are different and more complicated. The margin of safety of your car is very limited. But the margin of time should be enough for a careful check into the parking space without damage. If you fail, you will have to start from the first level.

content: In this game, you become the operator of an attraction in one of the biggest amusement parks in the world. Your responsibilities include driving a trolley that moves along the railroad. Be careful and considerate. Guide the trolley around the ring of the attraction without losing any of the passengers.

content: Feel like a real military pilot who is not afraid of dizzying flights and steep turns. Shoot at the enemies from all guns, show who is the main ace in the sky!

content: After starting the game, you will turn into a manicurist. A girl came to you who wants to get beautiful nails. Use the presented varnishes and stickers in order to achieve an original result. If desired, jewelry can be added to the manicure - rings or bracelets. They complete the picture perfectly.
title: Sleeping Princess Nails Spa

content: In this game you will need to create fashionable hairstyles for charming princesses. First, choose the heroine whose hair you will work on. Then decide on the shape of the hairstyle, indicate the desired shade of paint and proceed to the process. You need to follow a strict sequence of actions!
title: Sleeping Princess Real Haircuts

content: The girl had a hard day and now she needs a relaxing massage. Your task is to carry out this wonderful procedure. The game consists of several stages, first prepare everything you need, and then start the massage itself. Hints will help you figure it all out.

content: This time you have to take part in the epic battles of the warriors of Ancient Greece. Control one of the fighters and take part in bloody duels against hordes of enemies and their bloodthirsty leaders. The game allows you to invite a friend to help and destroy enemies together, earning rewards.

content: While playing Slenderman for kids, you find yourself in a fantasy world, the ruler of which loves to feast on the fears of people. Carefully move across the territory of a small abandoned town, search broken houses and warehouses. Try to find a firearm as quickly as possible that can save you from a nightmarish monster.

content: In this game, incredible adventures await you, during which you are invited to fight against crowds of evil spirits. You have a weapon at your disposal, use it to attack enemies. Try not to let the opponents touch you, otherwise they will quickly take away health points, which will lead to a loss. As you progress through your character, you can improve.
title: Slenderman History: WWII Faceless Horror

content: In order to kill Slenderman in this game, you need to find a shotgun. Just keep in mind that all cartridges up to one must be planted in the body of the enemy, the only way to finally defeat him. You won’t have to look for a target for a long time, the monster will come to the meeting itself, and you will only have to accurately shoot at it.
title: Slenderman must die 2 game

content: The main goal of this game is to crush the enemy by participating in intergalactic battles. At your disposal there is a high-speed space fighter equipped with different types of firearms. In addition to the enemy, there are a large number of asteroids in space, collisions with which should be avoided.
title: Slenderman Must Die Dead Space

content: This time the events of the game Slender man 3d are developing in a dense winter forest. You have to survive in difficult conditions, hiding from Slender behind the walls of dilapidated houses and under the branches of huge trees. In order to destroy the ghost, you need to collect all the magic spheres. Overcome your fear and put an end to the adventures of this monster.

content: In this game you will control a gravedigger. The task to be completed is to bury the corpses, which, by the way, have also come to life. Skeletons, zombies, vampires - all should be buried. You have to go to all sorts of tricks so that the escaped dead are again in the grave. Quickly click on the individuals appearing here and there, wishing to return to this world.
title: Slenderman Must Die Silent Streets

content: Slenderman game will introduce you to the legendary faceless monster. His face is smooth, sickly white skin. The body is disproportionate. Slenderman is the owner of a very thin, inhuman figure, which immediately betrays a diabolical essence in him. But the worst thing about the monster is its hands. They stretch to incredible lengths and can transform into vile slendrin tentacles. According to the plot, you, along with the main character of the game, wake up in an unknown place that looks like a hospital. Blood is smeared on the walls, terrible female screams are heard from neighboring rooms, and the feeling that someone is watching you does not leave for a minute. This is the place where the thin man was created, terrorizing everyone in the area. In the game about Slenderman, you will be able to unravel the mystery of his DNA if you find all 8 notes hidden in different parts of the laboratory. Holding the gun tightly in your hand, you will have to explore all the rooms and try to find a way out of the terrible hospital. But most importantly, you need to avoid meeting with Slenderman himself.
title: Slenderman Must Die: Abandoned Graveyard

content: The exciting and interesting game Nuclear War will not leave indifferent fans of air battles. Help the Russian soldiers defend the bunker containing the nuclear missile. Enemy planes will try to wipe this deadly object from the face of the earth by attacking it time after time. But in the course of a game about nuclear war, you can use your own anti-aircraft gun to shoot them down without giving them an opportunity to strike. Missiles, which are on the strength of the enemy, you control with the mouse, pointing the crosshair of the sight at the target.
title: Slenderman Must Die: Industrial Waste

content: The Springtrap Simulator game invites you to go on an exciting adventure with a funny digging robot. Help the kid go through all the tests, avoid the dangers that await him on the way, and collect the maximum amount of minerals that will improve the characteristics of the hero of the game.
title: Slenderman vs Freddy The Fazbear

content: The online game “Geometry Dash: Cubes” offers, together with a small square, to jump over obstacles from platform to platform. The goal is survival. On all sides of the protagonist, obstacles lie in wait: spikes, abysses, hungry monsters, etc. There are no bonuses and free spare lives for the cube in Geometry Dash. You have to play on your own strength. To stay in the game longer, the cube will have to move on the ground, soar in the air and even run along the ceiling.
title: Sliding Box

content: Sludars - miniature robots, were created by engineers of one of the computer firms to repair individual components of computers. Help the kids fix all the breakdowns that occurred in one of the company’s offices. Controlling the movements of hardworking crumbs, try to place them on the buttons in the minimum number of moves.
title: Sludars game

content: You have to play real 3D football in the stadiums of many countries. Choose your favorite team and compete against other players in the world tournament. Play a full game in two half-times, ending with a control of the players’ statistics. When you Crazy Games a goal, you can even review your actions in slow motion replay.

content: Boy Bobby, who is very fond of traveling, decided to make a halt in the forest and set up his tent there. The next morning, he saw that there were a lot of armed people around who were not very friendly. Help the boy to destroy the bandits and stay alive. To do this, you need to jump on the heads of the villains. Dexterity is required to win the game.

content: It’s time to start harvesting! Five baskets of different colors will appear on the screen, and you need to place the corresponding vegetables and fruits in them. Grab the fruit with the mouse, and then transfer it to a basket of the same shade. If you make a mistake, the element will return to its place. Act carefully to make mistakes as little as possible.
title: Smurfberries Drop

content: The task in this game is simple - you need to color a picture of the Smurfs using a palette of colors. The variety of shades will greatly facilitate the process of completing the task. To control, use the mouse - click on the left button to select a color, and then on the area that you want to paint with it.
title: Smurfys Coloring

content: A famous adventurer accidentally found an ancient map and is going in search of the treasure chest indicated on it. The kid invites you to go on a journey with him. Help the snail overcome all the obstacles on the way and get to the ancient temple, which houses the relics of the lost snail civilization.
title: Snail Bob 6 Winter Story

content: In this game you will meet a snail named Bob. It is necessary to help him deal with the obstacles that interfere with the path. This will help all sorts of mechanisms that are activated when using levers and buttons. The game consists of a huge number of different levels, where you can not do without ingenuity and attentiveness.
title: Snail Bob 7 Fantasy Story

content: Spongebob was once a child! And it is for such a baby that you are invited to take care of during the game SpongeBob 2 for girls. After loading, a cute baby will appear on the screen, which needs to be washed, fed and cheered. In addition, hints will constantly appear here about which item should be used now, and you just have to take it and use it for its intended purpose. The mouse is used for control. Mistakes are not recommended: if you make five mistakes, the game for girls will end immediately. Therefore, do everything right, and in the final, do not forget to dress up SpongeBob.
title: Snail Park

content: This toy is another variation of the world famous Zuma. Try to stop the chains of colored balls with the help of a cannon that tend to fall into the hole. Fire projectiles of different colors from a magic weapon and form lines of 3 or more identical pieces from them, which will instantly disappear.
title: Snake

content: In this game you will participate in sniper training. You will have to shoot at moving targets. From level to level, the terrain changes and it becomes more and more difficult to navigate. But try to concentrate, if you miss more than 5 targets, the game will have to start over. Weapons are controlled with the mouse.
title: Sniper Attack 3d

content: The World War II Sniper game gives you the opportunity to feel like an elusive shooter, who is fluent in the art of accurately hitting targets. You will perform various tasks on enemy territory in the midst of World War II. You have to destroy objects at long distances with a sniper rifle with a telescopic sight. Almost all games about World War II snipers involve not only the elimination of the enemy, but also the ability to choose cover and disguise. And this is one of the conditions for the successful completion of the task. Starting to play the role of a sniper in World War II, choose a weapon and a map on which the battle will take place. The enemy always appears unexpectedly and for a short time. You need to react quickly, aim and destroy the enemy. But if you find yourself, you will have to quickly change position.
title: Sniper Reloaded

content: War in Iraq 2
title: Sniper Strike

content: No one but you can help a man taken prisoner by terrorists. You are a retired sniper, but your knowledge and experience in this situation are simply irreplaceable. The goal is clear - the bandits must be destroyed, and the prisoner freed. But be careful, among the criminals there are also well-aimed shooters.
title: Sniper Ultimate Assasin

content: Game Sniper Ghost Warrior will take you to the years of the Great Patriotic War. The goal is the destruction of enemy soldiers who invaded the territory of the Soviet Union. To accomplish this task, you have a powerful sniper rifle in your hands, from which you will shoot, bringing victory over the Nazi invaders closer.
title: Sniper VS Zombies

content: The Snow Queen, despite all her coldness, strives to look attractive in any situation. In this game, you are invited to work on the image of a girl. There are three stages here: first you need to do your hair, then apply makeup, and at the end you can choose an outfit.
title: Snow Queen Real Haircuts

content: In the game Cool racing for two you have to participate in circular races on various tracks. Choose your car, then the track and go to the competition. This is where the ability to drift and skillfully go around obstacles at high speed comes in handy. Win races and earn money to be able to buy a new car and open access to new levels.
title: Snow Storm

content: Everyone knows the fairy tale about Snow White - a sweet princess who lived in the forest with seven dwarfs. Launching the Snow White Dress Up game will take you to visit her and offer you to create a new outfit for the girl. Everything is as simple as possible here: change the headdress, jewelry, dress and accessories in your hands. Nothing else needs to be done!
title: Snow White Fairytale Dress Up

content: After launching this game, you have to create fashionable outfits for mom and daughter. First, choose the style of the dress, and then take measurements that will help in the further process of tailoring. Sew cute dresses that will make the heroines as stylish and attractive as possible. The hints will help you.
title: Snow White Mommy Real Makeover

content: Give a manicure to a girl who always looks after her appearance. Your task is to decide on the shape of the nails, the color of the polish, the type of pattern. If desired, you can add decorative elements that will make the manicure even more original. And here you need to choose the color of the dress.
title: Snow White Nails

content: After starting the game, you will turn into a real hairdresser who can do a variety of hairstyles, even the most complex ones. You have a huge number of professional tools at your disposal, and you can use them in any way you like to end up with a nice result. Don’t hold back your fantasy!
title: Snow White Real Haircuts

content: The essence of the Adventure Adventure game for boys is to destroy all the enemy soldiers on the level. Controlling a brave commando, run, jump, collect ammunition and ruthlessly kill enemies. But the enemy is also firing, so during the passage of missions, do not be lazy to collect first-aid kits that restore health. You have to go through 6 challenging levels.
title: Snowy Kitty Adventure

content: According to the rules of the Football 2013 game for two, you will have to fight with an opponent, hitting the ball only with your head. For each win or draw, money is awarded for which you can upgrade your player. For example, it is possible to increase the height of the jump, make a stronger blow or speed up the player.
title: Soccer Master

content: Football euphoria swept the whole world. Millions of fans clung to the TV screens. At the stadium, the crowd of thousands bursts into applause. The match of the century begins. And you have the opportunity to participate in this football celebration. Choose your team and go to win victories, prizes and recognition from the audience.
title: Soccer Mob

content: In this game, you will have the opportunity to touch history and repeat the most unforgettable moments in the life of a famous football player! Third person view. The camera is located slightly above and to the side. You see the penalty area, the goal and the players. Throw free kicks to Crazy Games another historic goal. By the way, easier said than done.
title: Soccer Mover

content: Do you want to laugh heartily and look at completely stoned football players? This can be done while playing Football Physics for two. By the way, it also has a single player mode. Side view. The character drawing is very cool. There are not athletes on the field, but more and more some hippies, rastamans and other rabble. Matches are played in a two-on-two format. There is no point in voicing the goal, it is clear and so. Management is carried out using just one button, which is responsible for the jump up. However, this does not prevent the characters from moving around the field and even flying into the opponent’s goal. By the way, gamers will Crazy Games most of the goals themselves, which is very amusing, but not annoying. If you play for two, the physics of football becomes much more fun.
title: Soccer Physics 2

content: In this game, everything is like in real football. There are subtle passes, powerful shots, unique combinations and the highest class - when the goalkeeper Crazy Gamess a goal from his own penalty area to the opponent. To win, you need endurance, an accurate eye and a steady hand. And it does not matter that the players all the time stand still and cannot move - this does not make the game less interesting.
title: Soccer Stars Jigsaw

content: While playing Head Football Champions League 2014 15 you have a unique opportunity to show yourself as a real professional who can play not only with his feet, but also with his head. You get into the Champions League, where you will try to win the Challenge Cup. Choose your favorite player and start the competition. Everything is very simple - hit the ball with your head from your own half of the field, and also try to Crazy Games more goals into the opponent’s goal. The peculiarity of the game of the 2014-2015 season is that it is possible to install obstacles on the football field before the start of the match.
title: Soccerio

content: Do you want some fun? Then start playing Poop Simulator. Here you will meet a funny character in a red suit. He is ready to demonstrate his outstanding abilities. The fact is that the hero knows how to empty the intestines in ten different ways! In order to see how it might look, you need to click on the buttons located in the side areas of the screen. After that, a cheerful guy will show you a performance that does not look too aesthetically pleasing, but at the same time is able to cheer you up. Use all the buttons of the Poop Simulator to experience the ultimate asshole hero. If you really like some moment, then you can repeat it by clicking on the button again.

content: For those who are bored of playing ordinary dress-up games, the developers of this game gave the opportunity to dress up several characters at once. Here you can choose a hairstyle, jewelry and, of course, the top and bottom of the school costume. Shoes are also available. As a finishing touch - the selection of the background, on which the final picture will appear, where all the girlfriends will stand side by side.
title: Social Media Divas

content: The game Supermarket Mania invites you to go grocery shopping. The task is to purchase the goods indicated in the list. Study it carefully and find the right items on the shelves. There is a limited amount of time to complete the task. If you don’t make it in time, the game will end in defeat for you.
title: Soda Shop

content: According to the terms of the shooting game Strike Force Heroes 2, you will find 15 levels united by a common storyline. During the passage of missions, you will have to manage a whole team of specially trained fighters, called a shock squad. These guys are able to perform any difficult tasks and single-handedly destroy an entire army of opponents. Each of the characters has original abilities. Strike Force 2 includes a Medic who is able to heal the wounds of other team members, and a Sniper who easily destroys the enemy at long distances. The tank is the most protected character in the game. It has the highest number of lives, as well as the strongest armor. The group is managed by the commander. You must upgrade all your fighters and test all 65 weapons in battle.
title: Soldiers 2 - Desert Storm

content: The game is a shooting range in which targets can shoot back. It’s simple: point the sight at the enemy and fall. Infantry falls down on two hits, so don’t try to headshot. But there is also an important task. For example, on the first level, you need to shoot down two helicopters. Ammunition is limited, but sometimes ammo and first-aid kits fall from the sky. Shoot down boxes and get bonuses.
title: Soldiers Combat

content: Card fun awaits you in this exciting game. The screen will display a curly layout in which all cards except the extreme ones are closed. The goal is to remove cards of the same rank. This must be done until the screen is completely clear. After that, a new level will open.
title: Solitaire Strike game

content: Go to the royal palace to meet the cute princess Sofia. Together with her you can have a great time doing a variety of tasks. Carefully follow the game prompts to act as correctly as possible. You will definitely enjoy the fascinating process dedicated to the cartoon girl.
title: Sophia Magic Spells game

content: In order to perform well the task assigned to you, you must strictly follow the instructions received. The terrorists have captured a whole block of the city. There are many professional soldiers among them, whom you were not recommended to fight with. You have to deal with them with a sniper rifle, shooting from a safe distance.
title: Soviet Sniper

content: This game is an arkanoid made in a space setting. Levels contain many different bonuses, but must be completed within a certain time. The key point is the appearance of a black hole, where you need to hit the ball. Defend your position from space invasion using all the variety of possibilities that this game gives.
title: Space Arkanoid game

content: The goal of this game, as well as any other, is to go through all the stages. And during the passage you will be in the role of … an alien minibus. Yes, you will have to deal with transporting green men from one point to another. Management of your “car” is quite complicated. Complete the task with minimal fuel and time costs.
title: Space Blaze

content: Space Pro is an exciting 3D flying game. A robotic alien race is preparing to invade Earth. But the earthlings have an infiltrator who was landed behind enemy lines and now has information vital to preparing the defense of the planet. In an online game about space, you have to help him break through enemy forces, shooting them and dodging enemy projectiles. A dynamic space game sets you one task - to break through to the teleport and get to Earth as soon as possible.
title: Space Lab Survival

content: Launch the Village Princess game and try to collect coins and gems in the air. Send the character up and move him in the air in such a way as to capture as many points as possible. At each level, you need to Crazy Games a specified number of points in a limited time.
title: Space Princess

content: In the very distant future, a new profession will appear - a rocket parker. But you can practice today. And if you live to see a bright future, you will be out of competition. So, using the arrow buttons, drive the vehicle past the obstacles to the parking lot. Take your time - even one touch of a foreign object leads to an accident.
title: Spacecraft I

content: Take part in a racing tournament, fighting against the computer or competing with friends. Choose your favorite car, track for the race and go to the start. To go to the next level, you need to be the first to the finish line. But keep in mind, each subsequent race is more difficult than the previous one.
title: Speed Brazil

content: Thanks to this wonderful simulator you will be able to learn the basic rules of playing billiards. Carefully inspect the location of the red balls on the table. Find the right place to place the striker and try to drive them into the pockets. Strive to correctly calculate the trajectory of impact and the force that needs to be applied.
title: Speed Pool King

content: In the exciting game Racing under 3 you will be met by the well-known Angry Birds. Here they ride on aircraft. And you, too, have to take part in this unusual competition. Control one of 3 planes and try to overtake all opponents. Along the way, you will come across coins that you need to collect in order to later purchase upgrades for your aircraft. Their purchase is available to players after each successfully completed level, so you should try not to crash out of the game and save up more money.
title: Speed Racing

content: During the Boat Racing game, you will find yourself on a dangerous water track, along which it is proposed to ride a boat. Control your boat, overtake your rivals and try to reach the finish line number one. You need to drive the specified number of laps and not let yourself be overtaken. The game uses a top view, which allows you to see large sections of the track. You can play online water races for free as long as you like, we recommend launching them right now. Start your boat!
title: Speedboat Racing

content: The beautiful Mary Jane has been kidnapped by a villain and Peter needs to rescue her urgently! Control Spider-Man who moves on the rooftops and help him cope with all the obstacles. On the way there will be opponents that must be avoided, otherwise they will attack the superhero and prevent him from going further.
title: Spider Fly

content: Mind-blowing race with the participation of Spider-Man. He cooperates with the police and currently controls the section of the road leading out of the city. You will receive signals about bandits’ cars and you will need to help the hero catch up with them and stop them, pressing them to the side of the road. But offenders are not averse to using this method, so be careful.
title: Spider Hero Street Fight

content: According to the plot of the game, the Ultimate Spider-Man from the secret vault of the organization to combat crime on Earth S.H.I.E.L.D. An iron spider suit was stolen by unknown criminals. You, along with Spiderman, have to go into the labyrinths of the enemy base, defeat the insidious kidnappers and return the stolen goods.
title: Spider-Man Epic Battles

content: The game Spiderman 4 3d is the new adventures of Spiderman. Terrible mutants are attacking the city. All the inhabitants are in fear and horror, they do not know where to run and where to hide. Only Spider-Man is able to stop the chaos that is happening on the streets. You can help our hero accurately shoot the web at enemies, ruthlessly destroying them at every turn.
title: Spider-Man Green Goblin Havoc

content: Spiderman 2 introduces you to one of the most famous crime fighters and protector of New York civilians - Spiderman. Spider-Man’s real name is Peter Parker. A simple college student, lover of science and comics, Parker accidentally received superpowers thanks to the bite of a radioactive spider that escaped from a secret laboratory. Peter refused to use his unique abilities for a very long time, but when his uncle died at the hands of a robber, he decided to administer justice on his own. On one of his patrols, Spider-Man met Nick Fury, the head of the secret organization S.H.I.E.L.D. T., who has long and successfully resisted local crime. At the secret base of S.H.I.E.L.D., our hero has gained new knowledge and skills, and is now ready to fight against the most terrible opponents.
title: Spider-Man Laboratory Lockdown

content: The well-known Spiderman is back in action! Spiderman 3 game invites you to help the superhero. You find yourself in a city full of villains who need to be dealt with using the web. Enemies will appear on the screen, and you just have to react in time and shoot at them. Each successful hit brings bonus points. Their number is displayed at the bottom of the screen. But it is important to be careful, because from time to time, Peter Parker’s beloved Mary Jane may appear on the screen. Under no circumstances should you shoot her. If this happens, then you will lose 100 points.
title: Spidey Swing

content: In this game, you have to cook a funny dinner that kids will definitely like. There is nothing complicated in the recipe, and hints constantly appear on the screen, which helps to cope with the process. Go to the virtual kitchen to try on the role of a chef and get a really mouth-watering result.
title: Spinach Rotolo Saras Cooking Class

content: Despite the name, you don’t have to rotate anything in the game. After launch, a spinner will appear on the screen, but to make it spin, just click on the screen with the mouse. For each complete rotation of the toy around its axis, a coin is awarded. At first, the fidget rotates slowly and brings little money. But if you pump it, everything will change dramatically.
title: Spinner clicker game

content: Car games for boys 4 years old will make you feel like a magic artist. Here, the usual car parking in the city turns into a real show of talent. You will use the brush to paint the road to the parking lot. But remember that the path that you are preparing for the movement of the machine must be free from obstacles. Try to avoid collisions with other vehicles. Collecting bonuses along the way is a must, this will add points and help you complete all levels faster.
title: SplatPed Evo

content: The famous SpongeBob goes to the New Year’s carnival at the Krusty Krabs diner. Help baby Sponge pick up a stylish fancy dress that will amaze all party participants with originality. The outfit that you propose to SpongeBob will be so liked by others that it will be recognized as the best outfit of the party.
title: Spongebob Crossdress

content: What the inhabitants of the underwater world will not come up with in order to measure themselves with the size of their fists, the strength of blows and the strength of their heads. This time you, or rather your character, will take part in a fight that takes place on the principle of “every man for himself.” Four fighters (including yours) come out onto the court and beat each other up. Only one must remain.
title: Spongebob game - punch festival

content: On the eve of Valentine’s Day, the famous SpongeBob was invited to take part in a romantic television show. Help Mr. Square Pants to find out who sent him a beautiful Valentine. You will have to take part in several contests, for winning which you will receive prize points, thanks to which Bob will be able to recognize his secret admirer.
title: Spongebob game on TV show

content: Playing on the field of magical jellyfish, SpongeBob and Patrick got caught in the net of a terrible fisherman. A nightmarish monster tied the heroes of the game to a log and left them to die in the sun. Fortunately, the kids managed to escape from captivity and now they have to get home to their beloved Bikini Bottom. Control the movements of the log to which your heroes are tied, try to deliver them home safe and sound.
title: SpongeBob Goes on a Journey game

content: The SpongeBob Squarepants game is very funny and is tied to the cartoon script only by the main character. The action takes place on land. Perhaps everything that happens to Bob in general is only a dream. In any case, according to the plot, he is a noble knight in armor and with a sword, who saves beautiful fish ladies, destroys all oncoming enemies and deftly overcomes obstacles.
title: Spongebob Sketch It, Guess It

content: It’s time to go in search of SpongeBob’s pet, Gary the snail. Complete all game tasks in order to eventually reach the goal. You will definitely enjoy traveling through the underwater world of Bikini Bottom, and SpongeBob will be very grateful for help in such a difficult task as finding a pet.
title: SpongeBob SquarePants And The Saviours Of Slime

content: In this game, SpongeBob participates in an underwater race on a slippery surface. Developing almost space speed, the character runs forward, jumps over chasms and collects hamburgers along the way. But besides that, you still need to overtake the snail (it is shown at the top of the screen on the strip). If the snail reaches the finish line first, the hamburgers won’t come in handy.
title: Spongebob Squarepants Lights Out Patrick

content: The mermaid princess from the pink kingdom went on a small expedition, and when she returned to her castle, she discovered that an evil sorceress had turned all the inhabitants of her kingdom into stone statues. Help the heroine of the game to find and free 4 mermaid princesses who have colored pearls that can dispel the magic of the insidious witch.
title: Spongebob Squarepants Spongemania

content: SpongeBob and Patrick boarded a ghost ship in search of treasure. But something unexpected happened and Bob got lost. Patrick is looking for him and asks for your help. Roam the ship, collect coins and look for Bob. For protection from ghosts there is a flashlight. But use it carefully - there are not many batteries. To go to the next level, you need to collect all the coins.
title: SpongeBob SquarePants Tracks Of Terror

content: Vampires love ice cream too! In this game, you have to work in a cafe where cute vampire girls will constantly drop by. They will place orders, and you just have to prepare the appropriate desserts for them. The game consists of several levels, and on each you need to earn the specified amount.
title: Spooky Halloween Ice Cream

content: Everything starts small. In this case, toys. You need to find a place to park the toy car. It is not enough to find a free stall (many are busy with other cars, cubes, some kind of trash). It is necessary not to crash the car on the way to the parking lot yet, because there are a lot of other toys scattered on the floor. Also, the game has a time limit.
title: Sport Car Parking Challenge

content: In this wonderful game you can feel like a real racer in a fast car.
title: Sportscar Grand Prix

content: Kitty Cheshire is going to impress her mom. To do this, she wants to demonstrate all her talents during the spring festival by participating in various games and competitions. But first you need to collect as many tickets as possible! At the same time, Kitty should not be noticed by other girls.
title: Spring Festival game

content: In this game you are waiting for a variety of flowers. A bouquet is displayed on the screen, as well as three different flowers. Try to determine which one is suitable for the bouquet. Just click on the correct flower, after which a new task will open. If you make a mistake, no problem. In this case, nothing will happen.
title: Spring Flowers Hidden Objects

content: In this game you have to work on the appearance of a girl who works as a hairdresser in a salon. Think about what she might look like. Choose a hairstyle, outfit, shoes, accessories for the heroine of the game. Do not forget to give the girl some hairdressing tool to emphasize her profession.
title: Sprout Hair Pins

content: Here is a new arcade survival platformer from the Geometry Dash series. It is so captivating and passionate that it is impossible to tear yourself away. But get ready for the fact that the game will be difficult. Especially if you don’t have much of a reaction. The protagonist is a big-eyed cube, moving along a picturesque rocky location dotted with abysses, steep ascents and descents. It is worth even once to stumble, as the character will fall down and break into a cake. There are no free bonuses like extra lives in the game, and in case of an error, the passage will have to start over.
title: Square Jump

content: About the online project “Geometry dash 2 2” it’s hard to say that this is a simulator of something. Before you is a typical platformer with a very simple goal, but not an easy passage. To play, the user will need a lot of patience and strong nerves. And also the Internet. The character is a cube with a cheerful face, sliding from left to right. The gamer’s task is to help him perform the jump in time, avoiding collisions with obstacles and traps. You can make as many attempts as you like, because “Geometry dash” is available for free at any time of the year.
title: Square Run

content: The puzzle game Ball Attack will introduce you to a monkey that throws darts at colorful balls. The game offers a huge number of levels, on each of which you need to destroy the specified number of balls. Please note that the number of darts is limited, so you need to shoot as accurately as possible.
title: Stack Fall 3D

content: In this game, you have to build a structure of balloons, ensuring that the same balls form combinations of three or more pieces. Such combinations will immediately disappear, bringing bonus points. The game has three modes of passage: it is proposed to hold out as long as possible, play against the clock or Crazy Games a given number of points.
title: Stack Fire Ball

content: The Star Wars Rebels game introduces you to the new crew of the famous space shuttle, the Millennium Falcon, and its leader, Kannan Jerus. Together with them, you will once again enter the battle with the army of the Empire. By controlling the movements of the spaceship, try to destroy the maximum number of cargo ships of the imperial fleet carrying building materials to create another planet of death. The passage of the game about the star wars of the rebels will require you to have a good reaction and the ability to make decisions quickly. Help the desperate warriors of Light break the plans of the insidious Black Lord and save the starry worlds from destruction. The starship crew will be grateful for your help and will definitely invite you to their new, even more exciting adventures in the fantastic world of Star Wars.
title: Star Wars Rebels game

content: The game Star wars the force unleashed will tell you about the struggle of the rebels against the forces of the galactic empire. In the dark years of the tyranny of the invaders, there were still a few heroes who risked starting a resistance movement against Sith rule. You have to control a space fighter and perform a variety of missions on enemy territory. The main task is to capture the supplies of the enemy. They are needed to arm their own army. But such raids will take place on different planets and in different conditions. The passage of the game Star wars the force unleashed is a long journey of a warrior who decided to fight back a well-armed enemy. You need to destroy the starships of the empire and the ground defense forces, showing maximum skill in controlling the space fighter. You have the ability to fire laser guns or drop bombs on the enemy.
title: Star wars the force unleashed game

content: The open space simulator “Vanar io” belongs to the multiplayer survival shooting games. You will get a small ship at your disposal, you will be able to blow up other people’s objects, pumping and improving your aircraft at their expense. But be careful. Open space is fraught with many threats in the form of enemy asteroids, planets and other celestial bodies. There are only two options for interacting with them: keep at a safe distance or ruthlessly destroy.
title: Starblast io

content: Space shooter “Starblast io” is a multiplayer survival simulator in the flow of huge asteroids. You have to control a small ship, destroying huge stone boulders on the way, as well as enemy aircraft.
title: Starblast.io games

content: In this futuristic game, you join the ranks of the united army of the Earth and become the pilot of a combat starship. Go to one of the training bases of earthlings and take a course there to prepare for battles in extreme conditions. Show all your abilities to the maximum and become a space pilot of the Earth Guard, which is just being put forward to study one of the solar systems of the galaxy.
title: Stellar Shooters

content: With the help of the Steam Tanks game you will have to take part in races on modern tanks. In life, of course, a combat vehicle does not drive like that. But this is a computer game in which everything is possible. In general, his speed is decent, and unlike a car, he is not afraid of roadsides or trees. But be careful when overcoming obstacles.
title: Stick Tank Wars

content: Right now you can take part in a tournament where any fighting techniques are allowed, and the main goal is the same - to stay in the ring as long as possible, defeat everyone and become a champion. Moreover, no one has yet been able to hold this title for a long time, because every time more and more new fighters enter the site.
title: Stickjet Challenge

content: During the game Stickmen at War, you have to study all the weaknesses of your enemies in order to destroy them as soon as possible. Capture the surrounding lands to be able to unlock new units. At each stage, it is necessary to destroy the statue-symbol of the enemy and repel all enemy attacks. After successfully completing the level, you will receive 2 points for upgrading your own troops.
title: Stickman 4 Archer

content: In order to play Prison Escape strategy games, you need to have a good reaction and the ability to quickly navigate in an unfamiliar room. Your task is to help the character leave the confined space and go free. In addition to the policemen guarding the building, there are many traps on the way to release, so try to act carefully and thoughtfully.
title: Stickman Army The Defenders

content: The game Stickmen will give you the opportunity to control a character who will face fierce battles with many opponents. It’s good that you have many effective attacks in your arsenal. But don’t forget to keep an eye on the hero’s health bar. It is also necessary to pick up energy capsules during the battle.
title: Stickman Bike Rider

content: Great fights are held in the backyard of the virtual bar. You can take part in them and earn some money. Your character is well trained and quite fluent in boxing techniques. But the fights are coming without restrictions and rules, you can fight both with your hands and with your feet. Try your best to win.
title: Stickman Fighter Epic Battles

content: In this game, the view is from above, and the creators didn’t bother much about how the characters look. But all the shortcomings are compensated by brutal bloody skirmishes and a chic arsenal of weapons. Of course, he is not immediately available to the main character. First you have to run with a gun. Other weapons either drop from enemies, or can be bought right in the process of passing.
title: Stickman Fugitive

content: The famous cartoon donutsaurus goes hunting for his favorite sweets. Help the funny creature get to the treat. Carefully inspect the location he got to and find the perfect path, overcoming which the hero of the game will be happy to have a bite of a delicious sugar-coated donut.
title: Stickman Jigsaw

content: A new game about black and white men. First surprise: if you get hurt, try to approach the nurse (at the beginning of the game she is lying on the bed in a red dress). Or just come along - you’ll like it. When you need to shoot - press the spacebar to switch to combat mode and back. Also, with a gun, it is much more productive to talk to the characters. The game has a lot of English dialogue, so a dictionary will come in handy. To move, simply move the mouse to the bottom of the screen.
title: Stickman Sniper Tap To Kill

content: Fight your enemies by choosing a funny boy character. Also indicate the location where you will fight with rivals. Next, you need to strike opponents, taking away their health points. From time to time, boxes with useful items will appear on the location, try to pick them up immediately.
title: Stickman Ultimate Street Fighter 3D

content: Vinnie and his team have come into conflict with a very vindictive mafia clan. The purpose of the mission is to track down the culprit of their misadventures and deal with him once and for all. But something did not go as planned, and now we have to make decisions based on the current situation. The game perfectly combines elements of sniper battles, hand-to-hand martial arts and intense chases.
title: Stickman Vector

content: Try to survive in a world overrun by zombies. You have to protect the base from the invasion of hordes of vile monsters. The walking dead do not know fatigue and fear, so the battle will be long. The game provides an opportunity to improve the skills of your fighters, heal comrades-in-arms, use many other useful features, which makes the battles incredibly interesting and varied.
title: Stickman vs Zombies

content: SpongeBob was caught, put in a cage and is about to be sent to a living corner, to an aquarium. Patrick managed to get a girlfriend somewhere, and now the two of them are in a hurry to help Bob. The game is designed exclusively for two players, but you can play alone if you control both characters at once. This approach is very useful for the development of both hemispheres of the brain.
title: Stop The Virus

content: The Fog of War game immerses you in the bright, tropical world of the wild planet Gloria-6, in the shady forests of which colonists from Earth, cut off from their home, are trying to win back their right to life. For completing missions in the game, experience points are awarded for the hero. Upgrade your character, build buildings that extract resources and develop your army.
title: Storm City Mafia

content: The process of the game for girls Dress Up for 6 years involves choosing an outfit for a young fashionista. Here you will meet a cute girl who, despite her age, already knows a lot about fashionable outfits. You are invited to create a cool image for her. The game has everything a little fashionista needs: fluffy skirts, colorful corsets, huge bows. Do not forget about choosing a hairstyle, try to find an option that is most suitable for a 6-year-old girl. Hair color can also be changed by simply clicking on the desired shade!
title: Stranger Things Christmas Party

content: Welcome to Charlotte Strawberry Café, where the main character and her friend prepare gourmet treats for visitors! The cafe opened recently, so the girls have not yet had time to hire employees to help in the kitchen. Help them cope with the influx of orders! An exciting process of cooking treats awaits you, from kneading dough to decorating desserts. There are three levels available in the game - making cakes, ice cream and milkshakes, in each of which you can show your creative side. Invent your own combinations of fruit fillings, color desserts in bright colors and sprinkle everything with multi-colored sweet crumbs - everything is limited only by your imagination!
title: Strawberry Shortcake Sweet Shop

content: Dozens of characters are offered to you to choose from to participate in the fighting tournament. While you go through levels of varying difficulty, previously hidden fighters will open. They differ from each other in speed, strength, an arsenal of specific techniques and skills. The game allows you to choose different modes, each of which has its own rules.
title: Street Fight

content: The game gives the opportunity to participate in the battle as one or a pair of players. In it, 8 characters are waiting for you, ready to fight for victory in the ring of the prestigious championship, using super blows and their various combinations. Fight in different modes - quick, practice and challenge, against the clock, or a certain number of rounds. Two players can play on the same keyboard.
title: Street Fight King Of The Gang

content: An exciting game for real fighters in which you will be able to demonstrate all your dexterity by delivering accurate and crushing blows to your opponent. Control your character with the mouse, trying to dodge your opponent’s attacks in time. Don’t forget to use the block, as any accurate hit from the opponent takes away points from you.
title: Street Fighter Madness

content: Autobahns allow you to travel at very high speeds and usually run between big cities. In this case, you will have to travel along such a road. It, alas, does not have sufficient width, so you will have to carefully overtake cars moving slowly in different rows. If you allow a collision with one of them, you will lose bonus points.
title: Street Race Takedown

content: Load the gifts into the truck and drive on the slippery snowy tracks of the Racing game for kids 4 5 years old. At New Year and Christmas, everyone is looking forward to surprises and new holiday experiences. Much depends on Santa Claus. He needs to quickly deliver all the gifts for the holiday so that the celebration comes true and everyone is satisfied. Help Santa take the right number of guests to their destination in this exciting online racing game. For the successful completion of each stage, you will receive money that can be spent on upgrading the truck.
title: Street Skater

content: In this game, you have to take part in a unique fight, where instead of professional boxers, celebrities, music and movie stars will fight in the ring. This time, your opponent will be a fragile girl. But, despite her appearance, she is fluent in boxing technique and has a well-placed strike. So don’t relax.
title: Streets Rage Fight

content: This game will take you to a real army unit, where you will need to show all your dexterity and skill in order to become a brave defender of your country. Shoot at the enemy and look around with the mouse. To use the item you like, press “Tab”. Use the W, A, S and D keys to move.
title: Strike Combat Pixel Arena 3D

content: The Driving Simulator game invites you to become a student of a driving school. In it, you will learn how to properly maneuver in a dense stream of cars and park your car in a limited space. Each lesson at the school of professional drivers takes the form of a practical test, the time of which is limited. Try to complete the task of each stage as quickly as possible and get the maximum number of points. Be careful, there are real cars on the training ground and you have to seriously try not to break them.
title: Stunt Simulator Multiplayer

content: Take care of the appearance of the heroine of this wonderful game by creating an attractive makeover for her. Your task is to use the proposed decorative elements, trying to end up with a harmonious look. The game has not only cool cosmetics, but also a variety of decorations. Try them on!
title: Stylish Makeup Look

content: The Metro 2014 game will take you to a deep subway, where there is not a single living person, but only crowds of angry zombies, thirsty for human flesh. You have no choice but to engage in a fight with them, otherwise there is no way to survive. Find and pick up weapons, ammunition, first aid kits and try to destroy all the monsters.
title: Subway 2014 game

content: Metro 2015 game will take you to the near future. The universal catastrophe has destroyed all life on Earth, only an evil roar sweeps under the arches of the underground metro. Zombies have occupied the station, killing people. Only you alone survived, ready to take up arms and give a worthy rebuff to the enemy. The goal of the game is to destroy the zombies by all possible means. Move along the subway in search of weapons, ammunition and first aid kits. Go up the escalator, check the cars, look into every corner, the main thing is not to miss a single monster.
title: Subway 2015 game

content: There was a zombie apocalypse, and now the risen dead have filled the whole city. They also occupied the subway. It is here that you need to fight the zombies in order to clear the way to the shelter. Arm yourself with firearms, they are the most effective in the fight against the risen dead.
title: Subway 3D game

content: The developer of this shooting game for boys aged 11 is Armor Games, which in itself is a guarantee of good graphics and an interesting plot. First, choose your fighter. They differ in class, capabilities and weapons. The action takes place on an unknown space station. You will have to not only fight, but also think.
title: Subway Clash Remastered

content: According to the terms of the Anime 3D game, your task is to collect the Rubik’s Cube, on which the characters of the cartoon about Naruto are drawn. The computer will shuffle the cube into several positions especially for you. At first it will be a couple of moves, then more and more. Your task is to collect the cube completely, keeping within the time allotted for each level.
title: Subway Princess Run

content: Cat Tom went on vacation to the sea, where he wants to show everyone how great he is at water skiing. Help the hero not to disgrace himself and win the heart of a beautiful kitty. The controls in the game are very simple. Your task is to press the keys that will appear on the screen in time.
title: Subway Run 2019

content: Today you have to manage a cheerful boy named Jake. Early in the morning he left the house and went for a run. But, as luck would have it, his road is teeming with all sorts of obstacles. To avoid collisions, you need to quickly press the keys with the letters that will appear on the screen. Help the young athlete overcome the distance.
title: Subway surf game

content: While playing Subway Surf, the boy lost his beloved puppy, is terribly worried about the fate of his little pet and goes in search of him. You have to help the kid run through the streets of the town where he lives and try to find the dog. You need to play carefully, because a huge number of obstacles and dangers await him on the road, pedestrians, builders, open sewer manholes and open hydrants block your path. Explore all the nooks and crannies of the town with your friend and save the lost puppy.
title: Subway Surf Halloween

content: While playing Braid Hairstyles you will learn how to make attractive braids. Choose one of the available options and get started. Just follow the prompts that appear on the screen in order to achieve the desired result in the end. For hairdressing activities you will have all the necessary tools.
title: Summer Braided Hairstyles

content: Parrot Ducky and his friends fell in love with many after the release of the cartoon “Rio”. Collect puzzles with these cute birds. On the screen you will see the pieces that need to be turned over, giving them the correct position. The game consists of several levels, and on each level the number of details increases.
title: Summer Jigsaw Puzzles

content: Tom is very fond of fresh fish, but first you still need to catch it. He had to take a fishing rod in his paws and go fishing. You need to help hungry Tom catch as many fish as possible. The game has a huge number of hints, and if you follow all the instructions, you will be able to provide the cat with food for a long time.
title: Summer Lake Fishing

content: You will control a small robot traveling through different worlds. It is also possible to fight other players in a destructible arena. In case of defeat, you can always repair your character by collecting his spare parts from the location. At the end of each level, you will be upgraded by the main character and more powerful weapons for him.
title: Sumo Party

content: Manage Mario this time will not have to. This rogue dug up an ownerless piece of gold somewhere and is now dragging it to a pawnshop. But the path is full of traps.
