Your task is to provide him with a safe path to the pawnshop using the correct placement of blocks. It is not always possible to do this the first time, but if you try, Mario will reach the collection point of precious metals alive.
title: Super Alfonso

content: After starting this game, you will find yourself in a hairdressing salon, where a pretty girl is already waiting. You need to work on her hair using a variety of tools that are in the salon. Shape a fashionable hairstyle, change the heroine’s hair color if necessary to get the most attractive result.
title: Super Barbara Real Haircuts

content: Try to turn cute ducklings into world running champions. Make sure they get the right nutrition and exercise so that they can take first place in the duck race. And then, if you have enough patience and assertiveness, there is an opportunity to compete with a fat chicken already in the professional league.
title: Super Chick Duck

content: After starting this game, you will turn into an otolaryngologist doctor. A patient came to you with problems with her ears. It is necessary to cure the girl using a variety of tools. Tips will help in this process. After you grab an item, a diagram of its use will be displayed on the screen.
title: Super Doll Ear Doctor

content: Not a bad game without much meaning, goals and objectives. Having chosen a wheelbarrow, you can change its color to your taste. Then connect to the single player mode or multiplayer mode, where the same players will drive with you at the same location. Then either just drive around the track and perform different tricks, or try to chase your opponents.
title: Super Fast Driver

content: During the game Super Fighters for free you have to control an orange Stickman who will fight with many enemies. You will have to perform spectacular tricks and destroy opponents attacking the hero from all sides. At first, it will be very easy to do this, but the further you advance, the stronger and faster your opponents become.
title: Super fighters game for free

content: After starting the Animal Doctor game, you will see the cat Angela, who was rollerblading and survived a dangerous fall. Kitty has received many injuries, serious and not so much, so it’s time to give her medical attention. In the game for girls, you will need to use the given tools correctly.
title: Super Happy Kitty

content: Alas, hunting for a bear with a gun has nothing to do with the game process. Instead of stalking this dangerous predator or luring him out of his lair, you have to do not too difficult target shooting. They imitate polar bears that run around the tent city or just sit behind shelters, popping up for a short time. The Bear Hunt game is designed for one gamer, but you can invite a company and compete in scoring points. First person view, but weapons are not shown. Instead, there is just a red sight that you need to move and shoot. That is, the genre of the game Bear Hunting can be safely described as a shooting gallery. At each level, you need to hit as many targets as possible. In between shootings, windows with useful information about polar bears open. The most important thing is that you can play for free and for as long as you like.
title: Super Hunting

content: Mario again goes in search of adventure. Locations are filled with enemies, and they must be avoided or destroyed. Collect coins and try not to fall into the bottomless abysses that come across here at almost every step. To control you will need the arrow keys and Spacebar.
title: Super Mario Run

content: The jungle is full of dangers. Killer turtles, cannibal bunches, brain-biting woodpeckers scurry about everywhere, and there are enough predatory plants. But Mario is not afraid of this. Especially if you manage it. Collect bananas and various tropical fruits. Monsters can be jumped over or trampled. To go to the next level, you need a portal to appear. It will appear when you collect the required amount of fruit.
title: Super Mario Rush

content: The Mario 3 game, with all its simplicity, can provide you with many pleasant minutes. The gameplay is simple: the main character goes forward through the location, collects money and stomps the monsters. And so from level to level. At the beginning of each level, a task is given. For example, collect a certain number of coins or kill a monster. Only when this condition is met, you can go to the next stage, reaching the blue flag. The game also has a timer. For the time saved, Mario can get extra points.
title: Super Mario Rush 2

content: The little monkey loves bananas. In this game, you’ll have to help her get to her favorite treat by climbing the bamboo branches. Choose the right branch so that the baby finds the right path to the banana. For each successful attempt, you will earn reward points. Try to Crazy Games the maximum number of points using 10 attempts.
title: Super Monkey Legend

content: The game has miniature cars and a top view. Perhaps for some it will only add bonuses. The goal is to put the car in the specified place and spend the minimum amount of time on it. It’s not easy to fulfill the conditions: as expected, there are a lot of cars in front of the supermarket, and someone in addition parked like an asshole. One collision is a game over.
title: Super Police Parking

content: An interesting children’s game 3 5 years old offers you to solve exciting puzzles related to determining the heaviest or, conversely, the lightest object from those offered in the conditions. Immediately after launch, the scales will appear on the screen, on the cups of which the things being compared are located. At the top of the screen, a task is displayed that needs to be completed by pointing the cursor at the correct item. The scales are in an equal position, so it is proposed to determine the mass of objects using logic. For example, it is immediately clear that a hammer is heavier than a salt shaker, and a feather is lighter than an alarm clock. Choose the answer that seems right to you, and if you guess right, you will get access to the next task. If you suddenly make a mistake, nothing terrible will happen, but it will immediately become clear that you need to choose another option. During the free game for children 3 5 years old, you will find a huge number of tasks!
title: Super Raccoon World

content: Games for two Shooting robots offer you to control two bots of various modifications, which must complete an urgent task. They need to find the hatch through which the exit from the galactic station is carried out. The game is designed for 2 people, so you can invite a friend. Get ready for some serious challenges.
title: Super Robo Fighter 2

content: If you like to tinker with constructors, assembling robots with your own hands, then Autobots 2 games are what you need. So, in front of you is a box with a disassembled transformer. Try to assemble it entirely from individual parts. A translucent image of an Autobot robot acts as an instruction - just take it and put the fragment in its place. You use parts from one board - you get the next one. And so on, until the robot is assembled to the end. They won’t be able to play fully, but when the 2nd game about the Autobots is completed, you can try out his guns.
title: Super Robo Fighter 3

content: While playing Rocket to Space you have to learn to think quickly and logically. To train this valuable quality, fifteen stages are given. They get progressively more difficult. The essence, by and large, is very simple. There is a rocket at the starting point. And there is a finish line. The spacecraft must get to it using intermediate stops - cubes. For maximum credit on points, you need to do everything in the minimum time. Possible flight directions are indicated by arrows, which correspond to the buttons on the keyboard. By the way, it is worth noting that the Rocket to Space game is quite coolly drawn, which will definitely appeal to kids.
title: Super Rocket

content: Unusual game, but interesting. To go to the next level, you need to get the key and climb to the very top. And initially, Mario is on the bottom log. Hatches move along the log, through which you can fall through or rise to the floor above, if you manage to jump into the hatch. Everything would be fine if it weren’t for the bird that knocks out Mario in any, even an accidental, collision.
title: Super World Adventure

content: What could be more fun than parking your car on a slippery winter road? That’s right, only the option when you have summer tires. It looks like the developers of the game thought the same way, and you are given a unique chance to try to park a truck with gifts in such conditions. All sorts of cars drive around you, which is very disturbing. Also time is limited.
title: Supercar Police Parking 2

content: Wonderful post-apocalyptic racing awaits users after downloading this game. Not only can rivals be destroyed with machine guns, but zombies will also have to be crushed on the road. Don’t forget to pick up useful bonuses along the way, like ammo, shield (temporary invulnerability) and other goodies. Top view, standard control.
title: Supercars Drift

content: Superheroes, like ordinary people, have quarrels and showdowns. In one of them you have to participate, almost personally. You will need to complete training before starting. It’s worth it, because the control keys are not quite familiar. During the fight, you can change characters (there are several of them in the team). Everyone has some special hit.
title: Superhero Confrontation game

content: The plot of the game An amateur surgeon invites you to try your hand at the role of a veterinarian. Try to examine the funny puppy as soon as possible, conduct the necessary tests and perform an operation that will save the baby’s life. Thanks to your help, the puppy will recover very quickly and will soon have fun running around the street.
title: Superhero Doll Hospital Recovery

content: During this game you have to do manicures. Proceed to the processing of nails, using the proposed opportunities. Here you will find a huge number of different varnishes, stickers, patterns. Also in the game there is a good assortment of rings and bracelets, which definitely will not be superfluous.
title: Superhero Doll Manicure

content: Here is a 2D fighting game in which you can control different characters, including Superman, Batman, Aquaman, Joker and Green Lantern, meeting in battles with no less famous supervillains. As you progress through the game, its main characters gain experience, and you get access to new warriors.
title: Superhero Fight

content: During the game Give birth to children you have to become an obstetrician of a charming princess. Not afraid? Then go ahead! You will end up in a hospital where the heroine of the game is almost ready to become a mother. All the necessary medical instruments have already been prepared on the screen to help the baby be born. Start the operation, throwing all the bad thoughts out of your head. Game tips for girls will help you navigate and show you how a specialist should act when a woman begins to give birth. Take the item indicated by the big pink arrow and use it for its intended purpose.
title: Superhero Pregnant Emergency

content: After starting the game for girls Paint nails you will turn into a manicurist. The task is to take care of the nails of another fashionista who always looks after her appearance. There is a large number of varnishes in front of you, choose any shade and apply on your nails. You can even use different options to get the original result. In addition to varnishes, stickers of various shapes and colors are presented here. And you can, if you wish, put cute rings on the girl’s fingers. Jewelery is presented in a wide range. Decide if the rings are needed for the created manicure, and if necessary, drag them to the selected fingers. And one more thing: in the game you can not only paint your nails online and choose rings, but also change the color of your skin. Which one do you prefer: darker or lighter?
title: Superhero Princesses Nails Salon

content: Taxi 4 game invites you to take part in a competition organized by one of the largest taxi companies in New York. In order to obtain a taxi driver’s license, you must complete the tasks that a demanding instructor offers you. Show off your driving skills and get a work permit.
title: Superhero Taxi

content: In this game you have to play on behalf of superman. The task is to fly around the city, collecting bonus items. From time to time you will meet enemies, and you need to fight them, because Superman was created for this. The top of the screen displays all the important information that can help you in the game.
title: Superman Puzzle Challenge

content: During the game Grocery Supermarket you will be asked to help the girl to make purchases. In front of you are several stores that open in sequence. Go to the open one at the moment and start buying goods. The girl will tell you what she needs, and you just have to find the thing on the shelves.
title: Supermarket Manager

content: Only the fastest and most famous riders participate in this motocross. Try to leave them all far behind. Pay close attention to the road, there are many sharp turns on the track. The most important thing on the track is to collect temporary acceleration bonuses. This will give you the opportunity to get ahead and be the first to cross the finish line.
title: SuperMoto GT

content: Game Survival 2012 is a grandiose battle in a creepy graveyard. When creating your team, you have the opportunity to choose not only the number of players and time, but also the type of game. It can be a quest for a while, or a battle in the style of “every man for himself” to the last hero. Everything would be fine, but in addition to natural opponents, zombies roam the cemetery, from which you also need to shoot back.
title: Survival Game 2012

content: The Life Simulator game will give you the opportunity, controlling one of 4 characters, to spend a whole month in a fairy-tale city, becoming truly happy. Feel free and find the best job in the world. But first you need to get an education. Don’t forget that you also need to make friends in order to be truly successful.
title: Survival Simulator

content: The toy has a top view, so don’t expect any special beauty from the image of the car. They look like toy cars. The goal is to move along the arrows, drive the car to the parking lot and park it. You need to park correctly, observing where the back should be, and where in front of the car. Collisions damage your car. If there are too many, the game will end.
title: SUV Parking Simulator 3D

content: Deep below the city, a cheerful alligator lives in a sewer. He wanted to take a bath, but here’s the problem - the pipe burst. You can help him make his dream come true. All that is needed is to dig a path underground from the lake to the pipe. In this case, you need to make sure that the water washes away the shampoo in the form of ducklings. The game has many levels.
title: Swampy game for children 4 years old

content: All jigsaw puzzle lovers will love this simple but interesting game. It is necessary to assemble a full-fledged image from a large number of pieces. To do this, move the elements to the appropriate places and connect them in the correct order. As a result, you will get a bright and pretty picture.
title: Swan Puzzle Challenge

content: The kids game for girls takes you to London where the streets are full of trendy shops. You are given a certain amount of money that you can spend at your own discretion, purchasing clothes, shoes and accessories. Please note that from time to time you will be invited to parties with a strict dress code. In this case, look for things with the indicated icon among the whole variety in order to successfully enter the event and increase your gaming level. In order to get even more money in the kids game for the littlest girls, you can apply for a job. To do this, you just need to look at the institution that offers employment and accept the offer. But while you are working, it will be impossible to go shopping and make purchases. Well, everything is like in life! The game can be interesting not only for kids, but even for some adults.
title: Sweet Angie Fashion Dressing Room

content: During the game for children 4 years old Balls, your child will be able to feel like a bully. After all, only hooligans burst flying balls from spitting tubes. In more detail, everything looks like this: the main character must spit pieces of newspaper through a tube folded from paper and knock down as many balls as possible. The goal is to Crazy Games the maximum number of points.
title: Sweet Candy

content: Kids Games Dress Up 2 offer you to come up with a new dress for a cute girl. First, choose its top, and then add a skirt and a variety of decorative elements. The color of any detail can be changed, so your flight of fancy can be unlimited. Don’t forget to choose the right hairstyle.
title: Sweet Princess Dressing Room

content: Chica the hen and her friends had a big celebration on the occasion of Mr. C’s birthday. During the celebration, the guests managed to break all the paintings in the house. Help the hostess fold the pieces correctly and glue the pictures together. Chika will be grateful for your help and will return all the images to their places with great pleasure.
title: Sweet Puzzle Time

content: Funny toy. From the name it may seem that it has something to do with the cartoon about training the dragon. But it is not so. The essence of the game is as follows. Viking (that is, you) gets the task to run a certain distance. He will move on his own. Your task is to remove obstacles and collect coins. If the character hesitates, then the dragon will devour him.
title: Sweet Tooth Rush

content: This game invites you to become a graphic designer for a while and understand a huge number of original patterns. Among the many pieces of the puzzle, try to find pairs of the same and point to them with the mouse cursor. If you can’t complete the task in the allotted time, ask your parents to join you and help a little.
title: Sweety Mahjong 1

content: Animals Match 3 game invites you to go to the world of Wubbis - funny and very curious insects. So this time, shaggy balls managed to get into a huge press. Use your magic cannon to try to free all the wubbis from the trap for free before the huge top plate crushes the unfortunate babies. Collect chains of three or more balls and release them. Thanks to your help, all the cute shaggy babies will definitely get out of the dangerous trap and go in search of new adventures.
title: Tabby Island

content: The Weapon Crafting Simulator game takes you to a village where the inhabitants are about to fight their enemies. You will play the role of a blacksmith who makes a variety of weapons. Take orders from incoming soldiers, and then make swords, axes and other items for battle. The finished weapon will be evaluated by the client.
title: Tactical Weapon Pack 2

content: This game is as close as possible to real combat conditions. It is just for those who have always wanted to try their hand at driving a battle tank. You have to take part in the battle of armored vehicles, shoot at enemies and dodge their shots. To hit the enemy, you will have to take into account the strength of the wind, the severity of the projectile and other factors.
title: Tactics Core

content: The process of making music will turn you into a real composer. In it, you can invent your own melodies, which will be immediately performed by a team of professional musicians. On the screen you will see a trinity of great guys who know a lot about quality music. Two guitarists and a drummer will help you deal with the creation of compositions. Above the group there is a special field where you need to drive in digital values ​​that will tell the game characters what exactly needs to be done at the moment. Your fantasy is not limited by anything, you can do anything: put any numbers and listen to what happened in the end.
title: Talking Tom Piano Time

content: Your green tank is involved in a fast-paced battle with yellow enemy vehicles. You need to move very quickly within the walls of the labyrinth, moving away from enemy fire and constantly shooting to kill. Break through the walls with shots, clearing the way to the final goal - the transition to the next level.
title: Tank

content: Your task in this game is to protect the territory from enemies by all available means. Arrange your units so as not to let the enemy break through the defense. As you accumulate points awarded for each successful operation, you can purchase additional weapons and use them to strengthen your positions.
title: Tank Battle: War Commander

content: The crew of the tank, which you will control, has been assigned a combat mission, for which you need to destroy the entire city, destroy all buildings and vehicles. Move through the streets and fire continuously from all types of weapons, causing damage to city blocks. The enemy will try to interfere by throwing troops against you that have to be overcome.
title: Tank Commander

content: In this game you have to become a driver of a modern tank. Try to park your combat vehicle on the territory of a military base filled with a huge amount of equipment. By controlling the movements of the tank, try to bring it to the parking place. Be careful, if you hit other vehicles during an unsuccessful maneuver, you will have to go through the level again.
title: Tank Driver Simulator

content: The game Tank Destroyer 2 will give you the opportunity to set a record for the destruction of enemies in a fairly large area. You only have one life. And for it you need to have time to ride behind enemy lines and inflict as much damage as possible on him. To do this, try to destroy enemy tanks and guns. But be prepared for return fire.
title: Tank Forces Survival

content: “Tank fury” is a fun multiplayer platform game with cartoonish graphics. Side view, of course. The game is in full swing all the time. Someone drops out, but immediately reappears and continues to play. Tanks can not only shoot from a cannon, but also repel each other with a fun device - a boxing glove with a spring. If you manage to break the boxes, you can get other shells or some temporary bonuses. All opponents are controlled by live users. The goal is to take first place in the ranking of players.
title: Tank Fury

content: You control a team of fighters who fight against the enemy on a randomly generated landscape. You can play with the computer or with your friends on the same keyboard. The rules are simple. Each of the belligerents in turn strikes the opponent using the weapons it has.
title: Tank Game Online

content: You are waiting for unforgettable tank battles that will take place in one of the Russian cities during the Second World War between the German army and the forces of the USSR. In order to win in each battle, you will need not only to destroy the opponents, but also to protect your base from enemy attacks. You can use various bonuses to defeat the invader.
title: Tank Heroes

content: All you have to do in this game is to control a recruit who finds himself in a war zone. Using the mouse and keyboard, you can move to any side of the screen, jump onto the platforms and go down. The E button performs all active actions: repairing items, opening gates, searching in the bushes, collecting things.
title: Tank Off

content: Racing games for two tanks will show you how the competition of these bulky cars actually goes. Agree, it is difficult to imagine a tank on the steep turns of the race track. You have the opportunity to drive this combat vehicle and try to be the first to the finish line. The most important thing is to enter the turns correctly.
title: Tank Rumble

content: Quite a dynamic game in which you have to destroy enemy tanks, aircraft and infantry units. You control an armored vehicle, and in a particularly difficult situation, you have the opportunity to call for air support. To accomplish the task, you can use various weapons, up to the atomic bomb.
title: Tank War Simulator

content: During the game for two Shooters 1 on 1 you have to survive during the battle in the jungle with the local natives. To provide more effective resistance to the enemy, break all the wooden boxes that will catch your eye during the battle. There are more powerful weapons and explosives. But from time to time you will have to participate in hand-to-hand combat.
title: TankHit

content: “Tanks.io” is a dynamic multiplayer game with two battle modes and a user rating system. Pretty simple graphics are offset by the ability to participate in large-scale gambling battles. You don’t need to download anything. All you need is a stable internet connection.
title: Tanki.io games

content: While playing Tanks with a team, you become one of the US servicemen who took part in the opening of the second front during the Second World War. At the beginning of the story, you are the driver of one of the armored vehicles participating in the battles. Gaining experience in combat operations, you gradually gain access to more powerful types of military equipment needed in the fight against the enemy.
title: Tanko io

content: Super tank games will allow you to plunge into the world of real battles. Any tanker dreams of driving a powerful machine that can level an entire city to the ground in a matter of seconds. Today you have just such a tank at your disposal. He has a bunch of the most modern deadly weapons in his arsenal. To learn more about control keys, press Enter.
title: Tanko.io

content: Super tank games will allow you to plunge into the world of real battles. Any tanker dreams of driving a powerful machine that can level an entire city to the ground in a matter of seconds. Today you have just such a tank at your disposal. He has a bunch of the most modern deadly weapons in his arsenal. To learn more about control keys, press Enter.
title: Tanko.io

content: The presence of tanks on the battlefield is of great importance, and you can see for yourself by driving one of these armored vehicles. Constantly move ahead of the infantry, clearing the way for it, which will allow you to avoid unnecessary losses and capture a large territory. Improving your material part, you will be able to destroy the most fortified points of the enemy defense.
title: Tanks Battlefield

content: In this game, you’ll be able to ride a very cool Grizzly tank, which was designed and equipped specifically for complex military operations. You can control the armored vehicle using the arrow keys. Switch weapons - press the space bar. Use the mouse to aim and shoot.
title: Tanks Battlefield samename1

content: An excellent game Tanchiki Dandy will certainly appeal to children. Well, adults will be completely delighted with it, because it was in it that they once played on consoles. Touch and you to an unforgettable classic by starting to play Dandy Tanks right now! In them, you need to control a tank that needs to get through hordes of enemies to the place marked on the map. You can get acquainted with this map by pressing the space bar. Move along the roads, shoot soldiers and enemy tanks that come across on the way. Try to avoid their attacks, because each projectile that hits will take away some health. It is displayed on the scale in the lower left corner of the screen.
title: Tanks Classic

content: Thanks to this game, you find yourself in the unique times of the appearance of the first tanks as a new type of weapon. Then these monsters looked completely different from what they are today, they had a steam engine, weak weapons and thin armor. You have to show design skills, upgrade your combat vehicle and defeat all enemies. Thus, you will prove the viability of this type of technology.
title: Tanks Master

content: The game offers you to fight hordes of crayfish on ten difficulty levels. This version features three types of arthropods: small, medium and large individuals. Each type has its own individual style of combat, and the composition and size of the enemy team depends on the tank chosen by the player and the level of difficulty.
title: Tanks Squad

content: This game will appeal to gamers - lovers of all sorts of robots and fancy tanks. View from above. By controlling the combat vehicle using the keyboard and mouse, you need to destroy enemy robots and not be exposed to their shots. At certain points of the location, you can pick up bonuses. In the place of the blown up enemies there is money - collect them for an upgrade.
title: Tanks vs robots game

content: Fantastic game takes you to the times of the distant future. Just imagine: earthlings discover new galaxies in search of a planet suitable for life. You and your friends are lucky: you are the first to discover a pretty planet and start settling it. However, local residents are extremely hostile. Fierce battles are ahead. Watch your back.
title: Tanks: Sci-Fi Battle

content: You’ve been dropped off on an island where terrorists are holding American army soldiers hostage. It is necessary to get through the dense jungle to the location of the camp and free the prisoners. Complete the mission to the end and get a reward. Just be careful, there are a lot of guards around. And you have a limited number of lives.
title: TanksIO Online

content: Your mission is to go through 5 levels and get to the temple with treasures that have long been planned to be captured. The entire building is like a labyrinth, with enemies guarding the jewels waiting in every room. Be ready for constant battles, move along the perimeter of the room, shooting at checkpoints to protect the precious metal.
title: Tanksioonline

content: Playing World of Tanks has become much more difficult. Before you is a fairly realistic simulator for driving a huge machine, made in 3D graphics. The effects of shots, explosions and a lot of vehicles will not leave indifferent even the most sophisticated fans of tank battles. It is possible to play online, explore the area, studying the location of enemy equipment and military fortifications. These can be machine gunners, armored vehicles, artillery mounts, bunkers and ammunition depots. Your tank has two types of weapons, a cannon and a machine gun. If the enemies are located far away, you can turn on the sight in the World of Tank and destroy them from any point in the line of sight. But you should be careful about the controls: if the car rolls over or falls off a cliff, the game will end.
title: Tanksmith io

content: You have to fight with a large Nazi army, having only one tank at your disposal. So that you can fight on equal terms with the enemy, after each battle there is an opportunity to improve the combat characteristics of your combat vehicle. First of all, destroy grenade launchers - they pose the most serious danger to tank armor.
title: Tankwars io

content: Today you will control a combat train, which, in addition to being able to ride on rails, also has the ability to fly. He was equipped with combat fire missiles, which he can fire at enemies if he wishes. The essence of the game is to get into the enemy base and defeat it.
title: Tanque 3D: Sports

content: The game Tanks against crayfish has a very simple, but at the same time, fantastic plot: crayfish attack a combat vehicle. By the way, they are drawn just fine, which cannot be said about the tank. In addition, there is a top view, aiming and shooting with the mouse. It is better not to stand still, otherwise the crayfish will quickly surround you and crush you. To pass the level, you must destroy a certain number of ticks.
title: Tanque 3D: Tank Battle

content: This exciting game is reminiscent of the board Monopoly. On the screen you will see a field marked into cells. Press the button, which acts as a cube, and move to the appropriate number of cells. Acquire firms, make bank deposits, play casinos. Your goal is to get rich and deprive your rivals of their income.
title: Tap For Money Restaurant

content: It is not often that you get a chance to be the captain of a comfortable yacht for at least a short time. This game will give you that opportunity. The task is to park the ship in the allotted place. This must be done with all caution so as not to drown the boat. To control, use the arrow keys and carefully look around.
title: Tap Tap Parking

content: The game Mutants is not distinguished by any advanced plot. But in it you can let off steam after a hard day. View from above. The adventure begins in the store, but you still won’t be able to buy new weapons, because they are not available by level. However, you can take an additional grenade by spending all the money at once. Next, you will find yourself in a room, go through a short training and start repelling mutant attacks. Collect the rest after them (money, bonuses, prizes). I use grenades only as a last resort - they are expensive. When all the mutants are killed, the passage to the neighboring rooms will open. Between stages, spend money in the store.
title: Tap The Zombies

content: While playing Taxi Cars, you become a taxi driver. Your main task is to get to the customer as quickly as possible, and then bring him to his destination in a limited time. Carefully follow the arrows of the navigator, which will tell you where to go. The traffic of cars and pedestrians in the city is very busy, and you will have to make every effort not to get into an accident and not crash your car. Try to complete as many orders as possible on time, because the amount that you earn in a taxi depends on it.
title: Taxi car game

content: Help the stars of the music world perform new compositions. To do this, simply click on the indicated arrow buttons. You should not make a mistake, because three mistakes will definitely lead to a loss. Gradually, the game becomes more difficult, and you need to react as quickly as possible to what is happening on the screen.
title: Tayler Schwift Vs Khanye East Parody Bat

content: Children’s educational game is aimed at training mathematical thinking. You need to play it together, each participant controls an alien on a flying saucer. A mathematical example is displayed on the screen, and you need to fly to the answer number as quickly as possible, ahead of your opponent. Fuel is limited!
title: Teddy Bear Puzzle

content: Incredible adventures await you in one of the pirate hideouts. A huge metropolis inhabited exclusively by thugs and their families, threatens the safety of navigation throughout the Pacific Ocean. Try to destroy the army of pirates with the help of various explosive devices and wipe out a terrible city from the face of the earth.
title: Teen Titans Jigsaw

content: The Egyptian pyramids are full of mysteries and, one must understand, treasures that are guarded by dead pharaohs and their numerous servants, who, as you know, were buried with their owners and often alive. In this bright game, by the way, made in 3D, you have to control (rear and top view from a third person) either an explorer or a tomb robber who is running away from mummies.
title: Temple Quest

content: Terraria 3D game invites you to take part in an exciting adventure on a deserted island. Try to organize your life and protect yourself from the bloodthirsty natives using your knowledge and ingenuity. Try to explore the entire island as quickly as possible and find items that will help you survive.
title: Terraria 3D game

content: The old pirate decided to go on an honorable vacation, but on his last voyage he was shipwrecked near the famous treasure island. Help the sea wolf to search a piece of land and find all the chests of gold that were hidden by his bloodthirsty comrades. Try to do everything as quickly as possible, and then the pirate will give you one of the found gold coins.
title: Terraria game on a desert island

content: Welcome to the test site where the Mars rocket will be tested. And you will do it. The essence is simple, like a cork: you need to launch a rocket as high as possible. It would be nice to collect bonuses along the way. But the aircraft is poorly controlled. An upgrade will help the case, with the help of which you will also attach all sorts of useful jokes to it.
title: Terre Defense

content: Welcome to a very useful shooting game where zombies act as enemies. First-person view. The action takes place on a moonlit night in the forest - atmospheric, but visibility is quite tolerable. Initially, you have a gun and a thousand rounds of ammunition. Shoot zombies coming out of a lonely house. Pick up the weapons that have fallen out of them, but remember - there are not many cartridges in it.
title: Terrible Wasteland

content: The authors of the Spider-Man coloring game invite you to try your hand at the role of a cartoonist who designs characters for computer games. The company’s specialists have just begun to create a new game, the character of which will be a brave crime fighter - Spider-Man. This time you have to work with the image of Spiderman. Using the brush-shaped cursor, select the desired paint, and then indicate the areas of the picture that need to be painted. Cool coloring book is perfect for both boys and girls, it will allow any player to demonstrate all their talents for free. You can keep the finished work as a keepsake or print it out and present it to your friends.
title: The Amazing Spiderman Online

content: The lovers are going to the wedding ceremony, and you need to think over the most suitable outfits for them. Pick up a suit for the groom and a dress for the bride, not forgetting about various little things. The finished image of happy newlyweds can be saved to a computer or printed.
title: The Day Before Elsa Wedding

content: The Dino World game is designed for younger gamers, but it will also be interesting for those who are older. The main characters here are dinosaur friends. One of them is large, and the second is small, in connection with which he loves to ride on a friend. From time to time they have to overcome obstacles. Where the big man cannot pass, the small lizard will pass and open the way. It will be very fun to play.
title: The Dino King

content: During the mindfulness game for children 10 years old, you have to correctly arrange the individual pieces of the image in a large picture. Carefully inspect all the fragments and the large image, looking for places that match. After that, with the help of the cursor and the mouse, move the pieces to the desired parts of the picture.
title: The Eternal Temple

content: During the game Adventure Cats you will control a funny kitten traveling through the fairy kingdom. Help him overcome all the obstacles that will meet on the way. Sometimes it will be necessary to think carefully about actions in order to be able to move on. Otherwise you’ll be stuck!
title: The Fishercat Online

content: Lately, SpongeBob has been noticing that strange things are happening in Bikini Bottom. It turns out that the evil Plankton has created a device that can destroy all life around. Help our hero disable this device. Beware of gray jellyfish - they take lives. But Krabs hamburgers, on the contrary, replenish health.
title: The Great Snail Race

content: The Submarine Simulator game will take you to the ocean depths that you need to explore. First, create a suitable transport for yourself, using the available money to purchase the necessary parts. After you finish your work, set sail. The game about submarines will be very interesting!
title: The Immersion

content: The popular online platformer “Incredible Geometry Dash” is available to play for free. But do you have enough patience and enough direct hands? Start playing and test yourself. The character you control looks like a cube with a mouth and eyes. He slides from one part of the screen to another, and you have to save this mindless creature from collisions with various obstacles. Just click the left mouse button to make the hero jump at the right moment. It is impossible to complete the Geometry Dash game the first time.
title: The Impossible Dash

content: Your ward is besieged by hordes of zombies. In this hell he has to hold out for seven days. Don’t let the monsters destroy the hero and turn him into the same walking dead as they are. Fight off enemies coming from all directions with the help of available firearms or machetes. The game has a shop where you can buy ammunition.
title: The Last Survivors

content: After starting this exciting game, you have to work in a store that sells different pets. It is necessary to meet buyers and find out who they want to acquire. Then it remains only to choose a suitable pet and bring it to the client, receiving money for it. Act as quickly as possible.
title: The Little Pet Shop in the Woods

content: The game My Pet will appeal to all lovers of pets. Here you are invited to take care of a small four-legged baby. Choose who it will be: a cat or a dog. You can also choose the appearance of the pet and give it a name. Next, go to the house where your animal will live. Your task is to feed your new friend, play with him, carry out various useful procedures. Tips displayed at the top of the screen will help you figure out exactly what your baby wants. Take care of the animal carefully so that it is always in a good mood. Just select the appropriate item in the game menu, after which you will receive an item that will need to be used for its intended purpose. Give it to your pet and watch what happens. The house has several rooms, and it will be quite fun to play!
title: The Lost Pets

content: The inspector is approached with a very delicate request, as the police are unable to help. Your task is to investigate the crime, find evidence that was not seen, and get on the trail of the suspect. To do this, you need to carefully examine all the rooms in the house and find evidence that will help unravel the case.
title: The Railway Detectives

content: The scariest game of 2015 puts you in the role of an ordinary mechanic on a space mining ship for a scheduled repair of communication systems. But a seemingly simple task quickly turns into a real struggle for one’s own existence. There is a serious battle against mysterious monsters.
title: The scariest game of 2015

content: According to the terms of the Hidden Object mini-game, you will have to help the main character, the clever and beautiful Natalie Brooks, over 7 levels. This time she needs to save the life of her grandfather, who was kidnapped by unknown villains. The girl has only 24 hours to find artifacts, and at the same time unravel some important secrets.
title: The Secret Pyramid

content: The Smurfs game will allow you to participate in exciting bike races. This vehicle is safer than motorcycles or cars, which, of course, is a plus. But not everything is as simple as it might seem at first glance. First impressions are often deceiving. There are also exceptions to the general rule. And this game is one of them. Your task, controlling a smurf, is to get to the finish line as soon as possible, bypassing all the obstacles in the process of passing the game. With each level, the difficulty of passing increases, so move carefully.
title: The Smurfs Counting Game

content: Football competitions have always attracted many people of different generations. If you want to play unusual football with heads or arrange a small competition, this game is just for you. Choose your team, define the conditions, and start your way to victory. Train and win cup after cup.
title: The Smurfs Football Match

content: The Thief Simulator game offers you to help a boy whose apartment has been invaded by a robber. The task is to click on the items in time to help deal with the attacker. You can use those objects that turn red when you hover over them.
title: Thief Challenge

content: The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles discovered Shredder’s secret base, where the villain tried to create an army of robotic warriors and, with their help, first capture New York, and then the entire planet. Help the heroes of this wonderful toy to destroy as many Purple Dragon gang warriors as possible and fight Shredder himself in a deadly battle.
title: Threat game on the streets of Manhattan

content: After starting this game, you will see on the screen a girl who is going to marry her beloved prince. Your task is to design a wedding dress for her. Grab any items with the cursor and drag them to the heroine. The game menu contains only the most stylish dresses and accessories.
title: Tiana Spring Green Wedding

content: Unlike other tic-tac-toe games, this computer plays really hard and even harshly. In addition, the time to think about a move is limited to a few seconds. So you have to think very quickly. On the other hand, such an approach will only further develop your brains, ingenuity and cunning. Mouse control.
title: Tic-tac-toe game for time

content: The heroes of the game Animal Simulators 3D - funny puppies, organized a special squad, which is designed to help people and animals in trouble. In addition to 7 wonderful dogs, the Puppy Patrol includes a ten-year-old boy, Ryder. It is he who is the leader of the tailed team from this simulation game. Its members invite you to join them and feel like a real animal, able to cope with any task. Together with the brave puppies and their commander you will take part in 4 rescue missions. Performing each of them, demonstrate good reaction, ingenuity and courage. On Ryder’s communicator, select one of the locations in the simulator where you need help, and immediately go there. In each task, you will need to help local farmers harvest and transport it to storage. Carefully inspect all 3D locations of the game where the puppy squad moves, and start saving the crop as soon as possible. Thanks to your diligence and well-coordinated work of the team, all the tasks of the simulator will be successfully completed, and fruits and vegetables will fall into storage. Grateful farmers will certainly arrange a grand celebration in honor of the brave animals, where you will be officially accepted into the Puppy Patrol.
title: Tiger Simulator

content: The hero of this game accidentally discovered an old map showing the place where an old pirate buried a huge treasure. He asks you to go on a journey with him. Help the treasure hunter get to the chest with gold bars as quickly as possible. By controlling the movements of your partner, try to dig an underground passage to the pirate’s huge treasure.
title: Timed Terraria game

content: The exciting Pisces game will take you to the underwater space, where you will be offered to control a small fish, which is not averse to feasting on its own kind. But you can only eat those fish that are smaller than yours. If the sea creature is larger than you, there is a danger of being eaten yourself. And this should not be allowed, so as not to lose. As you eat fish, your character will grow, which will allow you to switch to larger individuals. All currently available food is displayed in the lower right corner of the screen.
title: Tiny Fish Factory

content: During the game for children 8 9 years old you will need to create delicious and beautiful ice cream. For this, everything you need is prepared here. You should start by choosing a waffle cup in which you want to place the ice cream chosen for children. Next comes the turn of fillers and decorative elements. There are a huge number of them here. You can use any topping, sprinkles, berries and other nice additions for a cold treat. Finally, choose a background and hand the ice cream to the girl, then admire the result.
title: Tiny Man And Red Bat

content: An excellent game for three Tanks in the labyrinth 2 allows you to immerse yourself in exciting battles. You can play against the computer or fight with real opponents. Move your tank through the maze and fall on the enemies, trying to destroy them as quickly as possible. Periodically on the way there will be bonuses.
title: Tiny Tanks

content: Today you have to show your abilities as a strategist and tactician. The Decepticons approach the Autobot stronghold. Your task is to place combat robots at posts in such a way as to prevent the capture of the citadel. At the beginning of the game, you can only use four transformers. Then you can buy warriors for points received for killed enemies.
title: Titans Return

content: The heroine of the game went to the far side of the field, but accidentally scattered gardening supplies all over the garden. Help the muddler: get on your bike and go searching, find all the scattered things in the labyrinths of the homestead and deliver them to the girl. The baby will be very grateful to you for your help.
title: Tom And Jerry Mouse Maze

content: Catcher Tom and Jerry
title: Tom And Jerry Run

content: In this game you have to help Tom and Angela kiss. A cat and a cat in love really want to pay attention to each other, but no one should see their kisses. Therefore, as soon as there is a danger of being noticed, it is necessary to immediately stop the exciting process. The progress of passing the level is displayed on the scale at the top of the screen.
title: Tom Angela Kissing

content: After starting this game, you will find yourself in mysterious places full of dangers. You will steal a huge crystal, after which you need to run forward and only forward, trying to go as long as possible. Jump over obstacles or crawl under them, don’t forget to collect as many coins as possible.
title: Tomb Runner game

content: Some crazy Viking will run and collect coins on the go in this game. Judging by the color of the body, completely frostbitten. Even when it crashes into an obstacle, it shatters into pieces, like ice. For the collected coins, buy all sorts of stray and upgrade opportunities. The controls are simple, side view of the character. You can take turns playing with your friends.
title: Tomb Temple Run

content: All fans of the popular animated series “Danny Phantom” will enjoy playing Solve in puzzles. The insidious Vlad Plasmius found a spell in one of the ancient magical artifacts, with the help of which he enclosed Denny’s family and his friends in a photograph, and then tore it into many pieces. We need to fix the situation. Collecting plasma means correctly connecting pieces with the image of cartoon characters to each other and, thanks to this, to break the monstrous spell. Try to collect the picture as quickly as possible, because the villain Vlad has already sent his army to capture Denny’s hometown.
title: Toon Halloween Jigsaw

content: This shooter will appeal to all fans of the popular Minecraft game. A dynamic toy sends you to the battlefield, where it invites you to take part in online battles with other players. Gamers participating in the competition are divided into two groups. The winner is the team that destroys the most opponents in the allotted time.
title: Toon Off

content: This game is a step-by-step instruction for cooking two delicious cheeseburgers. Recipes will vary from one to another. All that is required of you is to follow the yellow-green arrows in the pictures and follow the chef’s instructions exactly. If everything works out, you will earn a record number of points.
title: Top Burger

content: Destruction
title: Tornado io

content: The game is dedicated to the war with dinosaurs and time travel. You ended up on Earth during the Jurassic period and must help the scientist fix the time machine. Create impregnable defenses, extract resources and invent new ways of defense. Use the power of future technology to turn attacking dinosaurs into piles of bones.
title: Tower Defense Breakthrough game

content: You can start a new game or choose an old save if you have one. You can skip the long introduction, it’s still in English. Then, after some preparations, you can finally start playing. Its essence is reduced to the defense of your castle from enemies. The defense must smoothly turn into an attack, because the flow of enemies is endless. The purpose of the attack: destroy the enemy castle.
title: Tower Defense D

content: In this game you are waiting for the most dangerous adventures with a lot of battles. You have to save the princess, who was kidnapped by the villain and imprisoned in his castle. Collect all the keys to the doors and save the girl. But first you have to fight with her harsh guards. To deal more damage to enemies, try to apply maximum force to strike with a sword.
title: Tower RPG Adventure

content: Airplanes for two game invites you to conquer the airspace. There are a huge number of levels, each of which has a specific task waiting for you. For example, you will need to fly through hoops or destroy targets. After each level, it is possible to upgrade the aircraft.
title: Tower Vs Tower

content: In this exciting game, you will be asked to prepare your pet for the exhibition. First, choose the character you want to decorate. Next, carry out all hygiene procedures, and then choose a nice outfit for him. After that, all that remains is to go on stage, getting into the lenses of cameras.
title: Toy Maker

content: During this game, you will turn into a salesman working in a toy store. Your task is to sell incoming customers exactly what they want. Pay close attention to what customers want, and then bring them the right toys and get paid for it.
title: Toy Shop

content: Mahjong connect game is one of the variants of the well-known oriental logic puzzle. Many, for sure, have seen it on their computers in the standard sets of entertainment applications of the operating system. But in this case, there are a number of differences.
title: Toys Mahjong Connect

content: According to the terms of Tractors 2, you need to tow a broken car and simply deliver it to the garage, which is located nearby. First, back up a little to hook the car with a cable. Then slowly hit the road, because you need to bring your cargo safe and sound. Therefore, do not accelerate and carefully overcome obstacles.
title: Tractor Farming Simulator

content: In this game you will again confront the terrorists. This time they need to be chased by car and neutralized before they throw off and detonate a bomb in the middle of the city. You need to go, guided by the arrow, however, it is not so easy. Your car has very poor handling and constant drifts do not allow normal acceleration.
title: Traffic Car Racing

content: In this game you will drive an ambulance. An urgent challenge awaits you, and you need to deftly overcome obstacles to get to the patient as soon as possible. Then turn around and take him to the hospital, carefully moving over bumps and potholes. Calls come from all over the city, but your goal is to deliver all the victims to the hospital.
title: Traffic Rescue

content: The process of the City Racing game will enchant you with a mix of excitement and speed, which will help you overtake your rivals. If you decide to play it long enough, you can get great pleasure, because there are a lot of levels in it.
title: Traffic Road

content: Beautiful toy with beautiful cars. By tradition, you can only choose one right away, but look at other options to know what to strive for. Your task is simple to disgrace: rush along the highway at top speed, perform risky overtaking and earn points. The first collision leads to the end of the level. The goal is to go more.
title: Traffic Run

content: The train driver during the game 3d subway simulator is responsible for the life and safety of passengers. Open and close doors using the Q and E keys, and get underway without exceeding the speed limit. Park the train correctly so that it is convenient for people to enter or leave the cars. You earn points for the number of passengers you carry.
title: Train Simulator 2019

content: The car of the transforming robot has become partially unusable and now it will have to be overhauled. Hurry up and drive the car to the garage and call an experienced auto mechanic for help. Under his guidance, take care of straightening the side doors of the car, tapping with a hammer the places that have deformation.
title: Transformers Robots in Disguise: Combiner Force

content: You would think that the Autobots have missions that are not important to anyone! So this time the importance of the mission just rolls over, as well as the number of enemies. Choose your robot at the very beginning of the game and start saving the world. But first, you should look into the control section and remember the necessary buttons. What’s annoying about this game is all the introductory cutscenes.
title: Transformers Super Mini-Con Striker

content: Transformers are amazing creatures. They can become something useful in an instant, such as a truck, an airplane, and so on. But robots not only fight wars and help people, sometimes they also have fun. Although in this turbulent time, it is unlikely that it will be possible to simply have fun. There will always be someone worth killing.
title: Transformers: Dinobot Hunt

content: The Autobots rush to help, but the main thing is that the gasoline does not run out on the way. You can take part in a merciless battle with the Decepticons, of course, if you break through the jungle of instructions and other obstacles. Use the weapons of Bumble BI to stop the flow of enemy robots. Place mines, automatic turrets and crush them with your feet.
title: Transformers: Energon Rally

content: The Decepticons attacked the Earth and now the Autobots need to protect people. In this game you will defend the city. Arrange cyborgs on the roofs of buildings, organizing an ambush for enemy units. Each robot has its own fire parameters, which can be further upgraded. Use your knowledge of military tactics to effectively repel any enemy attacks.
title: Transformers: Protect Crown City

content: One of the air force bases located in Latin America was attacked by aliens. You have to repulse enemy attacks and destroy the maximum number of “green men”. At your disposal there is a huge double-barreled machine gun, the shells of which are unable to stop even the space armor of the aliens.
title: Transmorpher 3 Ancient Alien

content: Wonders in a row game invites you to go in search of the treasures of ancient Atlantis. At each stage of the search, you need to get a piece of the map from the ancient mosaic, which indicates the place where the fabulous treasures are stored. Try to lower the artifact to the bottom of the playing field, removing chains of puzzle pieces with the same patterns.
title: Treasure Hunt

content: The famous traveler Phyllias Fog goes on a trip around the world and you have to help him go around the whole Earth in 80 days. Every day you have to get for your new friend the things he needs on the way. Collect gems in chains and get parts of the items Phyllias needs.
title: Treasure Island

content: To play Treasurearena properly, you need a stable internet connection and a good data transfer speed. After downloading, you are prompted to select a server, as well as the type of game and character: knight, mage, archer. View of the map from above. You run around the location (it’s well done), kill monsters, break boxes where you can find useful items, collect treasures. Of course, there are other users as well. You can fight them - it’s an arena. The main goal is to become the first number in the list of the best.
title: Treasurearena game

content: Model house Chanel invited you to become a member of a prestigious fashion show. You have the opportunity to demonstrate your skills and talents on the world-famous podium. At your disposal are two models and an unlimited selection of clothes, shoes, jewelry, make-up tools. Create looks that will impress the famous Chanel fashion designers.
title: Trend Girl

content: In this exciting game you have to create images for two charming girls. It is proposed to put them on make-up, as well as choose clothes, shoes and accessories. Pay attention to the hairstyle, because you have the opportunity to choose the cutest options. Work on the image of girls and admire the result.
title: Tris Vip Dolly Makeup

content: Users are waiting for the continuation of the enchanting game, in which it was necessary to pass the levels, avoiding the bullying of the troll. Here the same thing is offered, but the tasks are different. Gamers are waiting for as many as two dozen levels, which will not be able to slip through on the fly. You will have to use all the analytical skills that you have. Well, luck will come in handy.
title: Trollface Quest: Video Memes And Tv Shows

content: There’s an air show in a small town and you’ve been invited to take part in an airplane race. Choose one of the characters in the game and go to the runway. You need to win three championship races and thanks to this, get the title of king of the sky before the next competition.
title: Trolls: Käferflug

content: Even if you’re in a patrol car, don’t think that you can do everything: crash into other cars, park like an asshole, and so on. The game will clearly demonstrate this. Your task is extremely simple: put the police car in the parking lot in the indicated place. The route is marked with arrows, follow them. A few minor hitting obstacles - the game is over.
title: Truck Driver Crazy Road 2

content: Offroad truck game 2014 invites you to drive a powerful tractor and overcome some difficult tracks. Prove yourself as a virtuoso driver and demonstrate all your driving skills. But remember, check-in time is limited. The path will be indicated by yellow arrows. Following the signs, make your way where no car will pass.
title: Truck Offroad Game 2014

content: Truck racing game offers you to drive a giant truck. This car is equipped with a special nitro accelerator and can reach speeds faster than many sports cars. Racing games that involve trucks require the gamer to be attentive and careful. Develop speed, collect everything you see and look, do not roll over.
title: Truck racing game

content: The game Euro track simulator 3 in Russia invites you to turn into a driver of a huge truck. Your task is to transport goods from one place to another. Difficult tracks await you, which must be overcome with dignity. The main thing is to get to the finish line in the allotted time and not lose items from the body. The timer is displayed at the top of the simulator screen, where you will also see the amount of lost cargo as a percentage of the total. Try to move along the euro track both quickly and accurately.
title: Truck Trials

content: An explosion occurred at a chemical plant somewhere in the interior of Canada, and most of the population of this area turned into zombies. Help three brave friends escape from this nightmare. Control the actions of the team and the car on which they move. Don’t forget to take breaks and explore the abandoned buildings. There you can find food, weapons and fuel for your car.
title: Tuk Tuk Crazy Driver

content: In this motorcycle race at each level, you need to Crazy Games the required number of points to move up the standings. For overtaking rivals, additional bonuses and money are awarded. After the race, you can buy improved motorcycle parts and new clothes for the rider. Use arrow keys to control.
title: Turbo motocross game

content: In a game like Turrets, you need to build defensive structures along the road that can destroy monsters passing by. Under no circumstances should they enter the castle gates. Having accumulated the required number of coins, you will be able to install new weapons on combat positions and improve the ones you already have, trying to inflict the most tangible blow on the enemy.
title: Turret type game

content: After a nuclear catastrophe, the time has come when the living dead walk around the neighborhood and devour every passerby they meet, turning them into similar monsters. You will rid the world of these vile creatures. The more enemies you shoot at each level, the more points you earn as a result.
title: Typocalypse game

content: An excellent arcade game for those who like to park using various types of cars to drive. This time you will be able to show your skills in driving a jeep with a trailer. Pay attention to the inscriptions that are present on the signs indicating the parking place. It is on the place indicated by the arrow that you need to put the car.
title: Ultimate Stunts 3D

content: Intellectual games for children 8 years old will introduce you to a little penguin who needs to get to the other side of the pond. And you need to build a bridge for him from ice blocks of various shapes. Think about exactly how they should be located so that the penguin can successfully cross to the opposite shore.
title: Unblock That

content: Have you ever thrown a Molotov cocktail? In this game you have such a unique opportunity. Your character is a hefty redneck in military uniform. He stands behind the barrier (by the way, it’s funny, but you see him from the front), and hordes of disgusting mutants are attacking him. Aim and throw a bottle to set the specimen on fire. Creatures must not be allowed near the barrier.
title: Undead Drive

content: This toy will help develop your mindfulness and memory. She offers to find pairs of identical cards in a deck laid out on the playing field. Turning over the cards with pictures in pairs, memorize their location and try to open the same ones. The game ends only when all pairs have been found.
title: Under The Sea

content: After starting this exciting game, you will turn into a beauty salon worker. A visitor came to you who wants to get rid of problems with her skin. Follow the game prompts, use the suggested tools and return the girl to her former beauty. Don’t forget to apply makeup to make the heroine even prettier.
title: Underwater Make Up Salon

content: Ben and his friends are forced to fight a whole army of aliens who, under the leadership of an insidious villain, decided to take over the planet. Help a boy with unusual abilities to save humanity. Before starting the next task, listen carefully to the professor. He will tell you how to effectively destroy this or that monster and deal with their villainous commander.
title: Union of Heroes game

content: This toy takes you to the future, where it invites you to become a participant in the next battle between good and evil. content: Those who are going to play the Wars of Thrones online should know that the toy for the film of the same name has a very mediocre relationship. But that doesn’t mean she’s bad. On the contrary, before you is an excellent example of a logical turn-based strategy, not much inferior to chess. The game of the War of Thrones takes place in the constant battles of your chosen character and various mythical monsters. All actions take place on the card field. Cards are pictures of weapons, shields, and healing elixirs. During your turn, you need to swap them so that you get vertical or horizontal rows with the same patterns. They burn out and then either a blow is struck or other actions are performed. New ones are added to the place of the used pictures. Everything happens quickly and dynamically, because the game is online. Very often, in one move, it is possible to make a combo: several actions in a row. Unfortunately, War of Thrones is a one-man game, and the enemy will always be the computer.
title: Valiant Knight
